A Pumpkin Medallion can be used to summon the Pumpkin Moon. Spooky!
南瓜勋章可用来召唤南瓜月。恐怖来袭！
A Stone Slab variant that merges differently with nearby blocks Favored by advanced builders
一种石板变体，能以不同方式与附近的物块合并 深受先进建筑工青睐
A Terrarian girl possessed by the most evil of spirits, she gains superhuman abilities and behaves both arbitrarily and violently.
一个被最邪恶的灵魂附身的泰拉瑞亚女孩，她获得了超人的能力，变得既专横又暴力。

A baby werewolf is following you
A behemoth of an insect attracted to the eerie anti-glow of a solar eclipse. With a rapid gestation period, it multiplies quickly.
被日食的奇异反光所吸引的巨大昆虫。孕育期短，繁殖快。
A betentacled marine creature which discharges a thick, black ink when threatened. The ink is collected for aesthetic purposes.
一种长有触角的海洋生物，在遇到威胁时会喷出浓稠的黑墨水。它收集这种墨水是为了美观。
A biological single-celled organism that divides and multiplies rapidly with the limitless power of celestial energy.
一种单细胞生物，能通过无限的天界能量快速分裂和繁殖。
A bitter harvest rises in the dead of night. Creatures of evil and darkness spook the lands, killing everything in their path.
夜深人静时掀起的一场苦涩收获。邪恶和黑暗生物惊扰了大地，他们所到之处，无一幸免。
A black kitty is following you
A blast of wind terrorizing our world? Did I do that?
一阵狂风威胁到了我们的世界吗？是我干的吗？
A blue lunar seal protected by powerful guardians. This one representing a glittering celestial remnant known as 'stardust'.
一种由强大守卫保护的蓝色月亮封印。它代表一种叫作“星尘”的闪耀天界残骸。
A brilliant red insect often associated with luck. Fishing with these as bait may result in unwanted karma.
一种常与好运联系在一起的亮红色昆虫。用它们作为诱饵钓鱼可能会导致恶报。
A cancerous Corruption thriving off the sins of the living. Its sole desire is to consume all things, leaving behind only a lifeless void.
从活人的罪恶中滋生的一种恶性腐化。它的唯一目的就是吞噬一切，只留下毫无生机的虚空。
A colossal dragon-like creature unleashed along with the ancient spirits. It rules the skies with its unrivaled might.
与古老灵魂一起释放的一种像龙的巨大生物。它凭借自己无与伦比的力量统治着天空。
A cosmic jellyfish-type creature infused with abundant celestial energies which summons smaller minions to serve as its weaponry.
一种水母型宇宙生物，拥有丰富的天界能量，能召唤小仆从作为它的武器。
A curious deviation of nature, large mushrooms grow densely from glowing blue grass. Tough 'mycanoids' defend the area.
大蘑菇密集地生长在发光的蓝草上，这是一种奇怪的自然变异。强硬的“菌人族”保卫着这片区域。
A cursed sapling is following you
A divine and overzealous force, 'The Hallow', serves as a cure to combat evil with its majestic, powerful creatures of light.
一股神圣而过于热情的力量，“神圣之地”拥有伟岸而强大的光明生物，是对抗邪恶势力的有力武器。
A doomed haven of fire and brimstone - run rampant with demons and devils - offers no sanctuary for the living.
一个充斥着火舌和硫磺的厄运之地 - 到处都是恶魔和魔鬼 - 让生者无处可逃。
A dormant, yet powerful floral guardian awoken by the fallout of Cthulhu's destroyed machinations. Its reach spans the entire jungle.
一个沉睡的强大植物守卫，被克苏鲁摧毁阴谋的余波所唤醒。它能影响整个丛林。
A fair way to cross the fairway
穿过平坦球道的好方法
A fanatical leader hell-bent on bringing about the apocalypse by reviving the great Cthulhu through behind-the-scenes scheming.
一个狂热的首领，不顾一切地通过幕后阴谋来复兴伟大的克苏鲁来导致世界末日。
A flower doesn't grow very well so far away from its roots!
A friendly spirit is following you
A gentle critter which swims harmlessly in the ocean depths.
一种温和的小动物，毫无恶意地畅游在深海中。
A gingerbread man seeking vengeance for his long-eaten brethren. He may look yummy, but this is one tough cookie.
一个想要为他很久以前被吃掉的兄弟报仇的姜饼人。他可能看起来很美味，但绝不是一块好对付的饼干。
A glistening, dark material adorns the caverns here. Granite paves the way for progress in architectural fashion and durable monsters.
这里的洞穴装饰着一种闪亮的黑色物质。通道上按照经典的怪物建筑风格铺设着花岗岩。
A goblin army has been defeated!
A goblin army is approaching from the east!
一支哥布林军队正从东边逼近！
A goblin army is approaching from the west!
一支哥布林军队正从西边逼近！
A green lunar seal protected by powerful guardians. This one representing a deep celestial void known as 'vortex'.
一种由强大守卫保护的绿色月亮封印。它代表一种叫作“星旋”的天界深处虚空。
A hive mind of grotesque, biological infections which aim to consume all life whilst feeling absolutely nothing.
一种会在生物之间相互传染的怪诞蜂巢思维，目的是在不知不觉中蚕食所有生命。
A honey bee is following you
A horrible chill goes down your spine...
A hut would suffice. Not all of my surroundings embrace tranquility.
一间小屋就够了。我周围的环境并不都是宁静的。
A large explosion that will destroy most tiles
可摧毁大部分图格的大炸弹
A large explosion that will destroy most tiles 'This will prove to be a terrible idea'
可摧毁大部分图格的大炸弹 “这将是一个可怕的想法”
A large explosion that will destroy most tiles 'Tossing may be difficult.'
会摧毁大部分图格的大炸弹 “投出去可不是件易事。”
A large, wise predatory bird which hunts nocturnally from the tree tops.
一种聪明的大型食肉鸟，夜间从树顶捕食。
A large, worm-like demon, dripping with blood - both its own, and its victim's. It's a bloody nightmare of a fiend!
一种长得像蠕虫的大块头恶魔，浑身滴着鲜血 - 有自己的血，也有受害者的血。这是一个血腥的恶魔噩梦！
A larger bird that inhabits coastal areas. Watch out for droppings!
栖息在沿海地区的大鸟。小心粪便！
A larger, more luminous form of fairy. Pixies provide the Hallow with more blessed light and aid in the cleansing of the land.
一种更大、更闪耀的仙灵。精灵为神圣之地带来了更多的福佑之光，并帮助净化土地。
A lesser demon imbued with hell magic. Capable of teleporting and hurling phantom fireballs towards their foes.
一种拥有地狱魔法的小恶魔。能瞬移并向敌人投掷幻影火球。
A lethal sentry that stands watch over the Dungeon's gates. Those who are deemed unworthy to enter shall not pass!
致命的哨兵，负责看守地牢的大门。没有资格的人将无法进入！
A lightning gun? Don't have time for that, man. I love my bullets!
闪电枪？没时间了，伙计。我就爱我的子弹！
A little sapling is following you
A lot cooler than a snow globe
A lot of people have moved in lately, haven't they? If it gets much more busy around here, a party girl will surely move in!
最近很多人搬过来了，对吧？如果这里变得越来越繁华，派对女孩一定也会搬过来的！
A lot of tenacity and a little bit of luck can go a long way...
始终坚韧不屈，再加上一点点运气，就可以走得很远...
A loyal companion to many. Excitable and always ready for action.
许多人的忠诚伙伴。易激动，随时准备行动。
A magical heart that provides light
A magical orb that provides light
A marvelous storm! A remarkable storm!
这场暴风雨太不可思议了！太壮观了！
A mechanical simulacrum of Cthulhu's spine decorated in laser-armed probes, which detach from its body when damaged.
克苏鲁装饰有激光探测器的脊柱的机械幻影，一旦受到伤害就会从身体脱离。
A narrow explosion that will destroy most tiles Explosion aims away from your position
会摧毁大部分图格的小炸弹 炸弹的目标离你的位置很远
A party? Like.. a festival? I LOVE FESTIVALS! So much pink! So much glitter! It's so cheerful!!
派对？就像...节日那样？我非常喜欢节日！有非常多的粉红色！非常多的闪光！太欢乐了！！
A perfectly gift wrapped bundle of slime. A wonderfully deadly present for any festive occasion.
用来包装礼物的史莱姆丝带。在任何喜庆场合，这都是一件非常致命的礼物。
A persistent arctic jet stream left a part of the world permanently cold. Only the hardiest of beasts can survive this harsh region.
一股持续的北极急流使世界的一部分永久性地变成冰天雪地。只有最顽强的野兽才能在这个严酷的地区存活下来。
A pet can be your best friend.
宠物可以成为你最好的朋友。
A piece of Cthulhu ripped from his body centuries ago in a bloody war. It wanders the night seeking its host body... and revenge!
在几个世纪以前的一场血战中，从克苏鲁身上撕下来的一个器官。它会在晚上出来游荡，寻找它的主人…并且报仇！
A piece of Cthulhu torn asunder, this vile mastermind pulses with agony and aids the Crimson in an attempt to avenge its master.
从克苏鲁身上撕下来的一个器官，这个卑鄙的最强大脑悲痛欲绝，帮助猩红之地为它的主人报仇。
A pirate captain's love for riches is only rivaled by his obsession with heavy gunpowder and large, rampart-shattering cannons!
海盗船长对财富的热爱，可与他对强力火药和毁灭性大炮的痴迷相媲美！
A pirate's best friend, the parrot, will tear the eyes out of any greasy landlubber with its sharp, pointy talons.
鹦鹉是海盗最好的朋友，它会用尖利的爪子将油腻旱鸭子的眼睛给挖出来。
A playful prank gone wrong, clowns will unleash these explosive chompers on their enemies. Also great for parties!
一种好玩的恶作剧，小丑会对敌人释放这种爆炸力量。也适合派对上玩！
A playful sea mammal whose intelligence rivals that of humanity.
一种顽皮的海洋哺乳动物，它的智力可与人类的智力相媲美。
A powerful club for long distances Golf balls will carry very far, with little vertical loft
一种适合远距离的强大高尔夫球杆 高尔夫球会飞得很远，垂直倾角很小
A powerful javelin that unleashes tiny eaters
能释放小吞噬怪的强大标枪
A powerful zombie-like creature whose eye can see for miles, and blow away opponents with powerful lasers.
一种像僵尸的强大生物，它的眼睛可以看到几英里远，并能用强大的激光驱赶对手。
A propeller gato is following you
A pumpkin has many faces. A pumpkin will murder all with many sharp blades. A pumpkin is king of the harvest.
南瓜有很多面。南瓜会用利刃杀死所有人。南瓜是收获之王。
A purple lunar seal protected by powerful guardians. This one representing a stormy celestial body known as 'nebula'.
一种由强大守卫保护的紫色月亮封印。它代表一种叫作“星云”的狂暴天体。
A ragtag army of crude, barbaric goblins set out to conquer and destroy. Some wield dark, evil magic.
一群散漫、野蛮、粗暴的哥布林开始了征服和毁灭的征程。有些人使用黑暗邪恶的魔法。
A rare, red-crested friend of the forest.

A really long fish that looks like a sword's sheath swims in the murky waters of the corruption! It looks a lot like ebonstone, so don't let it fool you! That's right, you. You're catching it, not me!
(Caught in Corruption)

一条很长的鱼，看起来像剑鞘，在腐化之地的浑水中游来游去！它看起来很像黑檀石，所以不要让它骗了你！没错，就你啦。你去抓它，而不是我去！
（抓捕位置：腐化之地）
A reclusive race of reptilian folk found exclusively in the mysterious jungle Temple. They look primitive, but are quite advanced.
一种只在神秘的丛林神庙中发现过的隐居型爬虫。它们看起来很原始，但实际上很先进。
A red lunar seal protected by powerful guardians. This one representing a flaming celestial event known as 'solar flares'.
一种由强大守卫保护的红色月亮封印。它代表一种叫作“耀斑”的烈焰天界事件。
A remarkable display of ingenuity constructed by the Lihzahrd clan. Powered by solar energy cells, it is ready to guard the Temple.
丛林蜥蜴部落匠心独具的杰作。它由太阳能电池供电，随时准备保卫神庙。
A room in a house can have Wood Platforms as a floor or ceiling, but NPCs need at least one solid block to stand on.
房屋中的房间可以用木平台作地板或天花板，但NPC的脚下需要至少一块实心块。
A sea-green marquess of the abyss
A seafaring horde of armed bandits that lust after the riches of the land, collecting treasures and taking no prisoners.
一群贪恋这片富饶土地的武装海盗，他们只搜刮宝藏，不囚禁人。
A seemingly ordinary goldfish, until it decides to rain.
一种看似普通的金鱼，不过在下雨天就不普通了。
A shadow mimic is following you
A sharp-toothed plant with a taste for human flesh. It has the ability to hide inside the mud and reach over great distances.
一种长有锋利牙齿的植物，喜欢吃人肉。能隐藏在泥里，并能到达很远的地方。
A simple white bird which enjoys a calm sunny day.
一种简单的白色小鸟，喜欢风平浪静的晴天。
A simple, gelatinous creature that swallows anything and everything whole! It takes a long time to digest anything.
一种简单的胶状生物，能一口吞下任何东西！但消化需要很长时间。
A singular probe detached from the Destroyer's body serves as a remote laser battery, often in a swarm of other probes.
从毁灭者身上分离出来的一个独特探测怪，就像一个远程激光电池，通常和一群其他探测怪在一起。
A slick, tubular invertebrate found hiding in rocks, dirt, and grass. Loves the rain. Fish are especially attracted to these.
一种光滑的管状无脊椎动物，一般藏在岩石、泥土和草丛中。喜欢下雨。鱼特别容易被这些蠕虫所吸引。
A slimy mollusk that thrives in damp, dark places. Fish are barely attracted to these.
黏糊糊的软体动物，生长在潮湿、黑暗的地方。鱼几乎不会被它们所吸引。
A small Jack 'O Lantern is fiendishly lighting the way
一盏小杰克南瓜灯像恶魔似地照亮道路
A small explosion that puts enemies on fire Lights nearby area on fire for a while
让敌人着火的小炸弹 在一段时间内照亮附近着火区域
A small explosion that will absorb liquid
A small explosion that will destroy most tiles
可摧毁大部分图格的小炸弹
A small explosion that will destroy most tiles 'Tossing may be difficult.'
会摧毁大部分图格的小炸弹 “投出去可不是件易事。”
A small explosion that will destroy most tiles Very bouncy
可摧毁大部分图格的小炸弹 非常有弹性
A small explosion that will not destroy tiles
不会摧毁图格的小炸弹
A small explosion that will not destroy tiles 'Tossing may be difficult.'
不会摧毁图格的小炸弹 “投出去可不是件易事。”
A small explosion that will not destroy tiles Very bouncy
不会摧毁图格的小炸弹 非常有弹性
A small explosion that will spread dirt
A small explosion that will spread honey
A small explosion that will spread lava
A small explosion that will spread water
A small, levitating sorcerer from Etheria who wields dark magic and can even raise fresh minions for the Old One's Army.
一个来自埃特尼亚的小悬浮巫士，他不仅会黑魔法，还能为撒旦军队培养新的仆从。
A smooth material wrought with pleasing veins of color coat the walls of this cavern. An ancient civilization of monsters dwell here.
这个洞穴的墙壁上覆盖着一种光滑的材料，上面有令人赏心悦目的彩色纹理。一种古老的怪物文明在这里存续了下来。
A snail that has mutated to adapt to the glowing mushroom environment. Fish are significantly attracted to these.
一种已变异的蜗牛，并适应了发光蘑菇的生存环境。鱼很容易被这种蜗牛所吸引。
A soft-shelled reptile that prefers saltwater and marine prey.
一种喜欢咸水和海洋猎物的软壳爬行动物。
A solemn butterfly seeking blooms rooted in hell. Its wings glimmer with fiery veins.
一只在地狱里寻找花朵的冷峻蝴蝶。它的翅膀闪烁着火红的翅脉。
A specialized club for finishing holes Golf balls will stay close to the ground over short distances for precision shots
一种专门用于最后进洞球的高尔夫球杆 高尔夫球将在短距离内贴近地面，以达到精确击球的目的
A specialized club for sand pits or tall obstacles Golf balls will gain tons of vertical loft but will not carry very far
一种专门用于沙坑或高障碍物的高尔夫球杆 高尔夫球将获得很大的垂直倾角，但不会飞得很远
A stardust guardian will protect you from nearby enemies
星尘守卫将保护你不受附近敌人的伤害
A strange, round furry mammal with an unusually large, protruding nose. They are extremely lightweight.
一种圆圆的、毛茸茸的奇怪哺乳动物，长着一只特别大且突出的鼻子。体重极轻。
A strong contrast between high and low pressure detected.
检测到高压和低压之间的压差大。
A strong gale adds challenge to a game of golf, but this is rather excessive.
大风增加了打高尔夫球的难度，但这风也太大了。
A subterranean form of crayfish which scuttles along the cavern floors, searching for prey to clip apart with its powerful pincers.
一种地下的龙虾，会沿着洞穴的地面快速移动来搜寻猎物，然后用它有力的钳子将猎物撕开。
A sugar glider is following you
A suspicious looking eye that provides light
可提供照明的可疑眼球
A swift-flying insect which hunts mosquitoes. Comes in a variety of colors. Fish are somewhat attracted to these.
一种飞行速度很快的昆虫，以捕食蚊子为生。有各种各样的颜色。鱼多少会被它们所吸引。
A tall, hulking demi-human from the Old One's Army with unfathomable strength and vitality. He carries a big stick.
一个来自撒旦军队的高大威猛的半人，有着深不可测的力气和生命力。他通常会拿着一根大棒。
A thrift shop? No, I am only selling the highest quality items on the market.
旧货店？不，我只卖市场上的尖货。
A tiny long-bearded sneak who resides in oversized trees. Becomes a lawn ornament when exposed to sunlight.
一种长胡子的小地精，住在大树上。当暴露在阳光下时，可以点缀整个草坪。
A unique goblin species from Etheria, they are not related Terrarian goblins. The ferocious footsoldiers of the Old One's Army.
一种来自埃特尼亚的独特哥布林物种，它们与泰拉瑞亚哥布林无关。撒旦军队的凶残步兵。
A unique species of snail which withstands extreme heat. Its boiling slime trail melts down most weaker surfaces.
一种独特的蜗牛，能经受极端的高温。它沸腾的黏液能融化最脆弱的表面。
A variation of firefly which adapted to the intense conditions of the world's infernal core. It mimics sparking embers.
萤火虫的变种，适应了世界地狱核心的紧张环境。长得像火花的余烬。
A vibrant beetle-like bug. Fish are extremely attracted to these.
一种颜色鲜艳的虫子，长得像甲虫。鱼非常容易被这些虫子所吸引。
A vicious Etherian dragon who leads the minions of the Old One's Army that found their way to this world.
一条天国毒龙带着撒旦军队的仆从来到了这个世界。
A vision of a deadly omen wrought forth by a powerful cultist, often appears with reckless cosmic summoning of wyvern spirits.
一种由强大的邪教徒制造的致命预兆幻象，经常以肆无忌惮的宇宙召唤飞龙灵魂的形式出现。
A volt bunny is ecstatic about you
A water fowl with beautiful plumage. Swims in the purest of water, quacking happily.
拥有漂亮羽毛的水禽。喜欢畅游在最纯净的水中，欢快地嘎嘎叫。
A well-rounded club best for mid-range distances Golf balls will carry a good distance with decent vertical loft
一种最适合中等距离的圆润高尔夫球杆 高尔夫球会飞出一段中等距离，垂直倾角适当
A white feathered waterfowl that swims in pure water and basks in the warm sun.
一种拥有白色羽毛的水禽，喜欢畅游在纯净的水中，沐浴在温暖的阳光下。
A wonder of Martian technology constructed from the strongest metals and infused with biological components.
这是火星科技的奇迹，由最坚硬的金属制成，并注入了生物成分。
A worm-like parasite spit forth from the Wall of Flesh, filled with the lifeblood of its host. This blood has healing properties.
从血肉墙吐出的一种像蠕虫的寄生虫，沾满了宿主的鲜血。这种血液有愈合作用。
ARGH! Another fuse put out by all this wet stuff! This never happens underground!
啊！又一根保险丝被这些湿东西给烧断了！这在地下是绝对不会发生的！
Abnormal levels of negative and positive charged particles detected.
检测到异常水平的负电荷和正电荷粒子。
About time we gotta barkeep around here! Me rum was almost gone!
差不多是时候让酒吧老板过来一趟了！我的朗姆酒都快喝没了！
Absorbs 25% of damage done to players on your team when above 25% life Grants immunity to knockback
当生命值高于25%时，吸收团队中玩家所受伤害的25% 对击退免疫
According to {Dryad}, I'm murdering a lot of her friends when I mow the lawn. I gotta have a fairway for my course!
{Dryad}表示，我割草的时候杀了她很多朋友。我得为我的球场弄一个球道！
Activates and breaks when a player steps on it
玩家踩上时激活并裂开
Activates every fourth of a second
Activates every half of a second
Activates when a player steps on it
Activates when a player steps on or off it
玩家上去或下来时激活
Activates when a projectile touches it
Activates when all lamps are on, Deactivates otherwise
所有灯亮时激活，其他情况下停用
Activates when anything but a player steps on it
除玩家以外的任何东西踩上时激活
Activates when not all lamps are on, Deactivates otherwise
部分灯亮时激活，其他情况下停用
Activates whenever occupied by honey, deactivates otherwise
上面有蜂蜜时激活，其他情况下停用
Activates whenever occupied by lava, deactivates otherwise
上面有熔岩时激活，其他情况下停用
Activates whenever occupied by liquid, deactivates otherwise
上面有液体时激活，其他情况下停用
Activates whenever occupied by water, deactivates otherwise
上面有水时激活，其他情况下停用
Activates whenever players are over it, deactivates otherwise
当玩家越过时激活，其他情况下停用
Advanced players may wish to remap their buttons; you can do this from the Controls Menu in Settings.
高级玩家可能希望重新映射按钮；你可以通过“设置”中的“控制菜单”执行此操作。
After 4:30am, the sun rises in the sky and the most dangerous of beings flee from the light. It's a great time to explore!
凌晨4:30过后，太阳升起，最危险的生物逃离光明。这是探索的好时机！
After 7:30pm, the moon rises in the sky. All manner of evil things, living and dead, roam the lands in the dark.
晚上7:30过后，月亮升起。各种各样的邪恶力量，无论是活物还是亡灵，都会在黑暗中游荡。
After all that cake, you might have to call me White Beard for a while.
吃完这块蛋糕后，你可能就得暂时叫我白胡子了。
Aggressive flying insects which swarm the jungle depths. Their venomous barbs discharge over great distances at high velocity.
出没在丛林深处的攻击性飞行昆虫。它们有毒的螫刺会远距离进行高速开火。
Ah, no one around - I can test new bombs without creating a graveyard for limbs!
啊，附近没人 - 我可以测试新炸弹了，这次不用埋死人了！
Ah, they will tell tales of {PlayerName} some day... good ones I'm sure.
总有一天他们会讲述{PlayerName}的传奇，肯定会是好故事。
Ahh!! I'd rather be working at an abandoned hospital than hanging around here!
啊！！我宁愿在废弃的医院工作，也不愿待在这里！
Ahh, {BiomeName} is a nice, quiet place to construct more gadgets. Major like-age!
啊，{BiomeName}是一个安静祥和的好地方，可以在这里制作更多工具。在这里呆一辈子也行！
Ahh, {BiomeName} is really nice, reminds me of my home town, I like it very much so!
啊，{BiomeName}真的很好，让我想起了我的家乡，我太喜欢这里了！
Ahh, {BiomeName}... I like it here, it's got character.
啊，{BiomeName}…我喜欢这里，这里很有个性。
Ahh... a sip of tea to enjoy the breeze.
啊…饮啜一番，享受清凉的微风。
Ahh... nice and damp. I feel so good.
啊…有点潮湿挺好的。我感觉很好。
Ahoy! Brace fer impact, swashbuckler! 'Tis a'mother of all tempests!
啊嘿！迎接撞击吧，侠盗！大风暴之母来了！
Ahoy! The only good Pirate Captain is... one that sells cannons and weapons to take out all competing Pirate Captains!
啊嗨！唯一值得肯定的海盗船长是…能卖掉大炮和武器来干掉所有敌人的海盗船长！
Ahoy, me takes {NPCName} under me wing, landlubber. Me love raisin' sea pups!
啊嘿，旱鸭子，有俺在，别想动{NPCName}一根汗毛。俺喜欢养海豹！
Aim to sink your golf ball in the cup Lets everyone know how well you did
目的是让你把高尔夫球击进球洞 让所有人知道你有多厉害
All I want is for the switch to make the... What?!
我要做的就是找个开关...干嘛？！
All better. I don't want to see you jumping off anymore cliffs.
情况好多了。我不想再看到你跳崖。
All hands on deck! A storm of wind be brewin'!
全体船员就位！暴风雨就要来了！
All is peaceful, don't mess it up.
一切都很平静，可别毁了。
All matters are well at hand, my loyal subject!
我忠实的臣民，一切尽在我的掌握之中！
All neural functions appear to be operating smoothly.
所有神经功能似乎都运行得很顺利。
All of nature may be my home, but a house would treat me well.
我可以把整个大自然当作我的家，但有一所属于我的房子会更好。
All these piles of bones and stones... perfect for blowin' up!
这些堆积如山的尸骨和石头…用来爆破再好不过了！
All this rainfall makes it hard to see. I should tinker my goggles with a pair of windshield wipers.
大雨让我很难看清前方。我应该给我的护目镜装上一对雨刷。
All this wind can make just about anyone angry. Evidently, this includes otherwise harmless dandelions and their deadly seeds.
这种风会让任何人都愤怒。就连本来无害的蒲公英也会发怒，发射出致命的种子。
Allows flight The wearer can run super fast
可飞行 穿戴者可飞速奔跑
Allows flight The wearer can run super fast Flowers grow on the grass you walk on
可飞行 穿戴者可飞速奔跑 你走过的草地上会生长花朵
Allows flight, super fast running 8% increased movement speed
可飞行、飞速奔跑 移动速度提高8%
Allows flight, super fast running, and extra mobility on ice 8% increased movement speed
可飞行、飞速奔跑，并额外提供冰上移动能力 移动速度提高8%

Allows flight, super fast running, and extra mobility on ice 8% increased movement speed Provides the ability to walk on water, honey & lava Grants immunity to fire blocks and 7 seconds of immunity to lava Reduces damage from touching lava
可飞行、飞速奔跑，并额外提供冰上移动能力 移动速度提高8% 可让人在水、蜂蜜和熔岩上行走 对火块免疫并在7秒内对熔岩免疫 减少因触碰熔岩而受到的伤害
Allows only liquids through Can be toggled open or closed 'They'rrrre great!'
仅允许液体通过 可以打开或关闭 “太棒了！”
Allows quick travel in water 'Deal with it'
允许快速在水中行走 “干掉它”
Allows the ability to climb walls
Allows the ability to climb walls Increases jump speed and allows auto-jump Increases fall resistance
可爬墙 提高跳跃速度，并允许自动跳跃 增加坠落阻力
Allows the ability to climb walls and dash Gives a chance to dodge attacks
可爬墙和猛冲 有机会避开攻击
Allows the ability to dash 10% increased damage and critical strike chance
可猛冲 伤害和暴击率各增加10%
Allows the ability to dash Double tap a direction
可猛冲 双击一个方向
Allows the ability to slide down walls Improved ability if combined with Climbing Claws
可沿墙滑下 结合攀爬爪使用时可提升能力
Allows the ability to slide down walls Improved ability if combined with Shoe Spikes
可沿墙滑下 结合鞋钉使用时可提升能力
Allows the ability to walk on water
Allows the collection of Vine Rope from vines
允许从葡萄藤收集藤蔓绳
Allows the collection of hay from grass
Allows the collection of seeds for ammo
Allows the combining of some accessories
Allows the holder to do an improved double jump
可让持有者更好地二连跳
Allows the holder to double jump
Allows the holder to double jump Increases jump height
可让持有者二连跳 增加跳跃高度
Allows the holder to double jump Increases jump height and negates fall damage
可让持有者二连跳 增加跳跃高度，减轻坠落伤害
Allows the holder to quadruple jump Increases jump height
可让持有者四连跳 增加跳跃高度
Allows the holder to reverse gravity Press UP to change gravity
可让持有者反转重力 按UP可更改重力
Allows the owner to float for a few seconds
可让持有者漂浮几秒钟
Allows the player to dash into the enemy Double tap a direction
允许玩家冲入敌人 双击一个方向
Allows the use of two yoyos at once
允许同时使用两个悠悠球
Allows time to fast forward one day per week
允许时间每周快进一天
Allows ultimate control over wires! <right> while holding to edit wire settings
允许对电线进行终极控制！ <right>时按住不放可编辑电线设置
Allows you to go into stealth mode
Allows you to see nearby danger sources
允许你查看附近的危险源
Alright, you sit and marinate. I'll be back to rinse your color out in 25 minutes...
好吧，你边坐边染。25分钟后我再来将染发剂冲洗干净...
Always buy more wire than you need!
Always keep an eye out for strangers in need! You never know when you might meet someone new who is in need of help.
随时留意有需要的陌生人！你永远不知道什么时候会再遇到一个需要帮助的人。
Am I hearing spiders? Oh, just noisy neighbors, I don't like that.
我听到的是蜘蛛的声音吗？噢，只是邻居的吵闹声，但我不喜欢这样。
An advanced flying saucer from somewhere well beyond this world. The destruction from its weaponry is unimaginable.
一种来自异界的先进飞碟。其武器的破坏力难以想象。
An ancient monster with a petrifying gaze. The snakes which grow from her scalp like hair grant her these powers.
一种古老怪物，她的凝视能让一切石化。她头皮上生长的像头发的蛇赋予了她这种力量。
An aquatic pigron mutation from the depths of the ocean who surfaces in search of a rare, savory type of worm.
一种从海洋深处变异的水生猪龙，它会浮出水面来寻找一种稀有而美味的蠕虫。
An early bird catches the worm, but an early hole catches the birdie.
早起的鸟儿有虫吃，靠前的球洞有球吃。
An enchanted lantern is lighting your way
附魔灯笼将为你照亮前路
An enchanter in life, this funny fellow won't give up his robe or wizard hat without a fight. He prefers warmer caverns.
这个有趣的家伙在生前是一个巫师，他是不会轻易放弃他的长袍和巫师帽的。他更喜欢温暖的洞穴。
An endless ocean stretched to the horizon awaits at the world's edge, filled with infinitely hungry creatures from the watery depths.
无边无际的海洋一直延伸到地平线，最终汇集到世界的边缘，这里遍布来自海洋深处的饥渴生物。
An enormous shelled water demon which feeds off the negative energy of a Blood Moon. Brutally responds to being pestered.
一种巨大的有壳水怪，以血月的负能量为食。被缠住时会予以残酷反击。
An error occurred while saving the capture. Attempting again...
保存捕获数据时出错。正在重试...
An exotic waterfowl that thrives in the desert oasis.
一种生长在沙漠绿洲的奇异水禽。
An extremely rare, difficult to catch glowworm. A specific, powerful sea creature is insatiably attracted to these.
一种极其稀有、难以捕捉的发光蠕虫。深受一种特殊而强大的海洋生物的喜欢。
An eyeball spring is following you
An ill-tempered ape from cold, snowy regions to the north. They do not appreciate festivity, so they've come to spoil all the fun.
一种脾气暴躁的猿猴，来自寒冷多雪的北方地区。它们不喜欢庆祝，所以它们是来捣乱的。
An intelligent being who seeks out souls to steal, utilizing nails from his own body both as a weapon and as defensive measures.
一种盗取灵魂的聪明生物，利用自己的硬壳作为武器和防御手段。
An oversized cousin of the bat found only in the Jungle, giant flying foxes hunt the night skies looking for prey.
巨型飞狐是蝙蝠的巨型近亲，只在丛林里发现过。它们会在夜空中寻找猎物。
An unsavory larval bug which feasts on dead, rotting matter. Fish are somewhat attracted to these.
一种令人讨厌的幼虫，以腐烂的尸体为食。鱼多少会被它们所吸引。
An unseen deity responsible for a torch's eternal flicker, however easily angered by the unsightly, ungrateful abuse of torch placement.
一位看不见的神明，他负责让火把永恒闪烁，但很容易因为别人不知好歹地将火把摆放得很难看而发怒。
An unusual amphibious bipedal lizard which inhabits the dark caverns. When threatened, it spews a highly corrosive acid everywhere.
一种罕见的两栖双足蜥蜴，栖息在黑暗的洞穴里。当受到威胁时，它会到处喷出高腐蚀性的酸。
Ancient forces prevent you from accessing this location . . .
古老的力量阻止你进入这个位置…
Ancient magicks corrupted the minds of the once friendly desert djinns, releasing them full of hostility from their lamps.
远古魔法腐化了曾经友善的沙漠神灵的心灵，释放出充满敌意的光芒。
Ancient magicks have unleashed the dark influences that gave birth to the Eater of Worlds, producing smaller, but just as deadly worms.
远古魔法释放了黑暗影响，导致了世界吞噬怪的出现，产生了更小但同样致命的蠕虫。
Ancient prophecies speak of a way to summon the monstrous hordes of Halloween through medallions crafted with pumpkins.
古老的预言中提到一种方法 — 通过南瓜制成的勋章来召唤万圣节的恶魔大军。
And then Unit 492-8 said, 'Who do you think I am, Unit 472-6?' HA. HA. HA.
然后，第492-8队说，“你认为我是谁？第472-6队？”哈。哈。哈。
Angel Statue you say? I'm sorry, I'm not a junk dealer.
你是说天使雕像？对不起，我不是收废品的。
Animated by the blessed light of the crystals, it will slice through anything to cleanse the world's evils.
水晶的福佑之光让它所向披靡，它会以割穿的方式来除掉世界的恶魔。
Antlion Swarmers patrol their nests with a watchful eye. Should anyone threaten their eggs, they will defend them fiercely.
蚁狮蜂会警惕地巡视自己的巢穴。一旦有人威胁到它们的卵，它们就会拼死保护。
Anvils can be crafted out of iron or lead, or purchased from a merchant.
砧子可以用铁或铅制作，或者从商人那里购买。
Anywhere where one can see the trees, the mountains, and the sky. Not all creatures are powerful or even hostile.
在这里，到处都能看到大树、高山和晴空。并不是所有生物都很强大甚至充满敌意。

Apparently, Demon Eyes can sometimes be amphibious. They don't fly, they swim! I want to see the look on someone's face when they find it in their bathtub! They hang around the same areas. That means you reel one in for me!
(Caught in Sky Lakes & Surface)

显然，恶魔眼有时能在水里和陆地上生存。他们不会飞，但会游泳！ 我想知道有人在浴缸中发现一条时会有怎样的表情！ 他们总是在相同的地方晃悠。所以，你要钓一条给我！
（抓捕位置：天湖和地表）
Appears at night in blessed locations, filling the sky with flashing cyan light. Fish are especially attracted to these.
夜晚出现在受福佑的地方，闪烁的蓝绿光能照亮周围。鱼特别容易被这些荧光虫所吸引。
Appears at night in calm locations, illuminating the sky with strobing green light. Fish are fairly attracted to these.
夜晚出现在平静的地方，闪烁的绿光能照亮周围。鱼很容易被它们所吸引。
Are goblins really so different from us that we couldn't live together peacefully?
哥布林和我们的差别有那么大吗，都没法和平相处了吗？
Are the tunes killing your party? I'll shuffle the playlist for you.
这些音乐正在毁掉你的派对吗？我来给你打乱播放列表。
Are you here for a peek at my crystal ball?
你来这里是不是想看看我的水晶球？
Argh, {BiomeName} be a bit cramped for me style, ye scurvy dog!
啊，{BiomeName}对俺来说有点狭窄，真是没用！
啊！{NPCName}不要过来。讨厌。忿怒。恶心！！
Arr, {BiomeName} be the foulest chunk 'o dry land ever traversed!
啊，{BiomeName}是俺走过的最肮脏的陆地！
Arr... hate to say it, but many me mateys put these holes in the ground... if ye catch me drift!
呀…俺本来不想说，但俺的很多弟兄们在地上弄了这些洞…恁懂我的意思！
Artists like to practice their craft, and painters like to paint. If enough people move in, we'll have enough homes that a painter might show up to spruce up the place!
艺术家喜欢施展他们的技艺，画家喜欢绘画。如果有很多人搬过来，我们就会有很多房子，说不定还会有油漆工来把这个地方装饰一番呢！
As if bats weren't enough of a nuisance already, Ice Bats can freeze flesh solid with a touch, leaving their prey defenseless.
好像蝙蝠还不够讨厌似的，冰雪蝙蝠轻轻一碰就能把肉体冻住，让它们的猎物毫无防备。
As if living underground wasn't bad enough, jerks like you come in while I'm sleeping and steal my children.
生活在地下已经够惨的了，像你这样的败类还要趁我睡觉来偷我的孩子。
As much as I love people, I am rather shy. It takes me awhile to break the ice...
尽管我很爱人民，但我特别害羞。我花了很长时间才打破僵局...
As much as you would think I'd belong here, I really don't.
尽管你会认为我属于这里，但实则不然。
As primitive as they are, some goblins have the potential for manipulating magicked shadow energy through a form of hexing.
尽管哥布林是一种原始生物，但有些哥布林却能通过一种魔法操纵暗影能量。
As the Hallow responds to the encroaching evils, it inadvertently awakens things that have slept beneath the sands for centuries.
当神圣之地反击入侵的恶魔时，它无意中唤醒了沙漠之下沉睡了几个世纪的怪物。
At last, my time has come!
Attackers also take double damage Reduces damage taken by 15%
攻击者也会承受双倍伤害 所受伤害减少15%
Attackers take damage from the cactus spines
攻击者因为仙人掌尖刺受到伤害
Attacking generates a defensive barrier of titanium shards
攻击生成钛金碎片防御屏障
Attain maximum life and mana possible without accessories or buffs.
在没有配饰或增益的情况下获得最大生命值和魔力值。
Attracts a legendary creature which flourishes in water & combat
吸引一种在水中或战斗中十分活跃的传奇生物
自动喷涂放置好的物品
Automatically places actuators on placed objects
自动将制动器放置在已放好的物品上
Avast! Too many landlubbers on me ship be foulin' my mood.
停船！船上的旱鸭子太多，会搅乱俺的心情。
Awesome catch! It's all going according to plan! He he he!
抓到啦！一切都是按计划进行的！哈哈哈！
BEEP! Severe weather warning. This is not a test. Take shelter, immediately. BEEP!
哔哔！恶劣天气警告。这不是测试。马上找地方躲起来。哔哔！
BOOM! Even mother nature likes a taste of gratifying demolition!
砰！就连大自然母亲也喜欢爆破的满足感！
格林奇宝宝的恶作剧口哨
Back where I'm from, we only serve Root Beer...
在我的家乡，我们只供应根汁饮料...
Bad header lead to a read buffer overflow.
标头错误导致读取缓冲区溢出。
Bah! Here, take your shillings and get out of my sight!
呸！给，拿好你的铜板，滚出我的视线！
Bah! I'm trying to make my way back home to count my money. Begone!
呸！我正准备回家数钱。滚开！
Bah! If this wind keeps up, people will lose their precious possessions and stop paying me!
呸！如果这大风继续刮下去，人们就会失去他们的宝贵财产，也就不会再向我缴税了！
Bah! You again? You just grabbed some of my coin just moments ago, so bugger off and come back later!
呸！你又来了？你刚刚才拿走了我的钱币，给我滚开，晚点再回来！
Balance is key. We need sun, we need rain. Too much of either leads to ruin.
平衡是关键。我们既需要阳光，也需要雨水。两者之间的比例失调都会导致毁灭。
Bans a player from the server.
Be advised that certain creatures only come out during rain.
注意，某些生物只在下雨的时候才会出来。
Be careful around Martian Probes. If they scan you, they'll summon a Martian Invasion!
经过火星探测器周围时小心点。如果它们扫描你，它们就会召唤火星入侵部队！
Be it what it would, a jetpack would suit you nicely!
不管怎样，喷气背包和你很搭！
注意安全！泰拉瑞亚需要你！
Beat the shindig out of it! May contain a suprise!
打出狂欢派对！ 可能会有惊喜！
Beautiful fluttering insects that love sunrises. Fish are attracted to these based on their color variety.
喜欢日出的美丽昆虫。连鱼都会被这些五彩缤纷的蝴蝶所吸引。
Become a victim to a nasty underground trap.
Become immune after striking an enemy
攻击敌人后进入免疫状态
Become immune after striking an enemy, and increases your max number of minions by 2
攻击敌人后进入免疫状态， 仆从数量上限提高2个
Become the Pedguin 'Great for impersonating streamers!'
加入企鹅在线 “非常适合冒充游戏主播！”
Beetles increase your melee damage and speed
甲虫增加你的近战伤害和速度
Begging so soon?! Don't look at me like I'll have a change of heart overnight!
这么快就乞讨了？！别看我，别以为过了一晚上我就会改变主意！
Being cursed was lonely, so I once made a friend out of leather. I named him Wilson.
遭到诅咒时很孤独，于是我用皮革制作了一个朋友。我叫他威尔森。
Belonging to a pair of mechanically recreated Eyes of Cthulhu, this one chases at high speed, exhaling cursed flames.
这只魔焰眼是对克苏鲁之眼的机械复制，它会高速追逐，吐出诅咒的火焰。
Belonging to a pair of mechanically recreated Eyes of Cthulhu, this one focuses its energy into firing powerful lasers.
这只激光眼是对克苏鲁之眼的机械复制，它将能量集中在发射强大的激光上。
Beneath the Hallow's cleansing blanket lies a vengeful fae goddess bent on scrubbing the land of any and all impurity.
神圣之地的净化毯下住着一个报复心切的女神，一心一意要除去这片土地上的一切污秽。
Beneath the sandy surface lies weathered, hard sandstone. Massive nests of deadly insects and more infest these ancient burrows.
沙漠表面之下是风化的坚硬沙岩。这些古老的洞穴里藏着大量致命的昆虫和更多寄生虫。
Between you and me, {Dryad} is the only one I trust. She is the only one here who hasn't tried to eat me or use me in a potion.
只有你知我知，{Dryad}是我唯一信任的人。她是这里唯一一个不想吃掉我或用我来炼药的人。
Bigger and better for prolonged exploration, or bringing a friend.
中等世界，更适合带上一位好友持久探索。
Birthed from the Corruption as a being of pure malice, its sole instincts are to pursue, punish, and kill.
诞生于腐化之地的它，骨子里都透露出恶意，它唯一的本能就是追逐、惩罚和杀戮。
Blessed with the prismatic light of the Hallow, the Illuminant Bats are a vibrant pink blur arcing across the darkness of the Underground.
夜明蝙蝠拥有神圣之地的棱镜之光，在黑暗的地下形成了一道亮粉色的模糊弧线。
Blink and you'll miss it. The brightest colors stand out when the lightning flashes.
眨眼你就会错过。最亮的颜色在闪电时最显眼。
Blood Moon is the worst time to fish! The fish bite, yes, but so do the zombies!
血月是最不适合钓鱼的时候！这鱼咬人，没错，但僵尸也咬人！
Bosses are easier to defeat with friends.
和好友一起更容易打败boss。
Bounces back after hitting a wall
Bows and guns require the proper ammo in your Ammo Slots.
使用弓和枪需要你的弹药槽里有适当的弹药。
Boy, I need to make my way back to my merchandise!
小伙子，我得回去拿我的商品！
Boy, that sun is hot! I do have some perfectly ventilated armor.
老兄，这太阳真晒啊！我确实拥有一款很通风的盔甲。
Breach the impenetrable walls of the jungle temple.
攻破丛林神庙坚不可摧的墙。
Breaks when fallen on 'Watch your step'
跌倒在冰上时冰会裂开 “注意脚下”
可在水中而非空气中呼吸
Brilliant, my dear! You have brought me an exquisite sample of the world's beautiful colors and aroma. In exchange, you may take this special bottle of dye.
太棒了，亲爱的！你给我带来了全世界最缤纷、最芬香的精致样本。作为交换，你可以拿走这瓶特别的染料。
Bringing his massive chompers to bear, the Nutcracker frolics through the wintery night. Nuts aren't the only thing he can crack.
胡桃夹士靠他巨大的牙齿度过了寒冷的夜晚。坚果不是他唯一能弄碎的东西。
Brought to you by Xenon and DJ Sniper
由兹南和DJ斯奈普尔为你带来
Build a Furnace to craft metal bars out of ore.
造个熔炉来将矿石制作成金属锭。
Build a house in a mushroom biome and have the Truffle move in.
在蘑菇群落里建造一栋房屋，并让松露人住进来。
Build a house suitable enough for your first town NPC, such as the guide, to move into.
建造一栋足够大的房屋，让第一个城镇的NPC（如向导）住进来。
Build momentum to increase attack power
创造动力以增加攻击力
Build momentum to increase attack power 'Have at thee!'
创造动力以增加攻击力 “拿命来！”
Build or encounter a glowing mushroom field above the surface.
打造或发现地表上的发光蘑菇地。
Built from parts of deceased Terrarians, this stout monster resulted from a crazy man's desire to create life with his own hands.
这个威猛的怪物由已死去的部分泰拉瑞亚人一手打造而成，起因是一个疯子想用自己的双手创造生命。
Built to survive the desert heat, avian scavengers such as these will peck apart those who come near their carrion.
为了在炎热的沙漠中生存，像这样的鸟类食腐动物会将靠近它们腐肉的食腐动物啄开。
Bunnies are pure beings that normally cannot be afflicted by Crimson, but will succumb under the effects of a Blood Moon.
兔子是一种纯洁的动物，一般不会遭到猩红的折磨，但会在血月的影响下屈服。
Bunnies are pure beings that normally resist all forms of Corruption, but will succumb under the effects of a Blood Moon.
兔子是一种纯洁的动物，一般能抵挡各种腐化，但会在血月的影响下屈服。
But I was almost done putting blinking lights up here!
但我快要把闪光灯放到上面了！
Buy now and get free shipping!
By means unknown, this silvery metamorphic sphere levitates about on its own. It moves about quickly, often producing spikes.
不知什么原因，这种银色的变质球会独自飘浮在空中。它移动迅速，经常射出尖刺。
By the time glowing red eyes appear in the darkness of the desert caves, it is already too late. The lamias have found their prey.
等到漆黑的沙漠洞穴里出现发光的红眼睛就为时已晚了。说明拉弥亚已经找到了它们的猎物。
Calls upon a suspicious looking eye to provide light 'I know what you're thinking....'
召唤可疑眼球可提供照明 “我知道你在想什么...”
Can be hit with a golf club
Can be traded for rare dyes
Can be used to scoop up a small amount of liquid
Can be used to store your items Stored items can only be accessed by you
可用来储存你的物品 储存的物品只有你能使用
Can be used to store your items Stored items can only be accessed by you Will contain items picked up by a void bag
可用来储存你的物品 储存的物品只有你能使用 将包含由虚空袋拾取的物品
Can be worn in vanity slots
Can breathe and move easily underwater
可在水下呼吸和轻松移动
Can some of these noisy people move further away? No? Ok.
这些吵闹的人能搬到更远的地方去吗？不行？好吧。
Cannot be equipped or removed while shopping
无法在购物时装备或移除
Cannot be used without Etherian Mana until the Eternia Crystal has been defended
在埃特尼亚水晶得到保护之前，无法在没有天国魔力的情况下使用
Cannot use items that require mana
无法使用需要魔力的物品
Capable of soaking up an endless amount of lava
能够吸收无限多的熔岩
Capable of soaking up an endless amount of water
Care to bake me some cookies?
你愿意给我烤些饼干吗？
Casts a slow moving bolt of water
投射出快速移动的剃刀轮
Causes confusion and bounces back after hitting a wall
造成混乱，并在撞墙后弹回
Causes stars to fall after taking damage
受到伤害后会使星星坠落
Causes stars to fall and increases length of invincibility after taking damage
受伤后会使星星坠落并延长无敌状态时间
Causes stars to fall, releases bees and douses the user in honey when damaged
受到伤害后会使星星坠落，释放蜜蜂，并将使用者浸入蜂蜜
Causes stars to rain from the sky
Causes stars to rain from the sky 'Forged with the fury of heaven'
使星星从天而降 “用天堂怒火锻造而成”
Causes your mouse cursor to have shifting rainbow colors
可让你的鼠标光标具有不断变化的彩虹色
Celestial power fuels the aggression of these violent beasts, allowing them to run down those who trespass the pillar's area.
天界力量助长了这些凶猛野兽的侵略，使它们能够击倒那些擅闯星云柱区的人。
Certain species of fish gain the most peculiar abilities when it rains. They only like one thing about land-dwellers: their flesh.
某些鱼类在下雨时能获得最特殊的能力。它们只对陆地动物的一件东西感兴趣：那就是它们身上的肉。
Challenging the Old One's Army is rather simple. They are attracted to the power of the Eternia Crystals, and that can be used to bait them out.
挑战撒旦军队相当简单。埃特尼亚水晶的能量会将他们吸引到附近，因而可以用于将他们引诱出来。
Change your clothes in game at a Dresser or talk to the Stylist for a new hairdo.
游戏里，可以在梳妆台前换衣服，或者和发型师交谈来做个新发型。
Charges power as it is swung to smash enemies
可在挥动以粉碎敌人时补充能量
Cheating attempt detected: Add tile spam
检测到尝试作弊的操作：添加图格刷屏
检测到尝试作弊的操作：无效踢除
检测到尝试作弊的操作：液体刷屏
检测到尝试作弊的操作：射弹刷屏
Cheating attempt detected: Remove tile spam
检测到尝试作弊的操作：移除图格刷屏
Check out my dirt blocks; they are extra dirty.
Check out my goods; they have explosive prices!
看看我的商品；都是惊爆价！
Check out {PartyGirl}. Now that's a girl who can paint the town red!
查一查{PartyGirl}。她就是那个将整个镇子漆成红色的女孩！
Choose wisely, {PlayerName}, my commodities are volatile and my dark arts, mysterious.
认真选，{PlayerName}，我的商品不稳定，我的黑魔法很神秘。
Classic characters drop money on death.
经典角色死后掉落钱币。
Clearly I throw the most magical of parties.
显然，我办了最神奇的派对。
Clinging tightly to their parents and rarely seen, these miniature slimes will swarm anyone who harms their mother.
这些小史莱姆会紧紧黏住母体，很少看到它们单独行动，一旦它们的母体受到伤害，它们便会围攻对方。
关闭敌人生成速度滑块
Clouds are nice and soft, and you won't get hurt falling on them no matter how far you fall.
云上面既舒服又柔软，不管你跌多远，都不会受伤。
Cold Waters in the White Land
Cold ice infused with even colder Corruption results in bitterly-frozen terrors lurking beneath the treacherous icy caverns.
寒冰注入更寒冷的腐化之地后，导致危险的冰冷洞穴下潜伏着极端恐怖力量。
Combination hookah and coffee maker! Also makes julienne fries!
既能抽水烟，也能煮咖啡！还能炸切丝薯条！
Come and have a look! One pound fish! Very, very good! One pound fish!
看一看，瞧一瞧！一斤重的鱼！新鲜味美！一斤重的鱼！
Come back at night if you wish to enter.
你要想进来，那就晚上再来。
Come now, you didn't think I only celebrated on Christmas did you?
说吧，你认为我不只是在圣诞节庆祝，对吧？
同时控制九个召唤仆从。
Common footsoldiers of the Goblin Army, these foul creatures are good for little more than cannon fodder... and breaking down doors.
这些丑恶的生物是哥布林军队的普通步兵，它们不过就是炮灰…和替死鬼。
Complete a grand total of 200 quests for the angler.
Complete your 10th quest for the angler.
Complete your 1st quest for the angler.
Complete your 25th quest for the angler.
Complete your 50th quest for the angler.
Conceived from the bottomless malice of the Corruption, this mighty abyssal worm tunnels wildly to devour all in its path.
作为腐化之地深不可测的恶意孕育的产物，这个强大的深渊蠕虫疯狂地开挖通道，只为吞噬前方的一切。
Conjuring potent spears of dark magic, these elite demons are a serious threat to any who dare enter their abode.
这些精英恶魔能召唤出强大的黑魔法长矛，对任何胆敢进入他们地盘的人都是一个重大威胁。
Constructed long ago as a once thriving city, this dark and evil place now serves as the home for its cursed former inhabitants.
在很久以前，这个黑暗邪恶的地方曾是一座繁荣的城市，现在却成了其被诅咒的先住民的聚居地。
Consume a life fruit, which grows in the thick of subterranean jungle grass.
吃一个生命果，这种果子长在茂密的地下丛林草地中。
Contains a small amount of honey Can be poured out
含有少量蜂蜜 可以倒出
Contains a small amount of lava Can be poured out
含有少量熔岩 可以倒出
Contains a small amount of water Can be poured out
含有少量水 可以倒出
Contains an endless amount of lava Can be poured out
含有无限多的熔岩 可以倒出
Contains an endless amount of water Can be poured out
含有无限多的水 可以倒出
Converts Chlorophyte Bars into Shroomite Bars
将叶绿锭转化成蘑菇矿锭
将颜色代码复制到剪贴板
将玩家模板复制到剪贴板
Costs 10 Etherian Mana per use while defending an Eternia Crystal
在保卫埃特尼亚水晶时消耗10点天国魔力
Craft a drax or pickaxe axe using hallowed bars, and the souls of the three mechanical bosses.
用神圣锭和三个机械boss的灵魂制作斧钻或镐斧。
Craft a mana crystal out of fallen stars, and consume it.
使用坠落之星制作魔力水晶并使用它。
Craft a molten pickaxe using the hottest of materials.
使用最热的材料制作熔岩镐。
制作你的第一个工作台。
Creates a shadow beam that bounces off walls
产生会从墙上弹回的暗影光束
Creates and destroys biomes when sprayed Uses colored solution
喷射时生成和摧毁生物群落 使用彩色溶液
Creates grass on dirt Increases alchemy plant collection when used to gather
让泥土上长出草 用它收集时，可提高炼金植物收集速度
Creates measurement lines on screen for block placement
在屏幕上创建用于放置块的测量线
Creeping from the depths of the darkest swamps, this algae-dripped beast desires to drown away anyone in his path.
这种沾满海藻的野兽从最黑暗的沼泽深处爬出来，想要淹死任何挡住他去路的人。
Crimson altars can usually be found in the crimson. You will need to be near them to craft some items.
猩红祭坛通常出现在猩红之地。你必须靠近它们才能制作一些物品。
Critical to the lifecycle of the slime species, these oversized jiggling masses are often found carrying their young deep underground.
这些体型超大的晃动物质对史莱姆物种的生命周期至关重要，经常能看到它们把幼崽带到地下深处。
Crystal slimes on the purple spectrum grow wings much like their royal creator, becoming aerial threats.
紫色光谱上的水晶史莱姆会长出翅膀，很像它们的皇家创造者，成为空中的威胁。
Currency for trading with the Tavernkeep
用于与酒馆老板进行交易的货币
Cursed by the moonlight, these menacing lupines were once human. Now, they feast on their loved ones instinctively.
这些受到月光诅咒的凶恶狼人曾是人类。现在，他们本能地以自己心爱的人为食。
Cursed with undeath, the former inhabitants of the Dungeon roam endlessly through its halls, seeking a victim for their unending fury.
受到亡灵诅咒的前地牢民众，不停地游荡在地牢过道里，想找一个发泄无尽愤怒的对象。
DON'T MOVE. I DROPPED MY CONTACT.
别动。我的隐形眼镜掉了。
Damage taken reduced by 30%, repel enemies when taking damage
所受伤害减少30%，受伤时驱除敌人
Deals more damage to injured foes
对受伤的敌人造成更多伤害
Deals more damage to unhurt enemies
对未受伤的敌人造成更多伤害
Dear friends we are gathered here today to bid farewell... Oh, you'll be fine.
亲爱的朋友，今天我们集聚于此道声告别...喔，你会没事儿的。
Death and taxes, nothing more sure in life than that!
生活中最没有悬念的就是死亡和税收！
Defeat Duke Fishron, mutant terror of the sea.
打败猪龙鱼公爵，大海中的变异怪兽。
Defeat Golem, the stone-faced ritualistic idol of the lihzahrd tribe.
打败石巨人，丛林蜥蜴部落的石脸祭祀神像。
Defeat King Slime, the lord of all things slimy.
打败史莱姆王，所有黏滑生物的首领。
Defeat Plantera, the overgrown monstrosity of the jungle's depths.
打败世纪之花，蔓生在丛林深处的畸形怪花。
Defeat Queen Slime, giving the coup-de-grace to the sovereign of all that jiggles.
打败史莱姆皇后，她给予了所有摇摆不定的君主致命一击。
Defeat Skeletron, the cursed guardian of the dungeon.
打败骷髅王，地牢中被诅咒的守卫。
Defeat a Goblin Summoner, conjurers of the darkest flames.
打败哥布林召唤师，掌控黑暗烈焰的巫师。
Defeat a Mothership, overminds of the martian invaders.
打败母舰，火星入侵者的宿主。
Defeat an enemy by running it over with a minecart.
通过开矿车辗轧敌人来打败敌人。
打败泰拉瑞亚中的每个boss。
Defeat every type of slime there is!
Defeat my master, and I will grant you passage into the Dungeon.
打败我的主人，我就让你进入地牢。
Defeat the Ancient Cultist, fanatical leader of the dungeon coven.
打败远古信徒，地牢女巫团的狂热首领。
Defeat the Brain of Cthulhu, an enormous demon brain which haunts the creeping crimson.
打败克苏鲁之脑，这个巨大的恶魔大脑常常出现在毛骨茸然的猩红之地。
Defeat the Dreadnautilus, murderous mollusk lurking beneath the surface of the sanguine seas.
打败恐惧鹦鹉螺，这是潜伏在血染海面之下的残忍软体动物。
Defeat the Eater of Worlds, a massive worm who dwells in the corruption.
打败世界吞噬怪，居住在腐化之地的巨虫。
Defeat the Empress of Light, responsible for all those flashy lights and glitter.
打败光之女皇，她应为所有闪烁灯光和闪光负责。
Defeat the Eye of Cthulhu, an ocular menace who only appears at night.
打败克苏鲁之眼，只在夜间出没的危险眼球怪。
Defeat the Flying Dutchman, the sails of the plunderin' skies.
打败荷兰飞盗船，四处抢劫的船队。
Defeat the Ice Queen, wicked witch of the coldest nights.
打败冰雪女王，在最寒冷夜晚里出现的邪恶女巫。
Defeat the Pumpking, the spooky lord of hallow's eve.
打败南瓜王，万圣节前夕的恐怖领主。
Defeat the Queen Bee, the matriarch of the jungle hives.
打败蜂王，统治丛林蜂巢的女王。
Defeat the Wall of Flesh, the master and core of the world who arises after a great, burning sacrifice.
打败血肉墙，它是世界的主宰与核心，会在大型的燃烧献祭后出现。
Defeat the boss in The Underworld to change the World forever. Find a Guide Voodoo Doll and hurl it into the infernal lava to summon him.
打败地狱中的boss来永远地改变世界。找一个向导巫毒娃娃并将其丢到地狱的熔岩中来召唤他。
Defeat the current threat before you can use the pylon network!
先打败当前的威胁才能使用晶塔网络！
Defeat the four celestial towers of the moon.
打败月亮上的四个天塔。
Defeat the three nocturnal mechanical menaces: the Twins, the Destroyer, and Skeletron Prime.
打败三个夜间出没的危险机械怪物：双子魔眼、毁灭者和机械骷髅王。
Deliver headpats to the town pet.
去拍拍镇上宠物的脑袋。
Demon Altars and Crimson Altars can't be destroyed with a normal hammer. You have to pwn them.
用普通的锤子无法摧毁恶魔祭坛和猩红祭坛。你得用神锤。
Demon eyes become erratic under a Blood Moon, sometimes twisting together into a dripping cluster of cursed blood and eyeballs.
恶魔眼在血月下会发生奇怪变化，有时会扭曲成被诅咒的血和血淋淋的眼球。
Demonic altars can usually be found in the corruption. You will need to be near them to craft some items.
恶魔祭坛在腐化之地随处可见。你必须靠近它们才能制作一些物品。
Demons are the infantry of the underworld. Unlike their lesser brothers, they cast shadow magic rather than hell magic.
恶魔是地狱的步兵。与它们的小兄弟不同，恶魔使用的是暗影魔法，而非地狱魔法。
Dense-minded living stone formation. Awaits weary cavern dwellers to pound them into juicy rubble.
致密活岩地层。等待着疲惫的洞穴栖息者把它们捣碎成多汁的瓦砾。
Deserts are very dry, but the Sand Slime seems to have successfully adapted to the harsh conditions by becoming a pile of living sand.
沙漠环境很干燥，但这种沙史莱姆似乎已经成功适应了这种恶劣环境，还变成了一堆活沙。
Despite its menacing appearance, it is quite docile unless threatened or facing smaller prey. Fish are occasionally attracted to these.
尽管它外表凶恶，但除非受到威胁或面对较小的猎物，否则它是相当温顺的。鱼偶尔会被这些东西吸引。
Detecting overwhelming numbers of hostile life signatures in {BiomeName}.
在{BiomeName}中发现大量的敌对生命信号。
Did somebody say hurricane party!? I'll bring the batteries!
有人说要开飓风派对吗！？我去把电池拿来！
Did somebody steal my spell book again!?
又有人偷了我的魔法书吗！？
Did you even try to brush your hair today?
你今天到底有没有梳过头发？
Did you hit your head? Duh, {BiomeName} doesn't have fish!
你脑袋被驴踢了吗？咄，{BiomeName}没有鱼！
Did you know I have {AnglerCompletedQuestsCount} amazingly awesome fish now!? That's because as far as errand monkeys go, you're actually a bit useful!
你知道我已经钓到{AnglerCompletedQuestsCount}条超棒的鱼了吗！？那是因为在跑腿这件事上，你还是发挥了作用！

Did you know deep in the crimson, some of those creatures make this gross yellow stuff? I overheard a crazy story about a pool of it having melted together into a shape of a fish and it swims around and everything! Fetch it for me, so I can stick it in someone's toilet!
(Caught in Crimson)

你知道吗？在猩红之地的深处，一些生物在制作这种恶心的黄东西。 我听说一池黄东西融合成鱼形，然后开始游来游去，太离奇了！ 去抓一条给我，我可把它塞在别人的马桶里！
（抓捕位置：猩红之地）

Did you know there's magical islands that float up high in the sky? Bet you didn't! They say angels live in the sky, and I believe those angels have fins and gills and swim around! I believe you must catch one for me!
(Caught in Sky Lakes)

你知道吗，天空中漂浮着许多神奇的岛屿？你肯定不知道！他们说，天使住在天上，我相信这些天使都有鳍和鳃，在那游来游去！我相信你肯定能抓一个给我！
（抓捕位置：天湖）
Did you know you can order your Summons to attack a specific target? While holding a Summoning Weapon, Right Click an enemy!
你知道吗？你可以命令你的召唤物攻击特定目标。只需按住召唤武器，同时右键点击敌人即可！
Did you make sure your device was plugged in?
你确定你的设备插好电源了？
Did you say gold? I'll take that off of ya.
你是说黄金？我要把它抖出来。
Did you smash every mirror in WorldName!? You hapless fool, you are cursed beyond help!!
你把WorldName中的每面镜子都打碎了吗！？你这个倒霉的傻子，你被诅咒了，而且无可救药！！
Digs in a bigger area than a pickaxe Only digs up soft tiles 'Can you dig it?'
比镐的挖掘面积更大 只能挖掘软图格 “明白了吗？”
Disciplined and relentless, the Marching Bones unceasingly pursue their goals, sundering anything, or anyone, in their way.
行军骷髅纪律严整、冷酷无情，不断地追求自己的目标，会以自己的方式撕裂任何东西或任何人。
Discover a golden chest underground and take a peek at its contents.
发现一个地下金箱并偷看里面有什么。
Discover a large bee's hive deep in the jungle.
发现丛林深处的巨蜂蜂巢。
Discover and smash your first heart crystal underground.
发现并粉碎第一颗地下水晶之心。
Disease-like corruption is guaranteed to be present in your world.
像疾病一样的腐化肯定会出现在你的世界里。
Displays everything Allows you to return home at will
显示所有信息 允许你随意回家
Displays how fast the player is moving
Displays how many monsters have been killed
Displays movement speed, damage per second, and valuable ore
显示移动速度、每秒伤害和贵重矿石
Displays number of monsters, kill count, and rare creatures
显示怪物数量、杀敌数和稀有生物
Displays the most valuable ore around you
显示你周围最贵重的矿石
Displays the name of rare creatures around you
显示你周围稀有生物的名称
Displays the phase of the moon
Displays weather, moon phase, and fishing information
显示天气、月相和钓鱼信息
Distantly related to the common slime, the Toxic Sludge takes down its prey with potent toxins and a disarmingly toothy smile.
毒泥是普通史莱姆的远房亲戚，它会用致命的毒素和友好的露齿微笑拿下猎物。
Do Not Step on the Grass
Do You Want to Slay a Snowman?
Do battle against the Twins, the Destroyer, and Skeletron Prime simultaneously and emerge victorious.
同时与双子魔眼、毁灭者和机械骷髅王战斗并获胜。
Do be careful if traveling outside, it's storming quite hard!
如果要出门旅行，请多加注意，暴风雨现在很猛烈！
Do you know why we all carry around these spiked balls? Because I don't.
你知不知道为什么大家到哪儿都带着这些尖刺球？因为我不知道。
Do you party? Sometimes? Hm, okay then we can talk...
你开派对吗？有时开？好吧，那我们谈谈...
Do you see the lanterns? Now that you've saved our world, there are regular celebrations of your victory. Always such a beautiful sight!
看到灯笼了吗？现在你拯救了我们的世界，人们会定期举办活动来庆祝你的胜利。这些景象总是这么美好！
Do you think anyone would mind if I wired a cake with bulbs instead of candles?
你觉得会有人介意我把蛋糕上的蜡烛换成灯泡吗？
Do you think {Steampunker} has an extra of that gun? I know a witch that may want one.
你认为{Steampunker}有额外的枪吗？我知道有个女巫可能想要一把。
Do you want some magic candy? No? Ok.
想要一些魔法糖果吗？不想？好吧。
Does extra damage on a direct hit
会对直接命中造成额外伤害
Does it hurt when you do that? Don't do that.
你这么做的时候疼吗？别那么做。
Doll, we seriously need to fix those split ends.
美女，我们真的需要补一补那些开叉。
Don't be alarmed, it is just water. I hear certain species of fish can fly when it rains!
不要惊慌，只是雨水而已。我听说某些种类的鱼在下雨时会飞！
Don't bother with {Demolitionist}, I've got all you need right here.
别和{Demolitionist}浪费时间了。我这边有你要的一切。
Don't fall into lava without drinking an Obsidian Skin Potion first!
在没有喝黑曜石皮药水的情况下不要掉进熔岩中！
Don't get blown away by the strong gusts going on, and be wary of monsters which take advantage of them!
不要被大风刮走了，小心利用大风作恶的怪物！
Don't get carried away! Nature is throwing a party and wishes to sweep everybody - and everything - off their feet!
别被大风吹跑了！大自然正在举办一场派对，想要狂卷世间万物！
Don't go chasing water hazards, please stick to the fairways and greens that you're used to.
不要在水障碍区较量，请回到之前的球道和果岭。
Don't go exploring with scissors, they said. You won't get trapped in a spider's web, they said!
他们说，不要玩弄剪刀。他们说，你不会被困在蜘蛛网中！
Don't go outside right now while holding any of my products, you'll attract an unwanted dose of electrical power!
现在拿着我的产品，不要出去，否则你会引来不必要的电流！
Don't play golf in a cemetery. The grass grows too efficiently and makes the entire course rough.
不要在墓地里打高尔夫球。这里的草长得太快，使得整个球场都高低不平。
Don't shake a Snow Globe unless you want to summon the Frost Legion.
不要摇晃雪球，除非你想召唤雪人军团。
Don't spray and pray in the wind, buddy!
别在风里胡乱瞎射，哥们！
Don't you ever stop just to say 'Hi?'
你就不能只是停下来说句“嗨？”
Doo doo doo doo doo doo
Doomed to watch over the Dungeon, these mages teleport to confuse their prey, before striking them down with a blast of water.
这些注定要看守地牢的魔法师，会通过瞬移来迷惑猎物，然后用一股水流击倒猎物。
Double tap {0} to call an ancient storm to the cursor location
双击{0}可将远古风暴召唤到光标位置
Double tap {0} to toggle stealth, increasing ranged ability and reducing chance for enemies to target you but slowing movement speed
双击{0}切换隐身， 增加远程能力和降低敌人瞄准你的几率，但会减慢移动速度
Drop a lure in a pool of lava for a pre-fried haul!
将诱饵投入熔岩池，在鱼炸熟之前先钓点鱼！
在击败世纪之花之后掉落
Drops after defeating Skeletron but before Hardmode
在困难模式之前、击败骷髅王之后掉落
Drops after defeating any Mech Boss
Drops cursed flames on the ground
在困难模式下的血月期间掉落
Drops if the Empress of Light is only attacked during daytime
在光之女皇白天受到攻击时掉落
在困难模式下的地狱掉落
Drops in Underground Crimson or Corruption
在地下猩红之地或腐化之地掉落
Drops in early gameplay during Christmas
在圣诞节的游戏初期掉落
Drops in early gameplay during Halloween
在万圣节的游戏初期掉落
在困难模式下的腐化之地掉落
在困难模式下的猩红之地掉落
在困难模式下的沙漠掉落
在困难模式下的神圣之地掉落
在困难模式下的丛林掉落
在困难模式下的海洋掉落
在困难模式下的雪地掉落
Drops when the player is hurt
Dude, is it just me or is there like a million zombies out tonight?
哥们，今晚就只有我一个人，还是真的有无数僵尸出现？
Due to the heat of the underworld, these slimes have taken on the properties of lava. Slaying them is difficult and dangerous.
受地下高温环境的影响，这些史莱姆呈现出熔岩的特性。杀死它们既困难又危险。
Duke Fishron's nature as a form of chimera causes his offspring to emerge more shark-like, which he uses as minions in battle.
猪龙鱼公爵与生俱来的喀迈拉外形导致他的后代更像鲨鱼，而在战斗中，鲨鱼是他的仆从。
During a Blood Moon, Zombies can open doors.
在血月期间，僵尸能开门。
During a Blood Moon, the normally docile penguins become infested with the contagious growth of the Crimson.
在血月期间，平常温顺的企鹅也会受到猩红的感染。
During a Blood Moon, the normally docile penguins fall under the hostile influence of the Corruption.
在血月期间，平常温顺的企鹅也会受到腐化的敌意影响。
During a Solar Eclipse, be on the lookout for tons of strange and creepy monsters.
日食期间，小心大量涌出的奇异恐怖怪物。
During the most harrowing times, these apparitions float aimlessly through the depths to steal the life from those they envy.
在最痛苦的时刻，这些幽灵会漫无目的地漂浮在海底，从它们所嫉妒的人那里偷走生命。
Dwarves are naturally drawn to {BiomeName}, it's in our blood!
矮人族与生俱来就喜欢{BiomeName}，这是我们的天性！
Dynamite, my own special cure-all for what ails ya.
雷管，这是我特别为你准备的灵丹妙药，包治百病。
Earth elementals manifest through many forms by taking on the properties of different materials, such as this hardy granite.
大地精通过利用不同材料（例如这种坚硬的花岗岩）的特性来呈现多种外形。
Eccentric and rather snobby to a fault, the Dye Trader has expensive tastes. He is passionate about the materials used in the dyes he sells.
染料商古怪且势利到极点，他有着奢侈的爱好。他对自己销售的染料所用的材料很感兴趣。
Eek! I hate feeling worried about what will happen with all these people around!
呀！我讨厌因为周围有太多人而担心会发生什么！
Eek! This deathly atmosphere is ruining my perm!
呀！这种死气沉沉的天气会毁了我烫的头发！
Eek!! You have NO idea how much thunder hurts my sensitive ears.
呀！！你不知道雷声会对我敏感的耳朵造成多大的伤害。
Egads! I loathe these bothersome storms!
天呐！我讨厌这些该死的暴风雨！
Either you have style, or you get styled.
要么天生有型，要么变得有型。
Electricity? Don't be ludicrous! Nothing beats the power of steam!
电？别傻了！没有什么能比得上蒸汽的力量！
Elite Ray Gunners often ride these powerful alien creatures into battle as cavalry. If their mount dies, they will pursue on foot.
精英激光枪手经常会骑上这些强大的异星生物作战。如果坐骑死了，他们就会独自追击。
Elves that used to work for Santa, but have since been zombified. They don't complain much, so they are still pretty good helpers.
曾经为圣诞老人干活的精灵，但从那以后它们就变成了僵尸。它们不怎么抱怨，所以仍然是很得力的帮手。
Enables Echo Sight, showing hidden blocks
启用回声镜，显示隐藏物块
Enables solid blocks to be toggled on and off
使实心块能够打开和关闭
Enables your inner wingman 'Great for impersonating streamers!'
激发你内心的飞人 “非常适合冒充游戏主播！”
Endless dunes of sand reside here, scorched by the never-ending sun. Few things have adapted to survive in this environment.
这里有漫无边际的沙丘，被终日不落的太阳炙烤着。很少有生物能在这样的环境中存活下来。
Enemies are less likely to target you 5% increased damage and critical strike chance
敌人将不太可能瞄准你 伤害和暴击率各增加5%
Enemies are more likely to target you
Enemies aren't the only danger when exploring Underground. Watch out for traps too!
探索地下时，敌人并非唯一的危险。还要小心机关！
Enemies killed will drop more money
杀死的敌人会掉落更多的钱
Ensorcelled by the Crimson collective, this weapon moves about and chops its enemies by its own will.
这种武器在中了猩红部落的魔之后，可以随意移动并砍杀敌人。
Enter a misty graveyard filled with the surly dead.
进入笼罩着薄雾的墓地，墓地中到处都是粗鲁无礼的死人。
Equip a dye in every possible dye slot.
尽可能在每个染料栏中装备一种染料。
Equip armor in all three armor slots: head, chest, and feet.
在所有三个盔甲栏（头部、胸部和脚部）中装备盔甲。
Equip armor or vanity clothing in all three social slots.
在所有三种社交栏中装备盔甲或浮华服饰。
Error: This world has an invalid data!
错误：此世界有一个无效的数据！
Etheria has some dark places, but this takes the cake!
埃特尼亚有一些黑暗之地，但这里是最恐怖的！
Etherian Wyverns come in a variety of shapes and sizes, and behave more like bats than the majestic Wyverns of this world.
天国飞龙有各种各样的外形和大小，它们的行为更像蝙蝠，而不像这个世界威风凛凛的飞龙。
Etherian reptiles in service of the Old One's Army. Powerful beasts, they are capable of spewing deadly purple flames.
为撒旦军队效力的天国爬行动物。它们是一种强大的野兽，能喷出致命的紫色火焰。
Even for my standard, {BiomeName} is beyond miserable! Bah!
即使按照我的标准，{BiomeName}也非常糟糕！呸！
Even zombies can celebrate the holidays. Their festive outfits are just right, but their holiday spirit could use some work.
即使是僵尸也可以庆祝节日。他们的节日服装刚刚好，但他们的节日气氛还不够嗨。
就连{ArmsDealer}都想要我卖的东西！
Ever caught a strange fish and you aren't sure what to do with it? I hear a fishing master lives near the ocean who might have a use for those...
钓到了一条怪鱼，但不知道如何处置？！我听说海边住着一位捕鱼大师，也许他知道有什么用…
Ever heard of a barking fish?! I haven't, I'm just wondering if you did!
听说过会叫的鱼吗？！我没听说过，只是想知道你听说过没！
Ever seen the Goblin Scouts in the outer regions of the world? I wonder if an invasion is imminent...
看到世界外围的哥布林侦察兵了吗？不知道它们是不是要入侵…
Ever wanted an enchanted ring that turns rocks into slimes? Well neither did I.
想不想要一枚魔戒，可以把石头变成史莱姆？好吧，我也没不想要。
Every year, Krampus is tasked to punish all of the naughty children, but he's taken the day off to participate in this mayhem instead!
每年，坎卜斯都被派去惩罚所有淘气的孩子，但他却请了一天假来参与这场混乱！
Everyone in this town feels a bit off. I woke up to the clothier chewing on my foot last night.
镇上的每个人都感到有点古怪。昨晚，我醒来时，服装商正在啃我的脚。
Everyone said they like stacked cakes, so I installed smokestacks in mine
所有人都说他们喜欢吃多层蛋糕，所以我在我的蛋糕上安了烟囱
Everything I tinker up is made of metal. This current situation surely is a cause for rethinking that!
我修补的东西都是金属做的。面对这种现状，我们确实需要重新考虑了！
Everything's working correctly - oh, me? Yeah I'm fine!
一切正常 - 噢，我吗？我很好！
Everytime I see the color blue, it makes me depressed and lazy.
每次看到蓝色，我都感到郁闷和懒散。
Ew, it's so drab in {BiomeName}. How can you party in a place like this?
呃，{BiomeName}太没劲了。你怎么会在这样的地方开派对呢？
Ew, my hair, there's spider web all over it!
啊，我的头发，上面都是蜘蛛网！
Eww, I don't like {BiomeName}'s propensity for illness.
呃，我不喜欢{BiomeName}，这里容易让人生病。
Eww... What happened to your face?
Excellent! Someone's finally come by to take some of these maggots off my hands.
太好了！终于有人来拿掉我手上的蛆虫了。
Excessive health and happiness gush from your very being! You are a Godsend!!
你是一个非常健康和幸福的人！你真幸运！！
Exiled from the rest of goblinkind for being an intelligent pacifist, the Tinkerer sells tools for combining accessories into stronger versions.
这名工匠由于是一个聪明的和平主义者而遭到其他哥布林成员的驱逐，平常会出售用来组装配饰的工具。
Explodes into a swarm of bees
Explosives are da' bomb these days. Buy some now!
炸药如今十分火爆。马上买一些！
炸药很危险！ …不过很高效…
Exposed to dark rituals, this skull has begun floating around on its own, chasing the living. Its touch leaves its victims defenseless.
由于受到黑暗仪式的影响，这个骷髅头开始自己四处游荡，追逐活人。它能在受害者毫无防备的情况下抓住他们。
Exposure to the effects of ancient magicks flowing throughout the cracks of the world causes unusual rapid growths in giant worms.
由于受遍布世界裂缝的远古魔法的影响，巨型蠕虫出现了异常快速地生长。
Exuberant people tend to give me a headache, but somehow I actually like {NPCName}. I must be losing my mind!
精力旺盛的人往往会让我头疼，但不知怎么的，我却喜欢{NPCName}。我一定是疯了！
最爱的地方就是…{BiomeName}。真高兴。
Falling Stars sometimes appear at night. Collect 5 of them to craft a Mana Crystal you can use to increase your Mana.
有时夜晚会出现陨星。收集5颗陨星即可制作魔力水晶，你可以用它增加魔力值。
Falling sand you can safely watch
你可以安全观看的落沙
Familiar creatures of horror rapidly grip the lands this day, for no mere mortal can resist the evil of the blackened sun.
这一天，常见的恐怖生物迅速占领大地，因为没有凡灵能抵挡住日食带来的邪恶力量。
精致高尔夫球杆（挖起杆）
Fantabulous, wonderful friend! With this delicate specimen, I may mix the most amazing dyes {WorldName} has ever seen! You may take this one right away!
棒极了，我的好朋友！有了这精致的样本，我就能混合出从未在{WorldName}见过的极品染料！这瓶染料你现在就可以带走！
Fascinating. This appears to be a storage unit for broken and malfunctioning humans.
有意思。这好像是受伤和残障人类的储存装置。
Fast moving and erratic woodland creatures with greyish-brown fur. Got nuts?
快速移动和居无定所的林地生物，长有灰褐色的毛。有坚果吗？
Feel that draft coming through? It's wafting paint fumes all over the place.
感觉到那股气流了吗？到处都飘着油漆味。
Feeling up for the chill of winter? Use a Naughty Present to summon the Frost Moon!
准备好迎接寒冬了吗？使用调皮礼物来召唤霜月吧！
现在的感觉都是不真实的。
Filled to the brim with powerful ichor, these squid-like abominations spew their corrosive bio-fluid at their prey.
这些像乌贼的怪物体内满是强大的灵液，它们会向猎物喷出腐蚀性生物液体。
Finally, isolation from all these miserable peasants!
终于摆脱了这些讨厌的土包子！
Finally, some peace and quiet... as a bartender this is a luxury!
终于获得了片刻宁静…这对酒保来说是很奢侈的享受！
Find a cool new Material? Want to know what you can make? Check with your friendly neighborhood Guide!
找到酷炫的新材料了？想知道可以用来做什么吗？问问你附近友好的向导吧！
Fire a Bee Gun while wearing a full set of Bee Armor.
穿上一整套蜜蜂盔甲使用蜜蜂枪射击。
Fire a rainbow gun while riding on a unicorn.
骑着独角兽使用彩虹枪射击。
Fish do fly in ye rainy skies! I seen it with me own eye!
鱼在下雨天确实会飞起来！我亲眼见过！
Fishing is a fantastic source of crafting ingredients, accessories, and loot crates!
钓鱼是制作材料、配饰和战利品匣的绝佳来源！
Fishing line will never break, decreases chance of bait consumption, increases fishing power
钓鱼线永远都不会断，减少鱼饵消耗率，提高渔力
Fishing line will never break, decreases chance of bait consumption, increases fishing power Allows fishing in lava
钓鱼线永远都不会断，减少鱼饵消耗率，提高渔力 可以在熔岩中钓鱼
Flash flood warning. Error 404: Sandbags not found.
山洪暴发警告。错误404：未找到沙袋。
Flower petals will fall on your target for extra damage
花瓣将落到目标身上以造成额外伤害
Flowers are pleasant, hills are lovely, sand is warm. Every place is beautiful when you are among friends!
鲜花宜人，山丘可爱，沙滩温暖。和朋友待在一起时，无处不美！
Flowers grow on the grass you walk on
你走过的草地上会生长花朵
Fly a kite on a windy day.
Flying fish? I call that target practice!
For Capture the Gem. It drops when you die
适合夺取宝石。你死后掉落
For a nurse to move in, you might want to increase your maximum life.
要让护士搬进来，你需要提高自己的最大生命值。
For mysterious reasons, fish are known to mutate with other living things or even man-made objects. This one is especially violent.
由于一些神秘的原因，鱼会与其他生物甚至人造物体发生变异。这种鱼特别暴力。
For real!? I can't STAND being wet! It's gross.
真的！？我受不了浑身湿透的感觉！太恶心了。
For reasons beyond any meteorological explanation, slimy things are raining down from above by the buckets!
从天上倾泻而下的黏糊糊的东西！但这跟气象原因无关。
For some reason, being around {NPCName} makes me feel uneasy.
不知什么原因，和{NPCName}在一起会让我感到不安。
For starters, take a few of these Defender Medals, on the house! I've got some special defenses you can purchase, but only with Defender Medals!
新手可以在房屋上获得几个护卫奖章！你可以向我购买一些特殊防御道具，但你只能用护卫奖章来买！
For you I think we'll do something... low maintenance.
对于你，我想我们会弄个...容易保养的发型。
为财富和荣誉为战，孩子。
Fortune & Glory, Kid. (Far Greater Difficulty & Loot)
为财富和荣誉为战，孩子。（更大的难度和战利品）
Found in deep, dark caverns, these large beetles are sought out for the deep, blood-red secretions stored in their scaly exoskeleton.
这种大型甲虫常见于黑暗的洞穴深处，它们的特点是鳞状外骨骼中储存着深红色的分泌物。
Found in hives and nests all throughout the jungle, these tiny pests will swarm an adventurer at every turn.
在整个丛林的蜂巢和巢穴中都能看到这种小害虫，它们时时刻刻围绕在冒险家周围。
Frequent consumption of the Jungle's toxins and thorns has resulted in a slime covered in venomous spikes.
由于经常食用丛林毒素和荆棘，导致这种史莱姆浑身长有毒尖刺。
Freshly hatched from their eggs, larval antlions should not be underestimated. Though young, they are still very aggressive.
刚从卵中孵化出来的幼蚁狮不可等闲视之。虽然年幼，但它们也很有攻击性。
Fully researched items can be created freely
可以自由制作已完全研究的物品
Funny, when I look far enough into the crystal ball, this is where every customer ends up!
有意思，当我在一定距离看水晶球时，我能看到每位客人的结局！
Fury fills my being as abominations sprout from tainted earth - I speak of {NPCName}.
愤怒侵占了我的身体，就像邪恶的种子从污秽的大地中萌芽 - 我说的是{NPCName}。
Fuzzy wuzzy creatures that prefer safe, friendly locations.
喜欢安全、友好的地方的毛绒绒动物。
Game over man, game over! (Brutally hard, for the truly brave)
游戏结束，伙计，游戏结束！（残酷无情，致敬真正的勇者）
Gaze in the mirror to return home
Generates a very subtle glow which becomes more vibrant underwater
发出非常微弱的光芒，这种光芒在水下会变得更醒目
Getting this place to myself... I greatly appreciate it.
我把这个地方留给我自己…我太喜欢它了。
Ghouls cleansed by the Hallow possess a psychedelic saliva that renders their victims confused and distracted by visions and mirages.
被神圣之地净化的食尸鬼会分泌一种迷幻唾液，这种唾液能让受害者产生幻象，迷惑他们并分散他们的注意力。
Ghouls infested by the Crimson leak vile ichor from their mouths, weakening the defenses of their foes with every bite.
感染了猩红的食尸鬼，嘴里会流出脏脓水，被咬到的敌人的防御能力会被削弱。
Ghouls twisted by the Corruption ooze a nasty green bile that ignites on contact with skin, scorching their prey with cursed flames.
被腐化扭曲的食尸鬼会分泌出恶心的绿色胆汁，一接触皮肤就会燃烧，并用被诅咒的火焰灼烧猎物。
Gifted in the darkest of magics, she summons unfathomable shadowflame ghasts through a powerful hex.
她擅长最黑暗的魔法，能通过强大的魔法召唤高深莫测的暗影焰恶魂。
Give me a moment, my dear. I must secure my palette from the gusty gales!
给我一点时间，亲爱的。我必须确保我的调色板不受大风的影响！
Give your world a name! Choose carefully, you cannot change it later!
给你的世界起个名字吧！请谨慎选择，之后将无法更改！
Gives a chance to dodge attacks
Gives the user master yoyo skills
使主人掌握悠悠球技能
Glides elegantly along the surface of calm bodies of water searching for smaller bugs. Fish are occasionally attracted to these.
优雅地滑行在平静的水面，捕食小虫子。鱼偶尔会被它们所吸引。
Glistening squirrels who strayed too deep become ensorcelled with residual cursed energy retained in gemstones.
迷途太远的发光松鼠会被宝石中残留的诅咒能量所迷惑。
Glowing winged humanoid creatures the size of a butterfly. Attuned to the world around them, they excel at finding shiny things.
蝴蝶大小的类人生物，长有发光的翅膀。它们适应了周围的世界，擅长发现闪亮的东西。
Go tell all these miserable poor freeloaders to scram, I hate crowds.
去叫那些可怜的寄生虫滚开，我讨厌人群。
Go tell {ArmsDealer} to stop offering to pay me with ammo, I don't even own a gun.
告诉{ArmsDealer}别再用弹药抵缴税款了，我连把枪都没有。
Goblin parties are a lot like humans. They both have games like "Pin the Blame on the Human" er... I don't play that game at my parties.
哥布林的派对和人类的差不多。都有像“把责任推给人类”的游戏，呃...我从不在我的派对上玩这种游戏。
Goblin thieves aren't very good at their job. They can't even steal from an unlocked chest!
哥布林盗贼不太擅长偷东西。没上锁的箱子都不会偷！
Goblins are so cute! They are short, and have those little pointy ears, and they come in different colors!
哥布林真可爱！矮矮的小个子，长着尖尖的小耳朵，还有不同的颜色！
Goblins are surprisingly easy to anger. In fact, they could start a war over cloth!
哥布林太容易生气了。事实上，他们能为了一些破布发动战争！
Goblins don't normally need nice homes, but I'm not like most goblins.
哥布林一般对舒适的家没有要求，但我跟他们不一样。
Goldfish become grotesque, blood-sucking fiends of the Crimson when exposed to a Blood Moon.
当金鱼暴露在血月下时，它们会变成猩红畸形的嗜血恶魔。
Goldfish mutate and become violent when exposed to a Blood Moon, allowing the Corruption to take hold of them.
当金鱼暴露在血月下时，它们会发生变异并变得暴力，被腐化所控制。
Golf is a sport best enjoyed solo. I dislike my life not being the same way.
高尔夫是一项最好独自享受的运动。我不喜欢特立独行。
Golfing in the rain is less fun. Everything is all slippery!
在雨中打高尔夫球没那么有意思。到处都很滑！
Golly! What uncultured swine decided to break ground here?
天呐！这是哪个蠢猪在这里破土动工？
Got a torch? If so, won't you guide my sleigh tonight?!
有火把吗？如果有，今晚能不能帮我的雪橇带路？！
Got any spare bones for sale? I'm looking to replace my broken hip... again.
还有多余的骨头卖吗？我的髋骨断了，我想再...换一次。
Got myself a crying, talking, sleeping, walking, living idol!
给自己一个会哭、会说话、会睡觉、会走路的活神像！
Got some extra walls or platforms? You can turn them back into their original materials!
有多余的墙或平台？你可以把它们拆下来！
Gotta wonder who stuck a tome of infinite wisdom on a stick... <right> to cast a powerful tornado
想知道是谁把一本无限智慧巨著戳在一根棍子上... <right>以施放强大的龙卷风
Grants immunity to fire blocks Provides 7 seconds of immunity to lava
对火块免疫 7秒内对熔岩免疫
Grants immunity to fire blocks Reduces damage from touching lava
对火块免疫 减少因触碰熔岩而受到的伤害
Grants immunity to knockback Absorbs 25% of damage done to players on your team when above 25% life Enemies are more likely to target you
对击退免疫 当生命值高于25%时，吸收团队中玩家所受伤害的25% 敌人更有可能瞄准你
Grants immunity to knockback Grants immunity to fire blocks
对击退免疫 对火块免疫
Grants immunity to knockback Puts a shell around the owner when below 50% life that reduces damage by 25% Absorbs 25% of damage done to players on your team when above 25% life
对击退免疫 生命值低于50%时，在所有者周围放置可减少25%伤害的外壳 当生命值高于25%时，吸收团队中玩家所受伤害的25%
Grants immunity to knockback and fire blocks Grants immunity to most debuffs
对击退和火块免疫 对大部分减益免疫
Grants infinite wing and rocket boot flight Increases flight and jump mobility
带来无限翅翼和飞行火箭靴 提高飞行和跳跃能力
Grants invisibility and lowers the spawn rate of enemies
可隐身并降低敌人的生成速度
Grants slow fall in exchange for your feet
允许用双脚换取缓慢坠落的效果
Grants the ability to float in water
Grants the ability to swim Allows the ability to climb walls Increases jump speed and allows auto-jump Increases fall resistance 'It ain't easy being green'
可游泳 可爬墙 提高跳跃速度，并允许自动跳跃 增加坠落阻力 “做绿色生物可不容易”
Grants the ability to swim Greatly extends underwater breathing
可游泳 大大延长水下呼吸时间
Grants the ability to swim Increases jump speed and allows auto-jump Increases fall resistance
可游泳 提高跳跃速度，并允许自动跳跃 增加坠落阻力
Grants the ability to swim and greatly extends underwater breathing Generates a very subtle glow which becomes more vibrant underwater
可游泳并大大延长水下呼吸时间 发出非常微弱的光芒，这种光芒在水下会变得更醒目
Grants the ability to swim and greatly extends underwater breathing Provides extra mobility on ice Generates a very subtle glow which becomes more vibrant underwater
可游泳并大大延长水下呼吸时间 额外提供冰上移动能力 发出非常微弱的光芒，这种光芒在水下会变得更醒目
Grapple onto trees like a real squirrel! 'In the tree, part of the tree'
像真正的松鼠一样抓住树！ “抓住树，与树融为一体”
Grappling Hooks are invaluable tools for exploration. Try crafting them with Hooks or gems.
抓钩是非常宝贵的探险工具。试着用爪钩或宝石来制作它们。
Graveyards are spooky and very dangerous. I'd watch your step, kid.
墓地既阴森恐怖又危险。当心脚下，孩子。
Graveyards creep me out. I don't like practicing my swings on top of my family and friends.
墓地让我觉得毛骨悚然。我不想在埋葬我家人和朋友的土地上练习挥杆。
你周围的重力是扭曲的
Great Charybdis! What manner of wrath er curses have ye sent on us now!?
了不起的旋涡怪！这次恁要怎么降怒诅咒我们！？
Great job on fighting off the Old One's Army! But I'm sure we haven't seen the last of them, they didn't put up much of a fight this time.
你在击退撒旦军队时做得很棒！但我敢肯定他们还会再来，他们这次并未奋勇作战。
Great! Now my uniform is all wet. Stop staring!
这下好了！我的制服全湿了。看什么看！
Great! There goes another pump. When will the lightning stop frying my equipment?!
太好了！又有了一个泵。这闪电什么时候才会消停？！
Greater chance of fishing up a crate
大大延长水下呼吸时间
大大提高生命再生速度
Greatly increases life regen when not moving
不移动时，大大提高生命再生速度
Greatly increases life regeneration after striking an enemy
攻击敌人后大大提高生命再生速度
Greetings, {PlayerName}. Is there something I can help you with?
Gross, {BiomeName} is draining the color from my palettes!
真恶心，{BiomeName}正在吸取我调色板中的颜色！
了不起的格洛西角形风帽
Grrawr... home! far FAR! CANNOT TRACK.
Guaranteed to keep the vegetable supplies in check. Might possibly become a hat.
保证蔬菜的供应。可能会变成一顶帽子。
啊，{BiomeName}…我讨厌这里。糟糕的风景。
Gurrllll! You are my favorite gossip ever.
啊呼！你是我最喜欢的八婆。
Ha har! Rain!? Jus' another day fer a pirate.
哈哈！下雨！？对海盗来说是家常便饭。
Half-shark, half-goblin, completely murderous! One of the numerous reasons to just stay home during a Blood Moon.
半鲨鱼，半哥布林，极其残暴！也是血月期间要待在家的众多原因之一。
Hallowed slimes consolidated into a haughty, crushing force adorned in dazzling crystals. She is rumored to grow wings.
神圣史莱姆合并成了一种高傲的粉碎性力量，这种力量佩戴着闪耀的水晶。传说她会长出翅膀。
Hammer end piece to change bumper style Hammer intersections to change direction
锤击轨道尾片可改变缓冲方式 锤击交叉点可改变方向
Hang on to any bombs you might find. A demolitionist may want to have a look at them.
拿好你能够找到的任何炸弹。爆破专家也许想瞧一瞧。
Hang up any banners you earn from defeating foes, as they will help you in future combat with that creature.
挂起你从手下败将那里获得的旗帜，当你未来再跟他们开战时，这些旗帜将帮到你。
Har Har! Melikes how {NPCName} brings ye best bottle o' rum.
哈哈！俺喜欢{NPCName}给俺带来上等的朗姆酒。
硬核角色死后无法复活。
Hardee harr... the sea be a pirate's graveyard! Ye landlubbers waste ye time!
哎哟喂…大海就是海盗的最后归宿！恁这些旱鸭子别白费力气了！
Hardy har har, matey, {BiomeName} is me true home!
哈哈，老铁，{BiomeName}才是我真正的家！
Hardy to extremely cold temperatures, these beetles contain a desired bluish fluid which can be used to dye textiles.
这些甲虫耐寒性极强，它们体内有一种蓝色液体，可以用来给纺织品染色。
Harmlessly scuttles around the desert looking for food. Fish are barely attracted to these.
没有恶意地在沙漠中寻找食物。鱼几乎不会被它们所吸引。
Harnesses the power of undying flames
Harnessing the hidden power of the glowing mushroom, the Truffle forges weapons and tools exclusively in his mushroom home.
松露人利用发光蘑菇的隐藏力量，专门在他的蘑菇之家制作武器和工具。
Has a chance to confuse 'Find your inner pieces'
有机会造成混乱 “找到你内心的碎片”
Has a chance to create illusions and dodge an attack Temporarily increase critical chance after dodge May confuse nearby enemies after being struck
有机会制造幻象并躲避攻击 躲避后暂时增加暴击率 可使附近被击中的敌人陷入混乱
Has a chance to poison enemies
Has a chance to record songs
Hate to say it, but I rather hate all the foot traffic here.
我不想这么说，但我确实讨厌这里这么多的人流量。
Hate to say it, but I rather hate overcrowded quarters.
我不想这么说，但我确实很讨厌拥挤的住处。
Have all possible town NPCs living in your world.
让所有可以的城镇NPC住在你的世界里。
Have some NPCs perished? Don't worry, they'll be back in the morning.
一些NPC消失了吗？别担心，他们明天早上就会回来。
Have something on the Map to show a friend? Double click on the Map to ping a location for everyone to see!
要与好友分享地图上的东西？双击地图，即可将位置发送给所有人看！
Have you a garden of four-leaf clovers? You are bursting with essences of great fortune!
你种了一整个花园的四叶草吗？你拥有了好运的精髓！
Have you ever seen beautiful lanterns floating across the night sky? The people of this world celebrate your victories, wishing you good fortune.
你见过夜空中飘起美丽的灯笼吗？这个世界的人们用这种方式来庆祝你的胜利，祝你好运。
Have you seen Chith...Shith.. Chat... The big eye?
你有没有看到克斯...克史...克赛...那个大眼睛？
Have you seen an ogre yet? I want to ride on the back of one!
你见过食人魔吗？我想骑在一个食人魔的背上！
Have you seen any Meburs around here?
你在这附近见过任何Mebur吗？
Have you seen that old man pacing around the dungeon? He looks troubled.
看到那个在地牢周围转来转去的老人没？他看上去遇到麻烦了。
Have you seen the Wyverns soaring high up in the clouds? If only I could fly like that...
你见过飞龙在云端翱翔吗？要是我能那样飞就好了…
Have you seen the old man walking around the dungeon? He doesn't look well at all...
你看到那个在地牢周围转来转去的老人没？他看起来不太好...
Have you tried using purification powder on the crimstone of the crimson?
你试过对猩红之地的猩红石使用净化粉吗？
Have you tried using purification powder on the ebonstone of the corruption?
你有没有试过对腐化之地的黑檀石使用净化粉？
Having {NPCName} around makes me feel at ease, as though a curse was finally lifted from me.
身边有{NPCName}让我感到轻松自在，就像终于摆脱了诅咒一样。
He answers to a higher authority
He's got a big stick and he doesn't know how to use it
他有一根大棒，但不知道怎么用它
Heard a rumor that some clouds are literally out to get you! Show 'em who's boss with one of my guns!
传言有些云真的要来抓你了！用我的枪，让它们尝尝你的厉害！
Heeellllllo Terraria enthusiasts! 'Great for chilling like a streamer!'
你…好，泰拉瑞亚的热心人！ “非常适合像游戏主播之类的人休息！”
Heh heh, you shoulda seen the look on {Dryad}'s face when I stuck that piranha tooth in the chair!
嘿嘿，你真该看看当我把食人鱼的牙齿刺进椅子之后，{Dryad}的表情！
Hello sir, I'm {Stylist}, and I'll be your barber today.
你好，先生，我是{Stylist}，今天我来为你理发。
Hello there! I'm far from my temporary home!
你好！我已经远离了我临时的家！
Here you are again, taking all my coin! Just grab it and begone from my sight!
给你，再次拿走我所有的钱币！抓好，赶紧从我视野里消失！
Here's your cut of the taxes that I've taken from our surplus population!
这是我从其余人那儿收缴的税款的抽成！
Hey stupid, the fish here in {BiomeName} are all trying to kill me!
嘿，笨蛋，{BiomeName}的鱼都想杀了我！
Hey! Just the sacrifi- I mean competent fishing master that I've been looking for!
嘿！你就是我一直在找的牺...我是说称职的钓鱼大师！
Hey! Watch it! I'm setting up traps for my biggest prank ever! No one will see it coming! Don't you dare tell anyone!
嘿！当心！我设了许多机关，用来实施史上最大的恶作剧！没人会发觉！你胆敢告诉任何人！
Hey, I can't do what I do with so many people watchin' me.
嘿，我不习惯这么多人盯着我。
Hey, I dislike the lack of social distancing here.
嘿，我不喜欢这里不保持社交距离。
Hey, buddy, do you know where any deathweed is? Oh, no reason; just wondering, is all.
嗨，兄弟，你知道哪儿有死亡草吗？哦，没有原因，问问而已。
Hey, could you sign this Griefing Waiver?
喂，你能签了这份不恶意捣乱的承诺书吗？
Hey, does your hat need a motor? I think I have a motor that would fit exactly in that hat.
嗨，需要为你那顶帽子配个马达吗？我想我有一个马达和那顶帽子很配。
Hey, has {ArmsDealer} mentioned needing to go to the doctor for any reason? Just wondering.
嗨，{ArmsDealer}有没有提过为什么要去看医生？只是好奇罢了。
Hey, have you seen a clown around?
你有没有在附近看到一个小丑？
Hey, this ain't a movie, pal. Ammo is extra.
嘿，这可不是演电影，兄弟。弹药得另外购买。
Hey, this house is secure, right? Right? {PlayerName}?
这个房屋安全吧？对不对？{PlayerName}？
Hey, watch where you're going! I was over there a little while ago!
嗨，当心脚下！我刚刚走过！
Hey, {PlayerName}, did you just come from {GoblinTinkerer}'s? Did he say anything about me by chance?
嗨，{PlayerName}，你是不是刚刚从{GoblinTinkerer}家过来？他有没有提到过我？
Hey...what's {Mechanic} up to? Have you...have you talked to her, by chance?
嗨...{Mechanic}在做什么？你有没有...你有没有和她谈过？
Higher ranking demons can possess a voodoo doll of the chosen one, whose soul is linked with the world's guardian himself.
等级更高的恶魔可以拥有巫毒娃娃，它的灵魂与世界的守卫者本身相连。
His origins unknown, this creepy fiend balances himself on a ball while hurling explosive destruction at everything around him.
他的出身不得而知，但这个令人毛骨悚然的恶魔，在向周围投掷爆炸物时却把控得很好。
Hitting enemies will sometimes drop extra coins
击中敌人有时会掉落额外的钱币
Hmm, you look like you could use an Angel Statue! They slice, and dice, and make everything nice!
嗯，看上去你会使用天使雕像！他们切片，又切丁，让一切都如此美好！
Hmm, {BiomeName} is a terrible place for business, I don't like it.
嗯，{BiomeName}是一个很不适合做生意的地方，我不喜欢这里。
Hmm... do you think {Pirate} will be able to redeem some of his old seafaring friends, as well?
嗯...你觉得{Pirate}还能救赎他的一些旧同伙吗？
Hmm? Nothing special today... just kidding! It's party time, and then it's after party time!
嗯？今天没什么特别的…逗你玩呢！现在是派对时间！接下来就是派对后时间！
Ho Ho Ho! On this not-so-silent night, festive beings wish to shower the world with gifts of blood and carnage.
嚯嚯嚯！在这个不那么寂静的夜晚，喜庆生物希望掀起一场血腥屠杀。
Ho ho ho! Just me and my elves, a perfect place for my remote workshop.
哈哈哈！只有我和我的精灵们，非常适合做我的远程作坊。
Ho ho ho! Wait, look at this place... did I come two months too early!?
哈哈哈！等等，瞧这地方，我是不是早来了俩月！？
Ho ho ho, and a bottle of... Egg Nog!
Ho ho ho, {NPCName} is most certainly on top of the nice list.
嗬嗬嗬，{NPCName}无疑是头号乖乖仔。
Ho ho! My reindeer will fly at mach speeds, tonight!
哈哈！今晚，我的驯鹿将以超快的速度飞行！
Hoist the sails, ye curs! We pirates startin' a leg of a race! Yarharharr!
扬起帆来，狗东西！俺们海盗还没有发力呢！呀哈哈！
按住UP可以够到更高的地方
Hold on, I've almost got wifi going down here.
等一下，我在这下面快要接收到wifi了。
Hold on, I've got some cartoon bandages around here somewhere.
坚持住，我已经在附近找到卡通绷带了。
Hold onto your bonnet, there's a real breeze out today.
抓紧你的帽子，今天外面的风可不小。

Hold {InputTrigger_RadialQuickbar} and {InputTrigger_RadialHotbar} to bring up the Radial Quickbar and Radial Hotbar menus. These will allow you to quickly access potions, mounts, and the items in your hotbar.
按住{InputTrigger_RadialQuickbar}和{InputTrigger_RadialHotbar}可以调出径向快捷栏和径向热键栏菜单。通过这两个菜单可以快速访问药水、坐骑和热键栏中的物品。

Hold {InputTrigger_SmartSelect} to use Auto Select, a versatile feature that adapts to your environment. It will allow you to automatically hold your Torches in dark caves, Glowsticks when underwater, or even select the right tool for breaking something.
按住{InputTrigger_SmartSelect}可使用“自动选择”功能，这是一项能适应环境的通用功能。在黑暗洞穴时，它会自动为你提供火把；在水下时，自动为你提供荧光棒；甚至帮你选择打破东西所需的合适工具。
Holding this may attract unwanted attention
持此物可能会引起不必要的注意
Hotbar Scroll Time To Radial: Off
快捷键径向滚动时间：关
Hotbar Scroll Time To Radial: On
快捷键径向滚动时间：开
Hovers when thrown Works when wet
被扔出后会盘旋 弄湿后有效
How can I fish out there?! Are you crazy, or just stupid!?
我怎么能在那里钓鱼呢？！你是疯还是傻！？
How can a man of my riches have no home? Preposterous!
像我这么富有的人怎么会没有家呢？真是荒谬！
How come {Bartender} won't sell me any ale? I want to try some! What a grouch!
{Bartender}为什么一点麦芽酒都不卖给我？我想尝一尝！真是个满腹牢骚的人！
How did I get here!? These are not my friends!
我怎么会在这里！？这些都不是我的朋友！
How do you defeat a mini Minotaur?
你如何打败迷你牛头怪？
How do you do, fellow humans?
How dreary! Lighten the mood with 99 torches!
好无聊！用99支火把来放松一下心情吧！
Huge blast radius. Will destroy tiles
爆破半径巨大。会摧毁图格
Huge blast radius. Will not destroy tiles
爆破半径巨大。不会摧毁图格
Huh? How did I get here? The last thing I remember was a portal opening up in front of me...
嗯？我怎么到这里了？我记得的最后一件事是有个传送门在我面前打开...
Huh? You eat WHAT for breakfast?
Huh?! No, {Stylist} didn't dye my hair. It's naturally this color! It was like, dark brown before I was bitten, though!
哈？！不，{Stylist}没给我的毛发染色。这是天然的颜色！不过在被咬之前，我的头发是深棕色的！
Huh?! Where is the sun? Why is it so dark? It must be a Solar Eclipse!
嗯？！太阳去哪了？为什么这么黑？一定是发生日食了！
Humans are a lot taller than goblins. When it floods, we are always in big trouble!
人类比哥布林高大得多。所以涨洪水时，总是会给我们带来很大的麻烦！
Humbug! Someone tried to tell me they saw a fish walking on land. Who do they take ME for?!
一派胡言！有人跟我说，他们看见一条鱼在陆地上行走。把我当傻子吗？！
Hun, I don't like it here in {BiomeName}, how can anyone show off their hair when it's so cold?
哼，我不喜欢呆在{BiomeName}，天这么冷，怎么能秀头发呢？
Hurling bombs with reckless abandon, these sappers serve the Old One's Army with maniacal passion.
这些工兵疯狂地投下炸弹，狂热地为撒旦军队卖命。
Hurry up and listen! I need you to catch something for me right now!
快点，听着！我要你马上去抓个东西给我！
I LOVE being surrounded by others, but I wish not to see them so unhappy with overcrowding.
我非常喜欢大家围绕在我身旁，但我不希望看到他们因为过分拥挤而不满。
I absolutely cannot stand having so many people living around me, I can't focus.
我完全忍受不了这么多人住在我周围，我无法集中精力。
