I absolutely love having my own place to be myself! This is like, totally awesome!
我渴望有一个属于我自己的地方！那样就太棒了！
I absolutely love it here! Are you surprised? Who thought I wouldn't like {BiomeName}?
我非常喜欢这里！你感到意外吗？谁认为我会不喜欢{BiomeName}？
I accidentally dislocated {NPCName}'s shoulder during a check-up, and she apologized to ME for the inconvenience!
我在检查期间不小心让{NPCName}肩膀脱臼了，她却因为给我造成不便而道歉！
I ain't got a place to stay!
I always go fishing in the rain! It's why I wear this hat!
我总是在雨中钓鱼！所以我才会戴这顶帽子！
I am as giddy as a drunken man! I love this weather!
我完全沉浸其中！我喜欢这种天气！
I am here to give you advice on what to do next. It is recommended that you talk with me anytime you get stuck.
我的工作是为你接下来的任务提供建议。如果遇到困难，建议你随时问我。
考虑到这一点，我很高兴。
I am severely offended by my surroundings - {BiomeName} is my mortal enemy!
我被我周围的一切深深地冒犯了 - {BiomeName}是我的死敌！
I am so fabulously grateful for my subjects!
我真是太感谢我的臣民了！
I am too far from home.

I bet you're not brave enough to find the Eater of Plankton. A corrupt fish that was mutated from a severed piece of the Eater of Worlds itself! Capture it and bring it to me, and prove to me you're not a wuss!
(Caught in Corruption)

你肯定不敢去找浮游噬鱼。 它是由世界吞噬怪的残块变异而来的腐化鱼！ 把它抓来给我，证明你不是胆小鬼！
（抓捕位置：腐化之地）
I bring you the richest colors in exchange for your riches!
我带给你最丰富的色彩，以换取你的财富！
I built myself a taste mechanism, so I can drink some ale!
我为自己建立了品尝机制，这样就能喝一点麦芽酒！
I can handle the corruption, but the vile air of death in this location wilts the flower in my hair.
我受得了腐化之地，但这个地方弥漫的死亡恶臭让我头发上的花朵都蔫了。
I can see your future now... You will buy a lot of items from me!
我现在能看到你的未来...你会从我这里买很多物品！
I can't believe they tied me up and left me here just for pointing out that they weren't going east!
我说他们走的方向不是东边，我们就把我捆起来扔在这里了！
I can't bring anyone back from the dead, so don't ask!
我不能让任何人起死回生，所以别问了！
I can't decide what I like more: parties, or after-parties.
我不知道我是更喜欢派对还是庆功派对。
I can't do anymore for you without plastic surgery.
我能为你做的就只有整容了。
I can't even touch {NPCName}'s hair, it's too perfect!
我甚至都不敢碰{NPCName}的头发，简直太完美了！
I can't explain it. I have like, a thing for {NPCName}. Is it because of the tail?
我也说不清，但我就是非常喜欢{NPCName}。是因为它的尾巴吗？
I can't just go back to the north pole when I please, ho ho ho! Think you can spot me a temporary house?
我不能随心所欲地回到北极，哈哈哈！你能帮我找一间临时的房子吗？
I can't quite place it, but I find {NPCName} fascinating.
我不记得在哪里见过{NPCName}，但我觉得他很迷人。
I can't stand {BiomeName}, my fuses have trouble igniting here!
我受不了{BiomeName}了，我的保险丝在这里点不了火！
I cannot fathom existing elsewhere, {BiomeName} is the center of my voodoo spirits.
我不知道其他地方是什么情况，但{BiomeName}是我巫毒幽灵的中心。
I cannot let you enter until you free me of my curse.
如果你不解除我的诅咒，我是不会让你进的。
I collected critters like you once, then I took a cursed fox bite to the knee!
我以前也像你一样养小动物，后来被一只受诅咒的狐狸咬到了膝盖！
I could have sworn my house was here somewhere...
我可以发誓，我的房子就在这附近…
I could use a flat to bide in.
I detect eerie vibes from {NPCName}, as if they contain dark secrets. I don't like the feeling.
我从{NPCName}身上发现了怪异之处，仿佛他们掌握了黑暗秘密。我不喜欢这种感觉。
I dinnae like being surrounded by folk, much.
I dislike being around {NPCName}. Makes me feel uneasy.
我不喜欢和{NPCName}在一起。我会感到不安。
I dislike how crowded I am.
I dislike the number of people here, for safety reasons, of course...
我不喜欢这里有这么多人，当然是出于安全考虑…
I dislike the practices of {NPCName}. True healing cannot come from metal and glass.
我不喜欢{NPCName}的做法。真正的治疗不是用金属和玻璃。
I dislike {BiomeName}, magic does not flow well in a place like this.
我不喜欢{BiomeName}，魔法在这样的地方不容易施展开来。
I dislike {NPCName}, too frugal and doesn't ever buy my things.
我不喜欢{NPCName}，这个人太节俭了，从来不买我的东西。
I do not perform shock therapy, just go stand outside under a tree!
我不做电击疗法，直接站在外面的树下吧！
I don't appreciate the way you're looking at me. I am WORKING right now.
我不喜欢你这样看着我。我在工作呢。
I don't belong in {BiomeName}, I would not survive!
我在{BiomeName}感觉格格不入，我活不下去了！
I don't have a mommy or a daddy, but I have a lot of fish! It's close enough!
我没有妈妈，也没有爸爸，但我有很多鱼！这就够了！
I don't have a place to live, did I blow up my last one?
我没有地方可住，我把我最后的住处给炸了吗？
I don't have a place to set up shop, friend.
I don't have a place to stay, pal!
I don't have anything for you to do right now.
现在没有任务要分配给你。
I don't know the 'Truffle Shuffle,' so stop asking!
我不知道什么是“肚皮波浪”，所以别问了！

I don't know what's worse, a bone fish or a bone fish with HANDS. This Fish-o-Tron deep in the caverns really freaks me out! I think it's possessed by the same evil spirits that possessed that old man by the dungeon! I double duck dare you to go catch it!
(Caught in Caverns)

我不知道哪种情况更惨：骷髅鱼还是长手的骷髅鱼。这条深藏在洞穴中的德隆鱼真把我吓了一跳！ 我认为在通过地牢抓住那个老男人的幽魂手中！ 我给你两个胆，你去把它抓来给我！
（抓捕位置：洞穴）
I don't like all these people around makin' noise when I'm painting.
我不喜欢在我刷漆的时候这些人在边上制造噪音。
I don't like all these people scaring my fish, so make them go away!
我不想这些人吓到我的鱼，所以把他们赶走！
I don't like doin' business this far from home.
我不喜欢在离家这么远的地方做生意。
I don't like how cruel {NPCName} is!
I don't like that {NPCName} has no respect for other beings.
我不喜欢{NPCName}不尊重其他生物。
I don't like this anxiety I'm getting from the people gathering around me.
我不喜欢周围的人太多而给我带来的焦虑。
I don't like {BiomeName}, it is filled with loud, annoying pests that get in the way of my work!
我不喜欢{BiomeName}，那里充满了吵闹、讨厌的害虫，会妨碍我的工作！
I don't like {BiomeName}, it reminds me of a traumatic experience!
我不喜欢{BiomeName}，这里会勾起我的痛苦回忆！
I don't like {NPCName} that much, kinda weirds me out.
我不太喜欢{NPCName}，这个人有点奇怪。
I don't really like that {NPCName} won't leave me alone!
我真的不喜欢{NPCName}缠着我不放！
I don't really like {BiomeName}. There's little to accomplish.
我不太喜欢{BiomeName}。这里没什么可做的。
I don't really like {NPCName} bein' on my turf, ya know?
我真的不喜欢{NPCName}在我的地盘上，你知道吗？
I don't refund for "buyer's remorse..." Or for any other reason, really.
我不会因“买家后悔...”而退款也不会因任何其它原因退款，不骗你。
I don't see why we can't just blow up those portals.
我不明白为什么我们不能干脆炸掉这些传送门。
I don't think I can sell goods to monsters in {BiomeName}!
我觉得我不可能把商品卖给{BiomeName}的怪物！
I don't think I like your tone.
我不喜欢你说话的口气。
I don't think I'm comfortable being so far away from my home.
I don't want you to buy my stuff. I want you to want to buy my stuff, ok?
我不想让你买我的东西。我只是想让你想买我的东西，好吗？
I don't work for free you know.
你知道的，我干活得收钱。
I especially think it's unwise to hang around a place like {BiomeName}.
我尤其认为在{BiomeName}这样的地方闲逛是不明智的。
I feel a terrible fate surrounding you! You should just stay in bed today!
我感觉你被噩运缠上了！你今天就躺床上吧！
I feel extremely uncomfortable in {BiomeName}, as if creeping eyes are always watching me.
在{BiomeName}，我感觉很不自在，好像总有鬼鬼祟祟的眼睛在盯着我。
I feel like I understand {NPCName} better than anyone else.
我觉得我比任何人都了解{NPCName}。
I feel like an evil presence is watching me.
我觉着像是有个邪恶的东西在看着我。
I feel like {Truffle} is a bit misunderstood, he really is a fun guy.
我觉得{Truffle}被人误会了，他真的是个好人。
I feel right at home, like I am one with {BiomeName} biome.
我觉得很自在，就像我是{BiomeName}生物群落的一员一样。
I feel so out of place without a bar to polish.
没有酒吧让我来打理，我感觉很不自在。

I finally found a jungle cat that likes water! I think it's because it's also part fish. I don't know why this happened, and I don't want to know. I just want it in my hands, and make it snappy!
(Caught in Jungle Surface)

我终于找到一只喜欢水的丛林猫！我想这是因为它还有鱼的天性。 我不知道为什么会这样，我也不想知道。 我只是希望它能到我手里，你得快点！
（抓捕位置：丛林地表）

I found this spectacular place draped in giant glowing mushrooms! Everything was blue! I was picking some of the mushrooms I found next to a glistening blue lake, when one of the mushrooms snapped at me and swam away! I want to give it a taste of its own medicine, and give it a good chompin'! What I mean is, you gotta get it for me!
(Caught in Glowing Mushroom Fields)

我在巨大的发光蘑菇中发现了这个惊人的地方！一切都是蓝的！我正在采摘蓝光湖畔的一些蘑菇，其中一只蘑菇突然咬了我一口，然后游走了！我想以其人之道还治其人之身，并狂咬他一顿！我的意思是，你去把它弄回来给我！
（抓捕位置：发光蘑菇地）
I get a little anxious around a lot of people. I like, don't want that.
我在很多人面前会有点焦虑。我不喜欢这种场面。
I go where winds take me, but this is ridiculous!
我会追随风的脚步，但这太荒谬了！
I hate Blood Moons! I stay up all night because of all the scary noises!
我恨血月！各种可怕的噪音害我一整夜都没睡！
I hate all these strangers - they scared all my fish half to death!
我讨厌这些陌生人，他们把我的鱼都吓得半死！
I hate how crowded I am.
I hate how many people hang around, but none of them buy anything!
我讨厌那么多人在这里晃悠，但没有一个人买东西！
I hate how {NPCName} always tries to shut down my after-parties. What a grump!
我讨厌{NPCName}总是千方百计地破坏我的庆功派对。真是让人窝火！
I hate how {NPCName} doesn't know how to treat a woman!
我讨厌{NPCName}不知道如何对待女人！
I hate it. So many people... I... I'm not going to get eaten, right?
我讨厌这样。这么多人…我…我不会被吃掉吧？
I hate noisy crowds, when will I get some peace and quiet?
我讨厌嘈杂的人群，我什么时候才能得到安宁？
I hate not having a home.
I hate overcrowding. I prefer the open world!
我讨厌拥挤。我更喜欢开阔的地方！
I hate people who don't believe in me! For example, {NPCName}, the naughtiest I've ever known!
我讨厌不相信我的人。比如{NPCName}，这是我见过的最淘气的家伙！
I hate places like this. I can't kill what's already dead!
我讨厌这样的地方。早已死了还咋杀！
I hate that {NPCName} is around. The world is fine the way it was made!
我讨厌{NPCName}在附近。这个世界本来就是很美好的！
I hate {BiomeName} - hunting isn't quite as fun if you're the prey!
我讨厌{BiomeName} - 如果你是猎物，狩猎对你来说就没那么有意思了！
I hate {BiomeName}, I cannot put merge these trinkets into one piece if I'm fighting to keep myself that way!
我讨厌{BiomeName}，如果我一直保持这种状态，我就没法合并这些小饰品了！
I hate {BiomeName}, the terrors here can tear a person apart in moments.
我讨厌{BiomeName}，这里的恐怖力量瞬间就能把人撕成碎片。
I hate {NPCName} and I don't know why.
我讨厌{NPCName}，我也不知道为什么。
I hate {NPCName}'s destructive habits towards nature!
我讨厌{NPCName}习惯性地破坏大自然！
I hate {NPCName}'s greedy attitude. It's pretty unnecessary in a world like this.
我讨厌{NPCName}贪婪的态度。在这样的世界里，这是完全没有必要的。
I hate {NPCName}, and anyone else who treats me like a child!
我讨厌{NPCName}，还有任何把我当小孩看的人！
I hate {NPCName}, how can you literally NOT grow hair?
我讨厌{NPCName}，你怎么能不长头发呢？
I have a request for you! No, I don't care that there's a zombie apocalypse right now!
我有个任务给你！不，现在我才不管什么僵尸大灾难呢！
I have enough fish! I don't need your help right now!
我的鱼够了！我现在不需要你的帮助！
I have no problem cleaning up ears and eyebrows, but I draw the line at nose hair.
修剪发髻和眉毛可以，但是不能修剪鼻毛。
I have noooo idea how I got here, but it's mega rad.
我不知道我是怎么来到这里的，但这感觉太棒了。
I have strayed far from my calm place.
我已经远离了我那个宁静的地方。
I have wandered beyond the signal range of my datacenter.
我已经超出了数据中心的信号范围。
I haven't even used the last fish you gave me. I don't need another.
你上次给我的鱼还没用呢。我不需要了。
I hear a race of lizardmen live in the jungle. Maybe you can get the attention of one by felling a giant beast of the jungle?
我听说丛林里住着一种蜥蜴人。说不定你可以通过打败丛林里的一只巨兽来引起蜥蜴人的注意？

I hear in the underworld, that the King of all demons is actually a fish! Just imagine the absolute power I would have if you caught it for me!
(Caught in Caverns)

我听说在地狱，所有恶魔的大王其实是一条鱼！想像一下，如果你去抓一条给我，我将拥有强大的王权！
（抓捕位置：洞穴）
I hear there's a secret treasure... oh never mind.
我听说有一个秘密宝藏...哦，没什么。
I hear there's a woman out there well-versed in fighting back the forces you just unleashed. Maybe if you prove yourself, you can get her attention.
我听说有个女人很擅长反击。说不定你去露两手就能引起她的注意。
I heard there is a doll that looks very similar to {Guide} somewhere in the underworld. I'd like to put a few rounds in it.
我听说在地狱中的某个地方，有一个娃娃看上去很像{Guide}。我很想打它几枪。
I heard there was a powerful wizard who lives in these parts. Make sure to keep an eye out for him next time you go underground.
我听说，这些地方住着一名强大的巫师。下次你去地下的时候一定要留心他。
I highly admire {NPCName}. Anyone who knows the true value of money earns my utmost respect!
我非常佩服{NPCName}。任何深谙金钱真正价值的人，我都会给予最大的尊重！
I hit a hole in one! That's a good reason for us all to celebrate. Time to put my club down and have a margarita.
我一杆进洞了！所以我们一定要庆祝一番。是时候放下球杆，来杯玛格丽塔了。
I hope a scrawny kid like you isn't all that is standing between us and Cthulhu's Eye.
我希望在我们和克苏鲁之眼的对抗中，不只有你这么个瘦弱的孩子保护我们。
I hope it doesn't rain again until this paint dries. That would be a disaster!
我希望别下雨了，漆还没干。下雨就惨了！
I hope you have like six friends standing around behind you.
我还盼着你身边能有几个帮手呢。
I hope you like what I did to {PartyGirl}'s hair!
希望你会喜欢我给{PartyGirl}设计的发型！
I just came from {Merchant}'s. He wanted to know if I took credit cards.
我刚从{Merchant}那儿回来。他想知道我是否接受信用卡。
I just can't bring myself to hate {NPCName}.
I just finished my newest creation! This version doesn't explode violently if you breathe on it too hard.
我刚刚完成了最新的作品！如果你用力对着它吸气，这个新作品也不会猛烈爆炸。
I just gave you half a crown five minutes ago! Scram!
我五分钟前才给了你半个铜板！啊啊啊！
I just wanna know where the gold at!
我只想知道金子在哪儿！
I keep asking for wine, but all {Bartender} gives me are mugs of ale.
我一直要求喝葡萄酒，但所有{Bartender}给我拿的都是用马克杯装的麦芽酒。
I keep having vague memories of tying up a woman and throwing her in a dungeon.
我依稀记得把一个女人捆了起来，然后扔到了地牢里。
I kinda want to go out there and collect heads of hair for wigs, but I kinda don't want to GO OUT THERE!
我恨不得去那里收集头发来做假发，但我又有点不想去那里！
I kissed a tree in {BiomeName} and I liked it.
我亲吻了{BiomeName}的一棵树，我喜欢这种感觉。
I know everything they is to know about the clothierin' business.
他们想了解服装行业，而我无所不知。

I know something youuuuu don't! Fine, I'll tell you, there's a terrifying creature that flies among the stars! I'm not making this up! It's called a Wyvern! But, but, you knew that already, right? Well what you don't know is that they are born and raised as tadpoles! So, they're actually like.. well, a frog! Hop to it and get me one!
(Caught in Sky Lakes)

我知道一些你...你不知道的事！好吧，我告诉你，有一只可怕的怪物在星空中飞来飞去！这不是我自己编出来的！ 它叫飞龙！可是，可是，你已经知道了，是不是？你不知道的是，他们的出生和成长历程和蝌蚪一样！ 所以，他们实际上像...像青蛙！开始行动，给我抓一只！
（抓捕位置：天湖）
I know the difference between turquoise and blue-green. But I won't tell you.
我知道青绿色和蓝绿色之间的差别。但我不会告诉你。
I left my fishing pole at home, and it's waaaaay over there! Drat!
我把我的钓竿落在家里了，可是我家离这太…太远了！该死！
I like how {BiomeName} is a beautiful place to get daily exercise.
我喜欢在{BiomeName}这个美丽的地方进行日常锻炼。
I like that {NPCName} resonates with every fiber of my being!
我喜欢{NPCName}能与我产生强烈共鸣的感觉！
I like the scenery in {BiomeName}, a good view attracts customers!
我喜欢{BiomeName}的风景，美丽的风景能引来顾客！
I like your... gear. Does it come in brass?
我喜欢你的...装备。是用黄铜做的吗？
I like {BiomeName}, machines don't overheat here, and the energy flow is efficient.
我喜欢{BiomeName}，这里的机器不会过热，能量流动效率高。
I like {BiomeName}. It has all the necessary features for golfing.
我喜欢{BiomeName}。这里具备打高尔夫球所需的一切条件。
I like {NPCName}, it shows you cannot always judge a person by their... origins.
我喜欢{NPCName}，这说明不能根据…出身来判断一个人。
I loathe the very existence of {NPCName}! What kind of lunatic just gives things away for free?
我讨厌{NPCName}！什么样的疯子会把东西免费送出去？
I love animals, like, a lot! I tried to pet this weird looking fox one time, he sooo bit me, and now I became like one! Rad!
我非常喜欢动物！有一次我试着抚摸这只长相奇特的狐狸，他竟然咬了我一口，现在我变成了一只动物！酷毙了！
I love animals, so naturally {BiomeName} is like, the best place ever! Yas!
我喜爱动物，所以{BiomeName}自然是最棒的地方！耶！

I love collecting those bright yellow stars that fall from the sky! I love it even more when they land on someone's head. But.. but.. nothing beats a star that falls in a foresty lake and turns into a fish! That's just totally rad, and you're just rad enough to get it for me!
(Caught in Sky Lakes)

我喜欢收集天上落下来的亮黄色星星！如果落在某个人的脑袋上，我会更喜欢。 但是..但是..我最喜欢的还是星星落在森林湖中变成鱼！ 那条鱼简直酷毙了，而你又这么牛，快去抓来给我！
（抓捕位置：天湖）
I love having so much space.
我非常喜欢有这么大的空间。
I love having so mush room to myself. What's so funny?
我喜欢有这么大的属于自己的空间。什么事这么好笑？
I love how unique and interesting {NPCName} truly is, remarkable!
{NPCName}是个性有趣又不同寻常，我太喜欢了！
I love how well {NPCName} can handle a container of fireball!
我欣赏{NPCName}能游刃有余地处理装有火球的容器！
I love it when it rains. It's soothing.
我非常喜欢下雨。让人感觉很舒心。
I love nights like tonight. There is never a shortage of things to kill!
我喜欢今夜这样的夜晚。有杀不完的小怪！
I love that there's a lot to talk about with {NPCName}.
我喜欢和{NPCName}在一起，我们有很多共同话题。
I love that {NPCName} always dazzles at my parties.
我喜欢{NPCName}总是在我的派对上光彩夺目。
I love {NPCName} for being able to talk to me without mysteriously getting hungry.
我非常喜欢{NPCName}，因为它会和我说话，而不是莫名其妙地想吃我。
I make a rather enchanting hot chocolate if you'd be inter...No? Ok.
我做了一杯诱人的热巧克力，你感不感...不感兴趣？好吧。
I managed to sew your face back on. Be more careful next time.
我把你的脸缝好了。下次要多小心。
I may have gotten my hair done up just for today, but honestly, I just want to pop balloons with my scissors.
我今天特地剪了新发型，但是老实说，我现在只想用我的剪刀戳破这些气球。
I may not know, like, a whole lot...but I can talk your head off about nature and critters and animals and wildlife and...
我可能学识浅薄…但有关自然、小动物、动物和野生动物之类的话题，我可以给你说上三天三夜…
I might want to get back to my place in case anyone needs a drink or two.
我可能要回去干活了，万一有人想喝一两杯呢。
I need a place to feel secure and welcome.
我需要一个让我有安全感和归属感的地方。
I need a place to hang up my clubs.
我需要一个地方来挂我的球杆。
I need more BOOM, I think I left it way back at home.
我需要更多炸弹，我想我把它忘在家里了。
I need more paint, but my flat is too far, ya?
我需要更多油漆，但我家太远了，不是吗？
I need some sort of structure to run these wires through.
我需要某种结构来让这些电线能穿过。
I need to have a serious talk with {Guide}. How many times a week can you come in with severe lava burns?
我要和{Guide}认真谈一谈。你一周到底有多少次被熔岩烫成重伤？
I never would have expected it, man, but {NPCName} knows her way around a gun!
伙计，虽然万万没想到，但{NPCName}用枪很熟练！
I offered {Bartender} a free trim, but he refused. I mean, I could have at least worked on his mustache!
我主动提出免费为{Bartender}修剪头发，但他拒绝了。我的意思是，我本来至少可以为他修剪下胡子！
I once met a stylist in this region. She went off adventuring underground and that was the last I saw of her. Wonder what became of her?
我曾经在这片区域见过一位发型师。她去地下探险了，那是我最后一次见到她。不知道她后来怎么样了？
I once tried to bring an Angel Statue to life. It didn't do anything.
我曾经试过复活一座天使雕像。然并卵。
I paint walls and furniture, not bones! It isn't Dia de Muertos!
我只给墙壁和家具刷漆，不给骨头刷漆！况且现在又不是亡灵节！
I painted a mural on this wall just a moment ago. Shoulda bought a weather radio!
我刚才在这面墙上画了一幅壁画。真该买台气象收音机的！
I prefer the wide open spaces here in {BiomeName}, great for jetpack joyrides!
我喜欢{BiomeName}这里的开阔空间，非常适合开启喷气背包飞行之旅！
I prefer to work alone, in the presence of just my elves. I dislike all the distractions!
在有精灵的情况下，我更喜欢独自行动。我不喜欢一切干扰！
I rather dislike how {BiomeName} is so devoid of life.
我很不喜欢{BiomeName}的毫无生机。
I rather dislike {NPCName}, they put out similar vibes as some of the dark things from Etheria.
我很不喜欢{NPCName}，因为他们就像埃特尼亚的黑暗物质一样扫兴。

I read this ancient story about a fish that looks like a magical scarab! That's beetle, for simpletons like you! Where do you find it? Where do you think? In the desert, duh! Don't look at me like that... it's true! There is actually water out there! I'd go, but I don't like having my eyeballs pecked out by vultures. So... you do it!
(Caught in Desert)

我读过这个古老的故事，讲的是一条长得像魔法金龟子的鱼！说白了就是甲虫！在哪里能找到它？你说呢？咄，在沙漠！别那样看着我…是真的！那里其实是有水的！我想去，但我怕我的眼珠子被秃鹰啄掉。所以…还是你去吧！
（抓捕位置：沙漠）
I really appreciate all the good you've done for this land! Thank you!
我非常感谢你为这片土地所做的一切善事！谢谢！
I really hate how {NPCName} humiliated me, all because male goblins cannot grow real hair!
我真的讨厌{NPCName}对我的羞辱，而这只是因为男哥布林不能留长发！
I really totally hate what {NPCName} does to animals!
我真的非常讨厌{NPCName}对动物所做的事情！

I saw a fish that had eight legs! Nope! Not happening! You're fishing it for me, so it's not alive when I hold it! That's the last time I go fishing so deep in the cavern!
(Caught in Underground & Caverns)

我看到一条八条腿的鱼！不！不可能！ 你为我钓它，这样到我手里的时候就是死的了！ 这是我最后一次去这么深的洞穴钓鱼！
（抓捕位置：地下和洞穴）
I saw some flashing lights, high up in the sky and far away. The truth is out there, I'm telling you.
我看到空中有一些闪烁的灯光，又高又远。告诉你吧，真相就在那里。

I saw this bright orange and colorful fish by the ocean, and it was looking around frantically as though it was seeking a lost family member! Go catch it for me, so that another one will show up looking frantically for him instead!
(Caught in Ocean)

我在海边看到过这条明橙色的彩鱼，它在疯狂地游来游去，好像在找走丢的家人！去把它抓来给我，这样又会有一条游出来找它！
（抓捕位置：海洋）
I see you're eyeballin' the Minishark.. You really don't want to know how it was made.
我看你在盯着迷你鲨..你绝对想不到它是怎么做成的。
I see you're free of time, as usual. Can't imagine what work life would be for your kind of folk.
看得出你一如往常的闲。实在无法想象你这种人的工作生活会是啥样。
I sell only what I can get. {Clothier} keeps hounding me for exotic clothing.
我只卖我能弄到的。{Clothier}老缠着我要异国情调的衣服。
I sell wares from places that might not even exist!
我卖的商品来自可能根本就不存在的地方！
I sell what I want! If you don't like it, too bad.
我想卖啥就卖啥！你要是不喜欢，那真是太可惜了。
I sense a grim evil pervading the land and all living things in {BiomeName}.
我感觉到一种可怕的邪恶力量正在侵蚀{BiomeName}的土地和所有生物。
I sense a kindred spirit in the Etherian Dark Mages. A pity they are our enemies, I would have liked to learn from them.
我感觉与天国黑暗魔法师志趣相投。可惜他们是我们的敌人，我本来希望向他们学习来着。
I sense a speck of good karma about you, but I could be mistaken.
我感觉到你身上有一点善业，但我也可能弄错了。
I should light up this dark and scary place to keep the monsters away.
我应该点亮这个黑暗可怕的地方，让怪物不敢靠近。
I think I saw a treasure map floating around in the ocean once, but a shark ate it. Maybe you should go try and find one?
我曾经看到海上漂浮着一张宝藏地图，但是一只鲨鱼把它吃了。也许你应该试着找找看？
I think I've wandered off course. That is not a smart move.
我可能偏离了轨道。这不是一个明智之举。
I think it is about time I got my hair did!
I think it wants your carrot
我想它想要你的胡萝卜
I think it wants your fish
I think this party could use a switch-up! How about these jams?
我觉得这个派对需要换换花样了！这些果酱怎么样？
I think you are ready for your first major battle. Gather some lenses from the eyeballs at night and take them to a crimson altar.
我认为你已经准备好迎接第一场大型战斗了。晚上收集眼球中的一些晶状体，并将其带到猩红祭坛。
I think you are ready for your first major battle. Gather some lenses from the eyeballs at night and take them to a demon altar.
我认为你已经准备好迎接第一场大型战斗了。晚上收集眼球中的一些晶状体，并将其带到恶魔祭坛。
I think you look better this way.
我认为你这样看上去好多了。
I think {NPCName} is a killjoy at parties.
我觉得{NPCName}在派对上很扫兴。
I thought I would throw a party to celebrate our victories in the past and those yet to come.
我想我要为了我们过去取得的胜利办一个庆功派对，未来的胜利也一起吧。
I thought you said you purified {TaxCollector}? He's just as greedy as ever!
我记得你说你已经净化{TaxCollector}了？但他还是和以前一样贪婪！
你没我想象中的那么高。
我非常喜欢{NPCName}的派对风格。
I tried having a paintball fight, but everyone wanted food and decorations instead.
我试过举办一次彩弹大战，但是每个人反而更想要食物和装饰品。
I tried to lick myself the other day to see what the big deal was, everything started glowing blue.
有一天，我试着舔了舔自己，看看会发生什么大不了的事，然后全身都开始发蓝光。
I tried to teach {NPCName} a few slick golf tricks, but she schooled me instead! I like her.
我本来要教给{NPCName}几个打高尔夫球的小技巧，结果她反过来教了我几招！我喜欢她。
I tried to visit {Stylist} one time. She just looked at me and said 'nope.'
有一次，我试过去拜访{Stylist}。她看了我一下 就说“不行。”
I tried to work on {NPCName}, but was rudely rejected, I don't like stubborn people!
我试图说服{NPCName}，但被粗鲁地拒绝了，我不喜欢固执的人！
I tried using one of the Dye Master's products once. Ends fried. Disaster.
我曾用过一次染发大师的一款产品。结果变得焦黄。简直就是灾难。
I truly dislike crowds, unless of course they are here for my vivid colors!
我真的不喜欢人群，除非他们是为了我鲜艳的色彩而来！
I truly love parties, so many beautiful colors and happy people.
我真心喜欢派对，到处都是五彩缤纷，还有快乐的人们。
I truly, truly hate how unsavory {NPCName} can be.
I used slime glue to keep my hat from blowing away! Perhaps I can sell you some for a couple gold coins...
我用了史莱姆胶水来防止我的帽子被吹走！只需几个金币，我就可以把这种胶水卖给你…
I wanna strap {NPCName} to a rocket and watch what happens!
我想把{NPCName}绑到火箭上，看看会发生什么！
I want a fish and you're going to find me one! Ask me about it!
我想要一条鱼，你去给我弄一条来！问我它的信息吧！
I want the gold. I want the gold. I want the gold. Gimme the gold!
我要金子。我要金子。我要金子。给我金子！
I want to work on my new invention, but my house is way over there!
我想研究我的新发明，但是我的房子在那边！
I want what {Nurse} is sellin'. What do you mean, she doesn't sell anything?
我想买{Nurse}卖的东西。你说啥？她什么也不卖？
I wanted to see how your kind celebrate, I am not disappointed.
我想看看你们是怎么庆祝的，我没失望。

I was reeling in the big one when this funny talking zombie burst out of the forest lake and started rambling on about this 'ferocious' species of fish made out of dirt! He says it could suffocate ten blokes his size, or something like that... I want it! NOW!
(Caught in Surface & Underground)

正当我在收线钓起一条大鱼时，这个僵尸从森林湖中蹦出来，不仅很搞笑还会说话，然后开始大说特说这只“凶残”的泥鱼！他说，这鱼能闷死十个像他这个块头的小伙子…我要得到它！马上！
（抓捕位置：地表和地下）

I was trying to sleep by the hill lakeside when this fish swooped down at me. It was flying! It also had the face of a lady and had feathers! I think I screamed louder than she did! Hey you, go make her pay for scaring me like that!
(Caught in Sky Lakes & Surface)

我正要在山上的湖畔睡觉时，这条鱼向我俯冲下来。它在飞！ 它长着一张女人的脸，还有羽毛！我想我叫得比她还大声！ 嘿，你去，她把我吓成那样，总得付出代价！
（抓捕位置：天湖和地表）
I went to Sweden once, they party hard, why aren't you like that?
我去过一次瑞典，他们经常开派对，你怎么和他们不一样？
I wish {ArmsDealer} would stop flirting with me. Doesn't he realize I'm 500 years old?
我希望{ArmsDealer}不要再挑逗我了。难道他不知道我已经500岁了？
I wish {Demolitionist} would be more careful. I'm getting tired of having to sew his limbs back on every day.
我希望{Demolitionist}会更小心些。每天都得为他缝合肢体，我都烦死了。
I wonder if the moon is made of cheese...huh, what? Oh yes, buy something!
不知道月亮是不是芝士做的...什么？对了，买点东西！
I wonder what happens if I... (BOOM!)... Oh, sorry, did you need that leg?
如果我...会发生什么...（砰！）...哦，对不起，你还要那条腿吗？
I wonder why my predecessor spontaneously burst into flames. Hopefully it doesn't happen to me...
我想知道我的前任为什么都自燃了。但愿这不会发生在我身上…
I would have given you a free cut if you'd come earlier.
如果你再早点来，我就会免费给你理发。
I would have invited everyone to party in my home, but there's not mushroom.
我本来想邀请所有人去我家开派对，但是没有蘑菇了。
I would really love to paint {NPCName}... because of the vivid colors, of course!
我真的很想给{NPCName}刷漆…当然是因为喜欢这些鲜艳的颜色！
I would sell you exotic wind socks, but I'm afraid I forgot to stock them!
我会卖给你异国风情防风袜，但我忘了进货了！
I'd REALLY like to use {NPCName} as a range target sometime.
有时我很想以{NPCName}作为射程目标。
I'd lend you a hand, but last time I did that, I didn't get it back for a month.
我会帮你一把，但这是最后一次，我一个月都没把它弄回来
I'd run some wire here, but the spooky dead things are in the way!
我本想在这里布线，但这些恐怖的死尸挡住了路！
I'll give you a discount on your wears if you can convince {Truffle} to come over for a...sizing.
如果能说服{Truffle}过来了试一下...尺码，我会给你打折。
I'll have you know, I dislike neighbors!
我要告诉你，我不喜欢邻居！
I'm TOO FAR from my house, I hate all this walking.
我家太远了，我讨厌走路。
I'm a free spirit. I dislike so many people being close to me.
我有一颗自由的灵魂。我不喜欢这么多人挤在我身边。
I'm a kid, you need to give me a house! Are you dumb!?
我还是个孩子，你得给我一个住处！你是哑巴吗！？
I'm adding you to the naughty list for putting me in a awful place like {BiomeName}.
你让我陷入了{BiomeName}这么糟糕的地方，我要把你加入淘气名单。
I'm all out of titanium white, so don't even ask.
I'm bummed out! There's probably been fish that have gone extinct before I even was born, and that's not fair!
太失望了！有些鱼可能在我出生之前就灭绝了，真不公平！
I'm far from my home, it seems.
I'm feeling a bit peevish as of late, so enough with your palaver you ragamuffin!
近来我感觉有点暴躁，所以别再拍马屁了，跟个叫花子似的！
I'm feeling good, actually! Thanks for askin'!
其实我感觉挺好的！感谢你的关心！
I'm feeling successful! Want to buy something?
我感觉很成功！想买点什么吗？
I'm going to need a way bigger power source for THIS MANY people, I hate it!
我需要为这么多人提供更多的能源，我讨厌干这种事情！
I'm gonna need more gold than that.
I'm good, now fetch me a fish!
我很好，现在给我去弄条鱼来！
I'm having trouble concentrating on this swing because of the obnoxious party going on around me.
由于周围在举行讨厌的派对，我无法集中精力挥杆。
I'm impressed. Statistically, you are a wedge above the rest!
让我刮目相看。根据统计，你是最优秀的！
I'm in my best party mood!
I'm mighty curious about that {Cyborg} fellow. By what manner of consumption does he maintain such locomotion?
我对那个叫{Cyborg}的家伙特别好奇。他的移动能力这么强，功耗是怎样的？
I'm no landlubber, but it's better to have lubbed and lost than never to have lubbed at all.
我不是旱鸭子，但即便试水失败也比永远不试强。
I'm not a fan of {BiomeName}, it's bitter.
我不喜欢{BiomeName}，这里充满了愤怒与仇恨。
I'm not a popular man, but I know what tranquility is.
我不是一个受欢迎的人，但我知道静谧是什么样子。
I'm not the type to scream and thrash around just because my ball lands in the water. I stay calm, and collected, and focus on the next shot.
我不是那种只因球掉进水里就歇斯底里的人。我会保持冷静和镇定，将注意力放在下一次击球上。
I'm quite fond of wandering through {BiomeName}. I like it here.
我很喜欢在{BiomeName}闲逛。我喜欢这里。
I'm quite fond of {NPCName}, we have a lot in common.
我很喜欢{NPCName}，我们有很多共同点。
I'm quite used to not having a home, but I wouldn't mind one.
我已经习惯了没有家，但我不介意有一个。
I'm ready to party, but I don't have a house for the after-party.
我要准备开派对了，但我没有地方开庆功派对。
I'm so happy to finally travel the world, and meet new people!
我很高兴终于能环游世界，结交新朋友了！
I'm sorry, but you can't afford me.
I'm staying inside! The Einstein look is NOT in fashion.
我还是待在室内吧！爱因斯坦式的造型还不流行。

I'm sure someone, a really stupid someone, tried to tell you there was no water in the desert! They were absolutely and positively wrong! There's this thing called an Oasis, and it has water in it! Guess what happens when you have water!? That's right, you have fish! Weird fish that try to sting you and pinch you and do all kinds of other mean things to you! A perfect pet for me, and a perfect job for you!
(Caught in Desert)

我敢肯定有人告诉过你沙漠里没有水，真是愚蠢至极！大错特错！沙漠里有种叫绿洲的地方，那里就有水！你说有水就会有什么！？没错，有鱼！那些奇怪的鱼会叮你、咬你，用尽各种方法折磨你！这是一种很适合我的宠物，也是一种很适合你的任务！
（抓捕位置：沙漠）
I'm sure {Nurse} will help if you accidentally lose a limb to these.
如果你不小心因此而断胳膊断腿，我相信{Nurse}会帮忙的。
I'm too far from my tools...
我的工具在很远的地方…
I'm totally scared right now! It is all YOUR fault!
我现在被吓懵了！都怪你！
I'm uh, like, a little homesick? Plus I need to feed my pets!
我有点，呃，想家？而且我还要给我的宠物喂食！
I'm wee far from home, an' I forgot my bloody motor!
我把该死的马达忘在家里了，但我家离这里很远！
I'm working on a Photon Sack. It's an invention to trap all the ghasts lurking around outside!
我正在研究光子袋。这项发明能把所有潜伏在外面的恶魂都抓起来！
I'm working on an invention that will harness the energy being released around us!
我正在研究一项发明，这项发明可以利用自然中释放的能量！
I've also heard rumors that the power of the artifacts themselves may be further unlocked if you defeat the Old One's Army. Perhaps you could even use them any time you wish!
我还听到传言，如果你击败撒旦军队，这些道具本身的能量可能会进一步解锁。或许你甚至可以随时使用它们！
I've been chasing my medical instruments all day. This gale is keeping me fit!
我一整天都在找我的医疗器械。大风天还能让我减肥呢！
I've been cursed! Take me to the hospital!
我被诅咒了！送我去医院！
I've got something for them zombies alright!
我为这些僵尸准备了些东西！
I've got the cure for what ails ya! Get it? Ale? No?
我有办法治愈你的伤痛了！明白吗？麦芽酒？不是吗？
I've heard of glowing mushrooms growing big enough on the surface to gain sentience. Wonder if there's any truth to that...
我听说，地表上的发光蘑菇长得足够大之后就能获得知觉了。不知道是不是真的…
I've heard of glowing pink bulbs growing around the jungle recently. Be ready for anything if you decide to harvest one.
我最近听说丛林周围长出了发光的粉色球茎。如果你决定去收割的话，要做好一切准备。
I've heard reports of a very strange worm in the underground mushroom fields. I wonder if it would be any good as bait?
我听说地下蘑菇里有一种很奇怪的蠕虫。不知道能不能用来做鱼饵？
Ice Queen has been reborn as your companion
冰雪女王已经重生为你的同伴
Ice serves as a catalyst for the blessing, the Hallow's luminous source of power. Strong entities take advantage of this light.
寒冰是福佑的催化剂，神圣之地的力量光源。强大的生命体会利用这种光。
Ideal for a quick, single player experience.
适合进行速战速决的单人游戏。
If I had a trophy to give for your amazing swings, I'd give you ten!
如果我能奖励你的精彩挥杆，我要给你十倍奖励！
If an enemy steals your money after you die in Expert Mode, hunt it down! If you defeat it, you can get your money back.
在专家模式下，如果敌人在你死后偷你的钱，就去追捕它！打败它，你就能夺回你的钱。
If it doesn't stop raining, my wrench is going to get all rusty!
如果雨下个不停，我的扳手就要生锈了！
If it wasn't storming, everyone would go outside. It's the lightning that makes it dangerous.
如果不是风暴，每个人都会出去。闪电让这种天气变得危险。
If my exotic coat shrinks, I will be a tad upset!
如果我的异国情调外套缩水，那我会有点不高兴！
If sand is causing you nightmares, your wedge is your dreamcatcher.
如果沙坑是一场噩梦，那么挖起杆就是你美梦的开始。
If this icy towering monstrosity wishes for someone's soul, they'll surely let it go... right from their cold, dead hands.
如果这个高大冰冷的怪物想要某人的灵魂，那他们一定会用冰冷、僵硬的双手乖乖交出。
If trees could scream, this evil evergreen would do so constantly. Deadly are the ornaments hurled from its branches.
如果树会尖叫，那么这种邪恶的常青树会一直叫个不停。从树枝上投下来的装饰是致命的。
If worn during the day, grants minor increase to damage, melee speed, critical strike chance, life regeneration, defense, mining speed, and minion knockback
白天穿戴可小幅增加伤害、近战速度、暴击率、 生命再生、防御力、采矿速度和仆从击退力
If worn during the night, grants minor increase to damage, melee speed, critical strike chance, life regeneration, defense, mining speed, and minion knockback
夜晚穿戴可小幅增加伤害、近战速度、暴击率、 生命再生、防御力、采矿速度和仆从击退力
If you combine lenses at a crimson altar, you might be able to find a way to summon a powerful monster. You will want to wait until night before using it, though.
如果在猩红祭坛上合成晶状体，你也许能够找到召唤一个强大怪物的方法。不过，你最好等到夜晚再用它。
If you combine lenses at a demon altar, you might be able to find a way to summon a powerful monster. You will want to wait until night before using it, though.
如果在恶魔祭坛上合成晶状体，你也许能够找到召唤一个强大怪物的方法。不过，你最好等到夜晚再用它。
If you defeat enough of these slimes, you might invoke the wrath of their king. Be careful!
如果你击败了一定量的史莱姆，你可能会激起它们首领的愤怒。小心点！
If you dig deep enough, you'll end up in The Underworld!
如果你挖得够深，你最终会到达地狱！
If you ever defeat any giant robots, a Steampunker might move in to your World.
如果你能打败任何巨型机器人，蒸汽朋克人可能就会搬进你的世界。
If you ever need a break from all this adventuring, there's always time for some good old fashioned fishing.
如果你探险累了，想要休息一下，随时可以去尝试一些好玩的老式钓鱼活动。
If you ever want to get stylish, try dyes! The Dye Trader can help you turn some materials into new dye colors.
如果你想变得时尚，那就试试染料吧！染料商可以帮你把一些材料染成新的颜色。
If you find a Magic Mirror, you can use it to teleport back to your spawn point.
如果你找到魔镜，可以用它传送回你的生成位置。
If you find a marble biome, be careful! They say that those locations are inhabited by some very dangerous creatures!
如果你发现了大理石生物群落，一定要小心！据说那些地方住着一些非常危险的生物！
If you gather 5 fallen stars, they can be combined to create an item that will increase your magic capacity.
如果你收集5颗坠落之星，就可以合制成一个物品，以提升你的魔法能力。
If you get lost or need to find another player, open the World Map.
如果你迷路了，或者需要找另一位玩家，请打开世界地图。
If you had a gun, I bet an arms dealer might show up to sell you some ammo!
如果你有一支枪，军火商会来向你出售弹药！
If you keep swinging like that, you'll end up hurting someone... or yourself!
如果你继续那样挥杆，你会伤到别人…或者你自己！
If you land on the green, use a putter! Don't let your balls go flying away when you're THAT close.
如果球落在果岭上，请使用推杆！近距离时，不要让球飞走了。
If you like rockets, the Cyborg may have some for sale.
如果你喜欢火箭，机器侠可能有出售的。
If you listen closely, you can hear screams 'Watch your toes'
仔细听，你会听到尖叫声 “小心”
If you listen closely, you can hear the ocean
仔细听，你会听到海洋的声音
If you need a new haircut, go check out a nearby Spider Biome. Stylists always end up lost in them!
如果你需要换新发型，去附近的蜘蛛生物群落看看吧。发型师最终都在那里不见了！
If you need to remove background walls, craft a hammer!
如果你需要移除背景墙，请先制作一把锤子！
If you place an empty bottle on a table, you can use it to craft all sorts of neat potions!
如果你把空瓶子放在桌上，你可以用它来制作各种各样的纯药水！
If you see a pot, be sure to smash it open. They contain all sorts of useful supplies.
如果你看到罐子，一定要砸开它。罐子里有各种有用的补给。
If you see any suspicious activity out in that fog, I wasn't involved.
如果你在雾中看到有什么可疑的活动，那与我无关。
If you select DPad Cursor Snap in the Gamepad settings, you can use the DPad for improved precision when mining or building.
如果在手柄设置中选择“方向键光标捕捉”，则可以在采矿或建造时使用方向键来提高精确度。
If you stay out there too long, you'll catch a cold!
在外面待太久会感冒的！
If you store your Coins in a Chest or Piggy Bank, you will be less likely to lose them.
如果你将钱币放在宝箱或猪猪存钱罐中，你就不太可能丢失它们。
If you successfully repel the invasion, you'll be awarded with more Defender Medals, which you can bring to me to purchase more artifacts and some other special rewards!
如果你成功击退入侵，你将获得更多护卫奖章，把护卫奖章拿给我，你就可以购买更多道具和一些其他的特殊奖励！
If you thought rainy days were a drag, wait till you see it raining slime!
如果你觉得下雨很无聊，那你就等着下史莱姆吧！
If you throw this one in the bathtub and close all the windows, it'll clear your sinuses and pop your ears!
如果你把这个扔到浴缸后关上所有的窗户，你的鼻子和耳朵就都通了！
If you time it right, no one will hear your gunshots with the thunder.
如果把握好时间，雷鸣时是不会有人听到你的枪声的。
If you want a merchant to move in, you will need to gather plenty of money. 50 silver coins should do the trick!
如果想让商人搬进来，你需要收集很多钱。50枚银币就能搞定！
If you want to survive, you will need to create weapons and shelter. Start by chopping down trees and gathering wood.
如果你想活下来，你需要制造武器和建造房屋。先开始砍树和收集木材。
If you were to look up, you'd see that the moon is red right now.
如果你向上看，你就能看到此刻月亮是红色的。
If you're going to die, do it outside.
If you're looking for junk, you've come to the wrong place.
如果你是在找垃圾，那就来错地方了。
If you're sick of getting knocked around, try equipping a Cobalt Shield. You can find one in the Dungeon.
如果你受够了被人撞来撞去，试着装备一个钴护盾。你可以在地牢里找到这样的护盾。
If your Inventory is full, you can press {InputTriggerUI_Trash} and {InputTrigger_UseOrAttack} to send items to the Trash.
如果物品栏已满，可以按{InputTriggerUI_Trash}和{InputTrigger_UseOrAttack}将物品扔进垃圾桶。
If your Inventory is full, you can press {InputTriggerUI_Trash} to send items to the Trash.
如果物品栏已满，可以按{InputTriggerUI_Trash}将物品扔进垃圾桶。
If your house doesn't have background walls, monsters will be able to spawn inside.
如果你的房屋没有背景墙，里面就会生成怪物。
If {Merchant}'s wares don't interest you, a wandering merchant often visits with exotic merchandise you might prefer.
如果你对{Merchant}的商品不感兴趣，流浪商人经常会过来兜售你可能喜欢的外来商品。
Immunity to Weakness and Broken Armor
对软弱和破损盔甲免疫
Improves vision and provides light when worn 'The darkness holds no secrets for you'
穿戴时可扩大视野，提供照明 “黑暗对你毫无保留”
In ancient times, a saltwater river once ran through the desert. These powerful creatures evolved to survive in the now dry sand.
在古代，一条咸水河流经沙漠。这些强大的生物进化是为了在现在干燥的沙漠中生存下来。
In distant history, these mighty undead knights once guarded a prosperous city before a massive curse befell them.
在很久以前，这些强大的不死骑士曾经守护着一座繁华的城市，后来一个巨大的诅咒降临到他们身上。
In granite biomes, the very stone itself is a threat, frequently coming to life and attacking intruders!
在花岗岩生物群落中，花岗岩本身就是一种威胁，经常会醒来攻击入侵者！
In life, these sorcerers bore the Necromantic Sign of their order, and they shall continue to do so forever . . . even in death.
生前，这些巫士带着他们组织的死灵标旗，即使是死后，他们也将永远这样做。
In life, this torch-wielding zombie joined an angry mob to hunt the undead. In death, it joined an undead mob to hunt the living.
这个挥舞火把的僵尸在生前加入了一群愤怒的暴民，去猎杀亡灵。死后，它加入了一群暴民亡灵去猎杀生者。
In my travels, I've never run across anyone living in a dismal place like this! Ah, well, as long as you have coin...
在我所有的旅行中，从来没见过谁住这么阴森的地方！啊，好吧，只要你有钱币…
In order for a room to be considered a home, it needs to have a door, a chair, a table, and a light source. Make sure the house has walls as well.
要将房间打造成家，则需要门、椅子、桌子和光源。记得房屋还要有墙。
In the depths of the darkest corruption lies cursed-fire belching, betentacled nightmares stretching from the very walls themselves.
在最黑暗的腐化之地深处，居住着一种会喷射诅咒焰的恐怖触角怪，它们会从墙上延伸而出。

In the forest, the slimes are kinda gross. Slimefish are even more so! I don't want to swim with slimes, so yoink one out of the water for me!
(Caught in Surface Forest)

森林里的史莱姆有点恶心。史莱姆鱼更恶心！我可不想与史莱姆们一起游泳，所以你快去从水里抓一条给我！
（抓捕位置：地表森林）
In the ruins of an ancient civilization now deeply buried, some of its spear-hurling soldiers still walk its marble-adorned paths.
在一个已被深深掩埋的古老文明的废墟上，一些挥舞长矛的士兵仍然走在铺着大理石的小路上。
In this deadly place, there lurk arachnids with many legs, many eyes, and a thirst for blood. They sow thick webs threaded with malice.
在这个致命的地方，潜伏着天外魔蛛，它们长有许多条腿，许多只眼睛，嗜血成性，还撒下了邪恶的天罗地网。
In this game, only losers go for that high score.
在高尔夫球运动中，得分低的才是赢家。
In your Inventory, you can press {InputTrigger_InteractWithTile} to equip items such as armor or accessories directly to a usable slot.
在物品栏中，可以通过按{InputTrigger_InteractWithTile}来将盔甲或配饰等物品直接装备到可用栏位。
In your Inventory, you can press {InputTrigger_QuickEquip} to equip items such as armor or accessories directly to a usable slot.
在物品栏中，可以通过按{InputTrigger_QuickEquip}来将盔甲或配饰等物品直接装备到可用栏位。
In {BiomeName}... Good RUN! PLAY! HUNT! Yee!
在{BiomeName}…跑得好！玩得好！捕得好！耶！
Increase your max number of sentries by 1 Increases minion damage by 10%
哨兵数量上限提高1个 仆从伤害增加10%
Increased chance to fish up enemies during a Blood Moon
在血月期间钓到敌人的几率增加
Increased damage and defense from the following:
伤害和防御力因下列原因增加：
Increased damage, Decreased life regen, Causes status effects
伤害增加，生命再生速度降低，对状态造成影响
近战能力提高，防御力降低
Increases armor penetration by 5 Releases bees and douses the user in honey when damaged
盔甲穿透力增加5 受到伤害后释放蜜蜂，并将使用者浸入蜂蜜
Increases armor penetration for melee weapons
增加近战武器的盔甲穿透力
Increases arrow damage by 10% and greatly increases arrow speed 20% chance not to consume arrows Enemies are less likely to target you
箭的伤害增加10%，箭的速度大大提高 20%的几率不消耗箭 敌人不太可能瞄准你
Increases arrow damage by 10% and greatly increases arrow speed 20% chance not to consume arrows Lights wooden arrows ablaze 'Quiver in fear!'
箭的伤害增加10%，箭的速度大大提高 20%的几率不消耗箭 点燃闪耀的木箭 “在恐惧中颤抖吧！”
Increases arrow damage by 10% and greatly increases arrow speed 20% chance to not consume arrows
箭的伤害增加10%，箭的速度大大提高 20%的几率不消耗箭
Increases block & wall placement speed Increases block placement & tool range by 3 Automatically paints placed objects
提高物块和墙的放置速度 物块放置和工具范围增加3 自动喷涂放置好的物体
Increases block placement & tool range by 1
块放置和工具范围增加1
Increases block placement & tool range by 3
块放置和工具范围增加3
Increases breath time and allows breathing in water
延长呼吸时间并可在水中呼吸
Increases chance to get a crate
Increases coin pickup range Hitting enemies will sometimes drop extra coins
扩大钱币拾取范围 击中敌人有时会掉落额外的钱币
Increases coin pickup range and shops prices lowered by 20% Hitting enemies will sometimes drop extra coins
扩大钱币拾取范围，商店价格降低20% 击中敌人有时会掉落额外的钱币
Increases defense by 5 when placed nearby
当放在附近时，防御力增加5点
Increases jump height Allows the holder to double jump
增加跳跃高度 可让持有者二连跳
Increases jump height Releases bees and douses the user in honey when damaged
增加跳跃高度 受到伤害后释放蜜蜂，并将使用者浸入蜂蜜
Increases jump speed and allows auto-jump Increases fall resistance
提高跳跃速度，并允许自动跳跃 增加坠落阻力
Increases length of invincibility after taking damage
受伤后增加无敌状态时间
Increases life regeneration when placed nearby
当放在附近时，提高生命再生速度
Increases mana regeneration when placed nearby
当放在附近时，提高魔力再生速度
Increases maximum mana by 100 12% increased magic damage and critical strike chance
最大魔力值增加100 魔法伤害和暴击率各增加12%
Increases maximum mana by 20 6% increased magic critical strike chance
最大魔力值增加20 魔法暴击率增加6%
Increases maximum mana by 20 6% increased magic damage
最大魔力值增加20 魔法伤害增加6%
Increases maximum mana by 20 Increases mana regeneration rate
最大魔力值增加20 提高魔力再生速度
Increases maximum mana by 20 Reduces mana usage by 5%
最大魔力值增加20 魔力使用率减少5%
Increases maximum mana by 20 Restores mana when damaged
最大魔力值增加20 受伤时恢复魔力
Increases maximum mana by 40 10% increased magic damage 9% increased magic critical strike chance
最大魔力值增加40 魔法伤害增加10% 魔法暴击率增加9%
Increases maximum mana by 40 10% increased magic damage Increases your max number of minions by 1
最大魔力值增加40 魔法伤害增加10% 仆从数量上限提高1个
Increases maximum mana by 40 10% increased minion damage Increases your max number of minions by 1
最大魔力值增加40 仆从伤害增加10% 仆从数量上限提高1个
Increases maximum mana by 40 6% increased magic critical strike chance
最大魔力值增加40 魔法暴击率增加6%
Increases maximum mana by 40 Reduces mana usage by 7%

提高哨兵数量上限 弩车可以刺穿更多目标，但会在你承受伤害时陷入恐慌
Increases your max number of sentries Explosive Traps recharge faster and oil enemies Set oiled enemies on fire for extra damage
提高哨兵数量上限 爆炸机关重新装载得更快并为敌人涂油 点燃涂油的敌人以造成额外伤害

哨兵数量上限提高2个，为你带来10%的仆从伤害
Info accessories don't need to be equipped to provide you and nearby friends with useful information; you can just leave them in your Inventory.
信息配饰无需装备即可为你和附近的好友提供有用的信息；只需要将其放在物品栏中即可。
Is it a bunny in a slime costume? Or is it a slime in a bunny costume? Halloween can be very confusing sometimes.
这是穿着史莱姆外衣的兔子吗？还是穿着兔子外衣的史莱姆？万圣节有时会让人摸不着头脑。
Is it a slime in a bunny costume? Or is it a bunny in a slime costume? Halloween can be very confusing sometimes.
这是穿着兔子外衣的史莱姆吗？还是穿着史莱姆外衣的兔子？万圣节有时会让人摸不着头脑。
Is it over yet? I have this, like, irrational fear of thunderstorms.
完了吗？我对雷雨有种莫名的恐惧。
Is something bothering you? Something doesn't feel quite right about you.
你有什么心事吗？你有点不对劲。
Is this another invasion? Oh, it's just {BiomeName} - even worse!
又来入侵了？噢，只是{BiomeName} - 甚至更糟！
Is this area becoming rather dense, or is it just me? I dislike the feeling...
是这片区域变得密集了，还是我的原因？我不喜欢这种感觉…
Is this some kinda hurricane!? I almost got hit by a dolphin!
这是飓风吗！？我差点跟海豚撞上了！
It brings me joy residing by my subjects. I understand others may find that unappealing, however.
与臣民比邻而居让我感到很快乐。但我能明白其他人可能觉得这没什么意思。
It doesn't seem to work without an Etheria Crystal nearby...
It doesn't seem to work without an Etheria Crystal nearby...
It has been cursed by a powerful Jungle creature
它已被一个强大的丛林生物诅咒
It is rumored that there is a land far above the clouds, where ancient treasures are guarded by powerful winged creatures.
传说在云层之上有一片土地，那里的古老宝藏由强大的有翼生物守护着。
It is unwise to traverse openly beneath the flashing dangers from above.
公然从上方穿过下方闪烁的危险区是不明智的。
It keeps looking at the Moon
It leaps tall blades of grass in a single bound. Fish are fairly attracted to these.
它一跳就跳过了高高的草叶。鱼很容易被这些蚱蜢所吸引。
It reeks of death and malice in {BiomeName}, I wanna blasts holes everywhere!
{BiomeName}散发出死亡和恶意气息，我要把它炸得稀巴烂！
It seems I'm without any lodgings. If I may, have anything in pink, please?
我似乎无处可住。如果可以的话，能给我找个粉红色的住处吗？
It surely is a swell day to fly a kite, don't you agree?
今天当然是放风筝的好日子，你不觉得吗？
It thinks you are its mother
It would be unwise to face off with one of these unfeeling, hungry mutations. Their mouths are large enough to devour all things.
与这种无情、饥饿的变异怪物开战是不明智的。它们的嘴大到可以吞噬一切。
It's a big graveyard, we'll divide it up! The dead stay in their half, we'll stay in ours!
这是个大墓地，我们来划分一下！死者待在他们那一半，我们待在我们这一半！
It's a good day to die!
今天是个找死的好日子！
It's a good thing you had a MAC
It's a highly tedious procedure, cranking out a spyglass and looking for my house.
这是一个非常繁琐的程序，转动望远镜，寻找我的房子。

It's a whale! It's a dolphin! No, it's a penguin fish! Oh, and look, it's you! You get to bring me one! You do know they only like cold water, right?
(Caught in Tundra)

这是鲸鱼！这是海豚！不，这是企鹅鱼！哦，瞧瞧，该你出马了！ 你去给我抓一条！你知道他们只喜欢冷水吧？
（抓捕位置：苔原）
It's always fun to hang out with {NPCName}. Good people.
和{NPCName}一起出去总是很好玩。是好人没错了。
It's cold and ominous around here. I feel something very evil calling out to me.
这里又冷又不吉利。我感觉有一种非常邪恶的东西在召唤我。
It's dangerous to be out in a thunderstorm. Take cover, kid.
雷雨时在外面很危险。找个地方躲起来，孩子。
It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts
要么特别热，要么特别冷。无论哪种方式都带来极大伤害
It's like, weird having instincts and all, and {BiomeName} really makes me want to run away!
拥有这些本能感觉很奇怪，{BiomeName}真的让我想逃跑！
It's nice, calm atmosphere for cutting hair in {BiomeName}.
在{BiomeName}剪头发很舒服，很安静。
It's pretty cold in the snow biome, but there are some unique treasures there as well. I'd check it out!
雪地生物群落气候严寒，不过那里也有一些独一无二的宝藏。我会去看看的！
It's raining alright! Little bitty stingin' big ol' fat sideways rain! At least it ain't coming from straight up underneath us!
好吧，下雨了！淅沥沥的小雨，哗啦啦的大雨，伴着狂风的暴雨！至少，雨没有像从地下冒出来一样大！
It's raining outside! Come on in and party!
外面在下雨！进来狂欢吧！
It's said that centuries ago, there was once a clan of ninjas that hid in the shadows of the world. It seems they are long dead now.
据说在几百年前，世界的暗影里藏着一个忍者部落。看来他们早就灭绝了。
It's time to upgrade that old Furnace! Look for a Hellforge in the Underworld, it's the only way to craft Hellstone bars.
是时候升级旧熔炉了！在地狱寻找地狱熔炉，这是制作狱石锭的唯一途径。
It's uncertain if the bride was wed before or after her death, but the story ends tragically for anyone who crosses her path.
不确定这位新娘是在生前还是死后结的婚，但任何遇到她的人都以悲剧收场。
It's unusual for a Lihzahrd to be outside the Temple. Even more unusual are the voodoo things he sells. He prefers his jungle digs.
丛林蜥蜴待在神庙之外可不寻常。更不寻常的是他出售的巫毒物品。他更喜欢他在丛林的家。
It's windy out there! Now is the best time to fly a kite.
外面起风了！现在是放风筝的最佳时机。
It's worth it to explore your Oceans. You can find treasure, dyes, and even sleeping fishermen.
探索海洋不会让你后悔的。你会发现宝藏、染料，甚至是沉睡的渔夫。
Jellyfish swimming in the bloody waters of the Crimson become infected, converting them to its all-consuming cause.
猩红之地的血腥水域中的水母会被感染，变成吞噬一切的病原体。
Journey characters start with extra equipment. Can only be played on Journey worlds.
旅行角色一开始会配备额外装备。只能在旅行世界使用。
Judges logic gate lamps above it Activates when any lamp is on, Deactivates otherwise
判断它上面的逻辑门灯 任意一盏灯亮时激活，其他情况下停用
Judges logic gate lamps above it Activates when no lamp is on, Deactivates otherwise
判断它上面的逻辑门灯 没有灯亮时激活，其他情况下停用
Judges logic gate lamps above it Activates when only one lamp is on, Deactivates otherwise
判断它上面的逻辑门灯 仅有一盏灯亮时激活，其他情况下停用
Judges logic gate lamps above it Activates when the total 'on' lamps is not one, Deactivates otherwise Also often called NXOR
判断它上面的逻辑门灯 所有灯亮且“亮”灯总数不止一盏时激活，其他情况下停用 通常也称为“同或门”
Judging by the outfit, Santa appears to have recruited some bunnies to be his little helpers this year.
从装扮来看，圣诞老人今年似乎雇了一些兔子做他的小帮手。
Just a little off the top? That's no fun...
就剃掉上面一点吗？那可真没意思...
Just because your house blows down, doesn't mean you stop paying taxes!
你的房屋被吹倒了并不意味着你不用缴税了！
Just below the surface, there's no shortage of dirt. Basic ore, mundane treasure, and weak monsters live down there.
就在地表之下，那里遍布泥土。只有一些基础矿石、普通宝藏，还有苟延残喘的怪物。
Just between you and me... I have no idea why they're bothering to pay the rent
别告诉别人...我实在不明白他们为什么懒得付租金
Just one of these sharp-toothed fish can easily end a life. Luckily, they tend to swarm their victims in large groups! Life is grand.
仅一条这样的尖牙鱼就能轻松结束一条生命。好在这些鱼往往是成群结队地围住受害者！生命是伟大的。
Just stay inside! I've already treated too many electrocuted patients today.
待在室内！我今天治疗了太多触电的病人。
Just wait till his terrible twos!
等到他两岁的时候走着瞧吧！
Just-could you just... Please? Ok? Ok. Ugh.
你能不能...求你了？好吗？好吧。唉。
Keep an explosive in your inventory or a storage container to attract a Demolitionist to your house.
在你的物品栏或储存箱中放一个炸药，吸引爆破专家来你家。
Keep an eye out for Goodie Bags around Halloween. If you open them, you can find all sorts of spooky items. Trick or Treat!
留意万圣节前后的礼袋。打开这些礼袋，你会发现各种各样的恐怖物品。不给糖就捣乱！
Keep your eye on the prize, buy a lens!
注意盯着奖励，买个晶状体吧！
Keep your hands off my gun, buddy!
把手从我的枪上拿开，哥们！
Keep your talismans close... if you wind some, you lose some.
把你的护身符看好…有得必有失。
Kept as pets and guardians by the Lihzahrd race, the flying snakes will attack any who trespass on the Temple's protected grounds.
飞蛇是丛林蜥蜴族的宠物和守卫，它们会对神庙地盘的任何入侵者发起攻击。
Kicks a player from the server.
Kind to my people, {NPCName} is. Much appreciated.
Kites can be flown on windy days Reel it in with <right>
有风的日子可以放风筝 使用<right>收卷风筝线
Kosh, kapleck Mog. Oh sorry, that's klingon for 'Buy something or die.'
Kosh, kapleck Mog。哦，对不起，这是克林贡语，意思是“要么买，要么死。”
咔咝唏嗑！咔咝唏嗑！咔咝唏嗑！
Lacking offensive weaponry, officers in the Martian forces favor defensive measures to focus on relaying tactics to the soldiers.
由于缺乏进攻性武器，火星部队的军官们倾向于采取防御措施，集中精力将战术传递给士兵。
Landscapers must make a lot of green off us golfers. Heh!
景观设计者必须让我们高尔夫球手拥有更多绿色。嘿！
Large blast radius. Will destroy tiles
爆破半径大。会破坏图格
Large blast radius. Will not destroy tiles
爆破半径大。不会破坏图格
Latches on to enemies for continuous damage
缠住敌人以造成连续伤害
Launches a ball of fire that explodes into a raging inferno
发射爆炸成熊熊狱火的火光球
Lazy, devious, might bring presents. Presents might have once been breathing.
懒惰、狡诈，可能会带来礼物。礼物可能曾经有过生命。
Leaving doors open may be an invitation for shambling brain-eaters to enter the home, and nobody likes that.
开着门可能会让笨手笨脚的食脑怪趁虚而入，没有人喜欢这样。
Legends tell of a cursed gift that can turn the most festive of nights into an invasion of horrors!
传说被诅咒的礼物可以将最喜庆的夜晚变成恐怖之夜！
Lending ranged support to the Goblin Army, archers keep a distance and pick off distracted and overwhelmed foes.
弓箭手为哥布林军队提供远程支援，帮助他们分散敌人的注意力，然后杀敌人一个措手不及。
Let a kid give you some advice, never touch your tongue to an ice block! Wait, forget what I said, I totally want to see you do it!
听听小孩的忠告吧，永远不要用舌头碰冰块！等一下，就当我没说，我就想看你这样做！
Let nature decide whether corruption or crimson infects your world.
让大自然来决定是腐化还是猩红来入侵你的世界。
Let's dance! We can shake our hips to the beat of the sky!
让我们来跳舞吧！我们可以随着暴风雨的节奏扭起来！
Lets you move swiftly in liquids
让你在液体中迅速移动
Lick your finger and hold it to the wind. Golf balls are lightweight and easily influenced by a breeze.
舔舔你的手指，让它迎着风。高尔夫球很轻，很容易受到微风的影响。
Life Crystals are hidden around the World. Use them to increase your health.
生命水晶藏在世界各地。利用生命水晶来增加你的生命值。
Life Crystals not enough for you? Eventually, Life Fruit will grow in the Jungle, and can give you an extra boost to your health.
生命水晶对你来说不够吗？最终，生命果会在丛林里生长，可以额外增加你的生命值。
Life regen is increased when near a campfire
靠近篝火时生命再生提速
生命再生速度略有提高
生命再生速度大幅提高
Life's a challenge when you're just naturally better than everyone else.
如果你天生就比其他人都优秀，那么生命就成为了一项挑战。
Life's like a box of clothes; you never know what you are gonna wear!
生活就像一箱衣服；你永远也不知道自己要穿什么！
Lifeform limit exceeded. Neural functions overloaded. Translation: I hate this.
已超过生命体限制。神经功能已过载。翻译：我讨厌这个。
Lightning Bugs from Etheria aren't just named that for their pretty lights! These ones blast their foes with shocking bolts of electricity.
来自埃特尼亚的荧光虫，不仅仅是因为它们散发出的漂亮的光而得名！它们还会用触目惊心的电流冲击敌人。
Lightning casts powerful shadows, shadows cast powerful lightning.
强大的闪电和暗影交相映衬。
Lightning is no joke, very powerful fiends come out in this weather.
闪电可不是闹着玩的，威力无比的恶魔会在这种天气出来。
Lights up bulbs for each wire color
点亮每种电线颜色对应的灯泡
Like a cancer, the putrid creatures born from the Corruption mutate and grow into bigger, more deadly forms which discharge acids.
腐化之地产生的腐烂生物就像癌症一样会变异，变成更大、更致命的形态，同时释放出酸性物质。
Like my dress? Gee, thanks! Just sewed it.
喜欢我的裙子吗？哇，谢谢！刚刚缝好的。
Like the piranha, these swarming fish thirst for blood. Birthed from tainted blood themselves, their hunger is truly intense.
这群鱼像食人鱼一样嗜血成性。它们从自己被污染的血水中诞生，所以它们的饥饿感非常强烈。
Like their jungle cousins, ice tortoises are an unexpectedly serious threat, possessing surprising speed and mobility.
冰雪陆龟和它们的近亲丛林陆龟一样，也是一种意想不到的严重威胁，拥有惊人的速度和移动能力。
Like, I can't just go live in a burrow, you know. I need a house!
我不能就这样住在洞穴里，你知道的。我需要一间屋子！
Like, really? This crazy storm is bad for business!
我说，是真的吗？这疯狂的暴风雨对做生意不利！
Like, {BiomeName} totally reeks of those curses that fox cub had -- the one that bit me!
{BiomeName}完全中了那只小狐狸的诅咒，也就是咬我的那只！
Like, {NPCName} has her subjects searching for a way for me to break my fox curse! Yass!
这就像{NPCName}让她的臣民想方设法帮我打破我的狐狸诅咒一样！太棒了！
Living in the harshest of climates, these savage lupines hunt in the dark of night desperately for sustenance.
这些凶残的狼群生活在最恶劣的气候环境下，它们在漆黑的夜里拼命寻找食物。
Living in {BiomeName} forces people to stay indoors and leave me alone. I find that pleasant.
生活在{BiomeName}迫使人们只能待在家里，让我能独处。我喜欢这样。
本地玩家已离开。自动关闭开始。
锁定优先级：最清楚的线
锁定优先级：最近的目标
逻辑感应器（玩家出入上方）
Long before there were pirates, stories tell of powerful vikings who raged the seas. Their remains roam the icy caverns below.
早在海盗出现之前，就有关于强大的维京人在海上肆虐的故事。他们的亡灵在下面冰冷的洞穴里游荡。
Look at that shoddy armor you're wearing. Better buy some more healing potions.
看看你穿的破盔甲。最好多买点治疗药水。
Looking for a challenge? Try Expert mode!
在寻求挑战吗？试试专家模式吧！
Looking for a gadgets expert? I'm your goblin!
想找一个工具大师？我是你要找的人！
Looks like {0} & {1} are throwing a party
Looks like {0} is throwing a party
Looks like {0}, {1}, and {2} are throwing a party
正在损失生命值且移动已放缓
Lovely morning, wouldn't you say? Was there something you needed?
美好的清晨，你说呢？你需要什么？
Lovely, I get to keep to myself and study my technique without distraction.
真好，我可以一个人待着，不受干扰地研究我的技能。
MY GOODNESS! I'm good, but I'm not THAT good.
我的天啊！我很好，但没有“那么”好。
Macabre, grotesque crimson is guaranteed to be present in your world.
可怕、奇异的猩红肯定会出现在你的世界里。
Machines aren't so bad. Maybe we can build one of our own, if we can just get some explosive weaponry from the jungle...
机器没有那么差。也许我们可以自己建造一台，要是能从丛林里弄来一些爆炸性武器就好了…
Magic damage done will hurt extra nearby enemies
所造成的魔法伤害还能伤及附近的敌人
Magic damage has a chance to spawn buff boosters, pick boosters up to get stacking buffs
魔法伤害有机会生成增益强化道具， 拾取强化道具可获得堆叠增益
Magicked through the pure hatred of the Corruption, this weapon flails about attempting to smash anything that breathes.
对腐化的深深仇恨激发了这种武器的魔法属性，它四处飞舞，想要粉碎所有活物。
Major improvements to all stats and increased life regeneration
所有属性大幅提升，生命再生速度提高
Make it quick! I've got a date with {Nurse} in an hour.
快点！一个小时后我要和{Nurse}约会呢。
Make sure to explore the dungeon thoroughly. There may be prisoners held deep within.
务必彻底探索整个地牢。深处可能关押了囚犯。
Make sure to smash any crimson altar you can find. Something good is bound to happen if you do!
务必砸毁你能找到的所有猩红祭坛。这样做一定会有好处的！
Make sure to smash any demon altar you can find. Something good is bound to happen if you do!
务必砸毁你能找到的所有恶魔祭坛。这样做一定会有好处的！
Make sure you have valid housing with empty rooms, and you may attract new inhabitants to your World.
确保你有有效的空房间，也许你能吸引新的居民来你的世界。
Mama always said I would make a great tailor.
妈妈总是说我会成为一位伟大的裁缝。
Mama always said you've got to put the past behind you before you can party on.
妈妈常说你得把往事抛诸脑后，这样才能玩得开心。
Man, it's a good night not to talk to anybody, don't you think, {PlayerName}?
伙计，这么美妙的夜晚就不要和别人交谈了，你认为呢，{PlayerName}？
Manipulated through the hive mind of the Crimson, Creepers serve as the brain's eyes and orbit around it for defense in numbers.
飞眼怪是通过猩红的蜂巢思维进行操控的，它们不仅是大脑的眼睛，还成群地围绕在大脑周围提供保护。
Many drakanians ride the beastly Drakomires as a form of battle steed. Should the Drakomire be slain, they will pursue on foot.
许多火龙战士会骑上凶残的火龙怪作为战马。如果火龙怪死了，他们就会独自追击。
Many say that parties give you the richest of memories. So buy something and make this memory rich!
很多人说派对会给你丰富多彩的记忆。所以买点东西让记忆更加丰富多彩吧！
Martian soldiers who lack combat ability may instead be deployed for their mechanical aptitude, constructing turrets on the field.
对于战斗能力不行的火星士兵，可能会根据他们的机械能力安排他们在战场上建造炮塔。
Martians are conscripted into military service, and those who do not make the cut are sent out unarmed to distract the enemy as fodder.
火星人被征召入伍，而那些没有达到标准的人则被派去赤手空拳地分散敌人的注意力，充当炮灰。
Martians who show great potential in close combat are equipped with powerful energy spears that can atomize anything.
在近距离战斗中表现出巨大潜力的火星人，装备了能粉碎一切的强大能量长矛。
Marvelous! The wind brings me petals of all colors!
不可思议！风给我带来了各种颜色的花瓣！
Masterfully deceives explorers by posing as a lost girl, then attacks with ferocious might, blood-lust in her eyes.
巧妙地伪装成一个迷路的女孩来欺骗探索者，然后以凶猛的力量攻击，她眼中充满了嗜血的欲望。
May drop valuable shinies when smashed!
打碎后可能会掉落宝贵的发光物品！
Me bed and me rum be callin' me name back home.
俺的床和俺的朗姆酒在呼唤俺回家。
Me want to make {NPCName} walk ye plank, sea dog! Hate the coddlin' and the dastardly smell!
老家伙，俺要让{NPCName}跳下去！讨厌娇生惯养的人，还有那股难闻的气味！
Mechanically reconstructed for reviving Cthulhu, this Skeletron has more arms than ever before, and a variety of fierce weapons.
为了复活克苏鲁，这个骷髅王进行了机械重建，得到了有史以来最多的装备，以及各种强悍武器。
Medium improvements to all stats and increased life regeneration
所有属性中幅提升，生命再生速度提高
Mediumcore characters drop items on death.
中核角色死后掉落物品。
Meet me behind {Guide}'s house in about three hours, I think I have something you will find very appealing.
大约三小时后到{Guide}家后面来找我，我想我有件你会很感兴趣的东西。
Meet with a tenant who's as happy as they possibly can be!
与一位尽可能快乐的租户见面！
Melee and Whip attacks cause confetti to appear
近战和鞭子攻击会喷撒彩纸
Melee and Whip attacks confuse enemies
近战和鞭子攻击会迷惑敌人
Melee and Whip attacks decrease enemies defense
近战和鞭子攻击会降低敌人防御力
Melee and Whip attacks inflict Venom on enemies
近战和鞭子攻击会对敌人施放毒液
Melee and Whip attacks inflict enemies with cursed flames
近战和鞭子攻击会对敌人施放诅咒焰
Melee and Whip attacks make enemies drop more gold
近战和鞭子攻击会使敌人掉落更多金子
Melee and Whip attacks poison enemies
近战和鞭子攻击会使敌人中毒
Melee and Whip attacks set enemies on fire
近战和鞭子攻击会点燃敌人
Melee and ranged attacks cause frostburn Increases melee and ranged damage by 10%
近战和远程攻击会造成冻伤 近战和远程伤害各增加10%
Melee attacks cause confetti to appear
近战攻击会降低敌人防御力
Melee attacks inflict acid venom on your targets
近战攻击会对你的目标施放酸性毒液
Melee attacks inflict enemies with cursed flames
近战攻击会对敌人施放诅咒焰
近战攻击造成燃火伤害
Melee attacks inflict fire damage Grants immunity to fire blocks
近战攻击造成燃火伤害 对火块免疫
Melee attacks inflict fire damage Grants immunity to fire blocks Reduces damage from touching lava
近战攻击造成燃火伤害 对火块免疫 减少因触碰熔岩而受到的伤害
Melee attacks make enemies drop more gold
近战攻击会使敌人掉落更多金子
近战攻击会使敌人中毒
Melee attacks set enemies on fire
Melee damage and speed increase by 10%
近战伤害和速度各增加10%
Melee damage and speed increase by 20%
近战伤害和速度各增加20%
Melee damage and speed increase by 30%
近战伤害和速度各增加30%
近战武器具有盔甲穿透力
Merchants love money. If you save up enough, one might move in!
商人爱财。如果你攒够了钱，可能会有商人搬进来。
Mermen may be rare and exotic demi-humans, but they can still die... and still come back from that a changed merman.
人鱼可能是稀有、奇异的半人，但他们还是会死…死后还会再回来。
Mermen rarely stray far from the ocean. Those that do can become lost, wander into cold caverns, and become icy undead fish men.
人鱼很少会远离海洋。这样做可能会迷路，游荡到寒冷的洞穴里，变成冰冷的不死鱼人。
Mhmm, I heard from {PartyGirl} that {Mechanic}'s friend {Nurse} spent her boyfriend's last paycheck on shoes.
呣，我听{PartyGirl}说，{Mechanic}的朋友{Nurse}买了双鞋，花光了她男友上个月的工资。
Mice squeak around harmlessly, looking for small insects in damp underground locations.
老鼠没有恶意地在潮湿的地下寻找小昆虫。
Mighty serpentine dragons once ruled hell, but long ago shed their obsidian scales. A skeletal husk is all that remains.
威猛的蛇形龙曾统治着地狱，但它们的黑曜石龙鳞早就脱落了。剩下的只有骨架。
Mimics struck with the blessing surge with energy and become powerful. They can be birthed from ordinary chests by force.
宝箱怪受到了福佑的眷顾，能量激增，实力变强。可以通过武力从普通宝箱中把宝箱怪变出来。
Mimics which are enthralled by the Crimson are empowered dramatically. They can be birthed from ordinary chests by force.
迷上了猩红之地的宝箱怪，实力显著增强。可以通过武力从普通宝箱中把宝箱怪变出来。
Mimics which fall to Corruption grow larger and more powerful as a result. They can be birthed from ordinary chests by force.
落入腐化之地的宝箱怪，个头变得更大，实力也变得更强。可以通过武力从普通宝箱中把宝箱怪变出来。
Mine a powerful ore that has been newly blessed upon your world.
开采你的世界新获赐的强大矿石。
Mine chlorophyte, an organic ore found deep among the thickest of flora.
开采叶绿矿石，一种深藏在最稠密的植物中的有机矿石。
Mine your first nugget of ore with a pickaxe.
Mines deal triple damage when armed
武装的地雷会造成三倍伤害
Minions from Etheria - they may have mistakenly invaded this world, but they wish to rule it nonetheless!
埃特尼亚的仆从 - 他们可能无意中入侵了这个世界，但他们还是希望统治这里！
Minor improvements to all stats and increased life regeneration
所有属性小幅提升，生命再生速度提高
Minor improvements to melee stats & lowered defense
近战属性小幅提升，防御力降低
Minor increase to damage, melee speed, critical strike chance, life regeneration, defense, mining speed, and minion knockback
小幅增加伤害、近战速度、暴击率、 生命再生、防御力、采矿速度和仆从击退力
Mmm! This place could use a makeover, for sure. It's not quite fit for anyone, let alone royalty!
嗯！这个地方无疑需要改造。任何人住着都不大合适，何况是皇室！
Money doesn't grow on trees, so don't overpick my fruit! Bah!
钱不是从树上掉下来的，所以我的钱你别拿太多了！呸！
Most certainly not a good boy, this vicious demon dog is more than eager to guide living beings to the underworld with every bite.
这只恶狗绝不是个善类，它每咬一口，都迫不及待要把活人带到阴间去。
Most goblins hate thunderstorms. Probably because they carry so many spiky balls.
大部分哥布林都讨厌雷雨。可能是因为雷雨会带来很多尖球吧。
Most skeletons are out for blood, but not the Skeleton Merchant. He just wants to sell supplies, such as rare torches and yo-yo gear.
大部分骷髅都是为了吸血，但骷髅商人不一样。他只想出售物资，例如稀有火把和悠悠球装备。
Most spiders operate independently, but ones touched by the Crimson hive coordinate together to consume life.
大多数蜘蛛独立行动，但接触过猩红蜂巢的蜘蛛会协同行动，蚕食生命。
Mounts grant the player increased mobility and a variety of useful abilities. Each one is unique!
坐骑可以提高玩家的移动能力，带来各种有用的能力。每种能力都是独一无二的！
Mourning Woods reproduce by snapping cuttings from their bodies and thrusting them into the soil. Splinterlings are the result.
哀木通过从身体上折断插枝并将插枝插入土壤中来繁殖。从而产生了树精。
Movement speed increased and monster spawns reduced
移动速度提高，怪物生成减少
Mows Pure and Hallowed grass Mowed grass reduces enemy spawn chance
修剪纯洁神圣的草 修剪草能降低敌人生成速度
Muahahahahaha! You did it! You're still in one piece though, how boring!
哈哈哈哈！你做到了！你竟然毫发无伤，真没劲！
Mushroom Biomes can be grown above ground as well as below. Friendly Truffles will sometimes make themselves at home in Surface Mushroom Biomes.
蘑菇生物群落既可以生长在地表，也可以生长在地下。友好的松露人有时与地表蘑菇生物群落相处得也很融洽。
Must everyone open and shut doors so incredibly noisily around here?!
每个人一定要又是开门又是关门，整得这里吵死人吗？！
My cybernetic functions perform optimally in {BiomeName}'s temperature gradient. This is a plus.
我的控制功能在{BiomeName}的温度梯度下表现得很好。这是一个优势。
My dear, this palace is quiet enough to sleep like a sultan!
天呐，这座宫殿真安静，在这里可以享受舒坦的睡眠了！
My dear, what you're wearing is much too drab. You absolutely must take a lesson in dyeing your tired attire!
亲爱的，你的穿着太单调了。你一定得好好学学，怎么给单调的衣服染色！
My expedition efficiency was critically reduced when a projectile impacted my locomotive actuator.
射弹击中火车制动器时，我前进的速度大大减慢了。
My hands are sticky from all that... wax.
My instincts are totally going wild. I really need to get out of here!
我完全丧失了本能。我真的得离开这里！
My master cannot be summoned under the light of day.
白天可召唤不了我的主人。
My name's {PartyGirl} but people call me party pooper. Yeah I don't know, it sounds cool though.
我叫{PartyGirl}，但人们叫我派对扫把星。是啊，我也不知道，但听起来酷酷的。
My older bro calls me a lycanthrope. It means I'm like, part animal or something. He'd know, though, because he spends all his time outside!
我老哥叫我狼人。因为我既像动物，又像那啥。不过他都懂，毕竟他常年在外！
My party favors, I forgot them at home. Wow, it's pretty far!
我的派对礼品，我把它们忘在家里了。噢，我家太远了！
My sensors indicate an increased density of energy particles. My visual receptors are unable to identify any of them.
我的感应器显示能量粒子的密度在增加。我的视觉接收器无法识别它们。
My soul feels torn here in {BiomeName}, as if my very being is at war between good and evil.
{BiomeName}让我的灵魂倍感折磨，仿佛在经历正义与邪恶的对决。
My vital signs are normal, if that's what you're asking.
我的生命体征正常，如果你是问这个的话。
My wires are getting tangled in this cyclone. Watch where you step!
我的电线被这股旋风缠住了。注意脚下！
My, my... this is no good. The putrid surroundings are dulling my dye petals.
天呐，天呐…这样可不行。腐烂的环境让我染过的花瓣都失去了光泽。

Na na na na na na na Bat-FISH! That means go digging underground, fetch it, and bring it to me!
(Caught in Underground & Caverns)

呐呐呐呐呐呐呐，蝙蝠鱼！ 意思是去地下深挖，抓住它，再带来给我！
（抓捕位置：地下和洞穴）
Naked and afraid, this girl stands still, deep in the world, as if waiting for someone to rescue her and lead her to the surface.
这个赤裸裸的女孩伫立在世界深处，内心充满了恐惧，仿佛在等待有人来救她，带她回到地面。
Named after a historic Terrarian, these turrets are built by Martian engineers and rain devastating energy upon anyone nearby.
这些炮塔得名于一个历史上著名的泰拉瑞亚人，由火星工程师建成，能对附近的任何人释放毁灭性的能量。
Native to the Martian homeworld, these creatures function similarly to horses. That is, if horses could fire lasers from their eyes.
这些生物来自火星，它们的功能与马相似。换言之，它们就是眼睛会发射激光的马。
Nature's fury strips the leaves from the trees this day.
今天，大自然之怒扒掉了树上的树叶。
Naughty or Nice? Hm, how unusual... the people here have all been crossed off my list for some time now.
淘气包还是乖乖仔？嗯，太不寻常了…这里的人早就从我的名单被划掉了。
Nearby players get a bonus against:
附近的玩家针对以下情况获得奖励：
Need to craft something with ores you can't find on {WorldName}? Try fishing for crates, or placing silt and slush into the Extractinator!
想要用矿石制作一些在{WorldName}找不到的东西？试试钓宝匣，或者把淤泥和雪泥放进提炼机里！
Negates fall damage Grants immunity to fire blocks
使掉落伤害无效 对火块免疫
Negative energy is seeping from your pores. I wouldn't take any chances today.
你整个人都被负能量吞噬了。我今天不会冒险的。
Neither blood nor steam pumps in this miserable locale.
在这个悲惨的地方既没有血也没有蒸汽泵。
Never been to a party before? You might want to check around with the others. People sometimes bring out special party favors.
从没参加过派对？你可能要看看其他人。人们有时会带来特别的派对礼品哦。
Nevermore. Nevermore. Nevermore. Nevermore. Nevermore. Nevermore. Nevermore. Nevermore.
永不复焉。永不复焉。永不复焉。永不复焉。永不复焉。永不复焉。永不复焉。永不复焉。
Night will be upon us soon, friend. Make your choices while you can.
快要天黑了，朋友。快做决定吧，不然就晚了。
No home at all? I will not be subjected to criminal abuse!
无家可归吗？我不会受到虐待的！
No no, this will not do, need a place to call mine.
这可不行，我得有一个属于我的地方。
No one knows where these giant skulls came from, but like their smaller cousins, they seek out and curse the living with their magic.
没人知道这些巨型骷髅头从何而来，但跟它们个头较小的近亲一样，它们也会用魔法寻找和诅咒活人。
No one knows who dressed these demon eyes up in cute costumes, but the whole process hasn't made them any friendlier.
没人知道是谁给这些恶魔眼穿上了可爱的衣服，但即便如此，它们也没有变得更友好。
No one takes the giant tortoises seriously. Not until they come hurtling through the air, a spinning, spiky ball of death.
没有人把巨型陆龟当回事。直到它们像一个死亡刺球一样从空中飞旋而来。
No wonder {Demolitionist} has so many accidents. You can't imagine how much ale he buys from me.
难怪{Demolitionist}出了那么多的意外。你简直无法想象他从我这里买了多少麦芽酒。
No, I will not tell you how many candles are on my cake.
不，我才不会告诉你我的蛋糕上有几根蜡烛。
No, no, no... There's TONS of different grays! Don't get me started...
不、不、不...灰色也分很多种！别让我开始...
No, no, these robes cannot get wet! They will lose their vibrant color!
不，不，这些长袍不能弄湿！否则它们会失去鲜艳的色泽！
Nobody knows if 'Dead Eye' refers to their precise aim, or the fact that one of their eyes is indeed 'dead'... like their targets.
没人知道“死眼”指的是他们的精准瞄准能力，还是他们的一只眼睛确实“死了”…就像他们的目标一样。
Nobody underestimates the throwing arm on this disturbed member of the snowman mafioso. He's a real slugger!
对于雪人黑帮这个精神失常的成员，没人敢小瞧他的臂力。他是名副其实的强击手！

Normally I could care less if I see fishbones floating in the water underground, but this one was swimming! What, you thought that only human skeletons still flailed about in {WorldName}? Get it for me so I can stick it in someone's bed!
(Caught in Underground & Caverns)

如果看到地下水中漂浮着鱼骨，我通常不怎么好奇，但是这只鱼骨竟然在游泳！什么，你以为在 {WorldName} 中只有人骷髅吗？去抓一只给我，这样我可以把它粘在别人的床上！
（抓捕位置：地下和洞穴）
Normally I'd try to teach you all about the Old One's Army, but you should probably ask {Bartender} about that.
通常情况下，我会尝试将有关撒旦军队的一切信息都教给你，但你或许应该向{Bartender}询问这些信息。
Normally, I'm not much of a fan of Goblins, but {GoblinTinkerer} seems to be an alright sort.
通常情况下，我算不上哥布林的粉丝，但{GoblinTinkerer}似乎还不赖。
Not a Kid, nor a Squid
Not all Skeletons are evil. Some are even known to sell unique items to those that can find them.
并非所有骷髅都是邪恶的。有些骷髅甚至会把独特的物品卖给那些能找到它们的人。
Not all of the undead monsters are hostile. I hear one even sells merchandise deep underground.
并非所有不死怪物都充满敌意。我听说有一个怪物甚至还在地下深处卖东西。
Not even a Blood Moon can stop capitalism. Let's do some business.
即便是血月也无法阻挡资本主义。做点生意吧。
Not moving puts you in stealth, increasing ranged ability and reducing chance for enemies to target you
不移动则会隐身， 增加远程能力和降低敌人瞄准你的几率
Not quite champion level, but you'll do.
还没有达到一流水平，但你可以的。
Not so fast! You got your money, now begone!
没那么快！你已经拿到钱了，赶紧滚开！
Not sure I like living next door to so many people.
我不确定我是不是喜欢跟这么多人做邻居。
Not sure what to do next? Take a look at the Achievement Guide for a clue!
不知道接下来做什么？看看成就指南来寻找线索吧！
Not the typical garden-variety bunny. This one has been tampered with, and has an explosive temper as a result.
不是普通的吃草兔子。这种兔子被篡改了基因，所以脾气很暴躁。
Nothing better than having all this space to yourself.
没有什么比拥有属于自己的空间更美好的了。
Nothing improves your mobility like Wings. Who wouldn't want to fly?
没有什么东西能像翅膀那样提高移动能力。谁不想飞呢？
Now might not be the best time to lob grenades on the surface, my tall friend!
现在可能不是扔手榴弹的最佳时机，我的傻大个！
Now that I'm an outcast, can I throw away the spiked balls? My pockets hurt.
我无家可归了，那我能扔掉这些尖刺球吗？我的口袋扎得疼。
Now that we know each other, I can move in with you, right?
现在我们已经认识了，我可以搬给你那里去了吧？
Now that you have some ore, you will need to turn it into a bar in order to make items with it. This requires a furnace!
现在你拥有了一些矿石，你需要将它铸成矿锭，才能用来制作物品。这需要熔炉！
Now would be a great time to tinker a pinwheel accessory!
现在是修补风车配件的绝佳时机！
Number of worlds to generate at once
Obtain a Terra Blade, forged from the finest blades of light and darkness.
获得一把汲取了日月精华的锋刃锻造而成的泰拉刃。
Obtain a rare treasure from a difficult monster in the dungeon.
从难对付的地牢怪兽那儿获得稀世珍宝。
Obtain an anvil made from iron or lead.
获得由铁或铅制成的砧子。
Obtain the Terraspark Boots, forged from the finest boots of fire and ice.
获得泰拉闪耀靴，这是用最好的火系和冰系靴子铸成的。
Obtain the Zenith, the culmination of a journey forged into the ultimate sword.
获得天顶剑，这是铸就终极之剑的旅程的高潮。
Obtain your first hammer via crafting or otherwise.
通过制作或其他方式获得第一把锤子。
异常耐用，足以用来攀登！
Of course I like {NPCName}! I like, knew them since I was born!
我当然喜欢{NPCName}！从我出生起，我就知道并喜欢他们！
Of course embroidery is hard! If it wasn't hard, no one would do it! That's what makes it great.
刺绣当然难了！如果不难，就没人绣了！所以刺绣是件难能可贵的事。
Of course, you can't let the Old One's Army destroy the Eternia Crystal! This will have catastrophic consequences for my home world of Etheria!
当然，你不能让撒旦军队摧毁埃特尼亚水晶！这将为我的家园—埃特尼亚世界带来灾难性的后果！
Often used to manifest one's will as a physical form of defense
经常用于以物理形式的防御表现一个人的意志力
Oh Fudge! Shorted out another outlet! I hate this weather.
哦，见鬼！又一个插座短路！我讨厌这该死的天气。
Oh dear, that {NPCName} has no sense of color or style, I don't like.
天呐，那个{NPCName}毫无颜色或风格意识，我不喜欢。
Oh ho... whoah! There goes Dasher. There went Donner, too!
喔嚯…哇哦！猛冲者走了。唐纳也走了！
Oh no no, this will not do. For these money is no good, you must return to me with a rare specimen of a plant!
噢，不行，不行，这样是不行的。有钱也没用，你必须拿一种稀有的植物样本来和我交换！
Oh no! There are pockets of low pressure rolling in, I must secure the power grid.
天呐！有一小股低气压正在逼近，我得确保电网安全。
Oh no, {BiomeName} does not inspire me, don't like, don't like.
噢，不，{BiomeName}给不了我启发，我不喜欢这里。
Oh you poor, poor thing. Just... just sit down here. It'll be okay. Shhhh.
哦，真可怜，可怜的家伙。来...在这儿坐下。会没事的。嘘。
Oh! Thanks for the fish I asked for, now scram!
哦！谢谢你抓来我要的鱼，可以滚了！
Oh, I hate treating {NPCName}, so difficult!
Oh, THESE ears? Haha, totes better to hear you with, my dear!
噢，这两只大耳朵吗？哈哈，是用来听你的，宝贝！
Oh, are you all wet? Well, shake it off!
噢，你全身湿透了吗？让我们摆脱烦恼吧！
Oh, great. I can hear {Mechanic} and {Nurse} arguing from here.
哦，太好了。我在这儿就能听到{Mechanic}和{Nurse}的争吵声。
Oh, how heroic! Thank you for saving me, young lady!
哦，多么英勇！谢谢你救了我，年轻的女士！
Oh, how heroic! Thank you for saving me, young man!
哦，多么英勇！谢谢你救了我，年轻人！
Oh, it seems I'm out of signal range! Hmm.
噢，我好像超出了信号范围！嗯。
Oh, let me guess. Didn't buy enough wire. Idiot.
哦，让我猜猜。买的电线不够。白痴。
Oh, so you just see me as a coin sign, eh? 'Cus every time you see me, you ask me.
哦，你就把我当作钱币符号，啊？因为每次你一看到我就问我要钱。
Oh, you know what this house needs? More blinking lights.
哦，你知道这个房屋需要什么？需要更多的闪光灯。
Oi, I absolutely hate crowded quarters!
嘿，我非常讨厌拥挤的地方！
Ok, like, this place is totally freaky. It makes my fur stand on end!
好吧，这地方太诡异了。我的毛都竖起来了！
On rare occasions, the moon will blot out the sun, bringing out lots of scary monsters!
月亮很少会挡住太阳，这种情况下，会有很多可怕的怪物出没！
On the pink side of the crystal spectrum, these crystal slimes pop off tumor-like gel growths to assault their enemies.
在水晶光谱的粉色部分，这些水晶史莱姆会从瘤状的凝胶赘生物中脱落，从而攻击它们的敌人。
Once enough of <item name> is researched, it will be available infinitely!
研究足够多的<item name>后，你将能无限使用它！
Once living beings infused by the blessing, they erratically make chase with an uncontrollable surge of luminous power.
一旦生物被注入福佑，它们就会进行异常追逐，散发出一股不可控的光能。
Once mercenaries from a distant land, Corsairs brandish deadly scimitars with unyielding skill and a cut-throat agenda.
海盗曾经是来自遥远国度的雇佣兵，他们挥舞着致命的弯刀，拥有扎实的技能，肩负残酷的任务。
Once these ocean predators catch a whiff of blood, they become relentless and unstoppable in their ravenous pursuit.
一旦这些海洋捕食者捕捉到一丝丝血腥气味，它们就会在贪婪的追逐中变得无情和不可阻挡。
Once trapped under a curse, the Clothier is the master of thread. If it's fashion that's desired, he's the man! He talks in a familiar way.
一旦被诅咒，服装商就成了线的主人。如果追求的是时尚，那么他就是这种人！他的说话方式就紧跟潮流。
Once you enter hallowed land, you will see a rainbow in the sky. I can help you with painting that if you want.
进入神圣之地后，你将看到天空中挂着一道彩虹。如果你喜欢，我帮你画下来。
Once you have a wooden sword, you might try to gather some gel from the slimes. Combine wood and gel to make a torch!
拥有一把木剑后，你可以试试从史莱姆身上收集一些凝胶。用木材和凝胶制作一个火把！
Once you use a Life Crystal, a Nurse might move in! Speak to her for healing at any time . . . for a price, of course.
一旦你使用生命水晶，可能就会有一名护士搬进来！如果需要治疗，可以随时跟她说…当然，是收费的。
Once your stand is set up, just interact with it while holding an Eternia Crystal, and prepare for a fight!
安好支座后，你只需拿着埃特尼亚水晶与支座互动，并准备战斗！
One day it started raining like this, and it didn't quit for four days!
有一天开始像这样下雨，整整下了四天！
One time I put a wig on {Cyborg} just so I could cut his hair. I think he kinda liked it!
有一次，我给{Cyborg}套上假发，这样我就能给他理发了。我觉得他还挺喜欢的！
Only Journey characters may enter a Journey server.
只有旅行角色可以进入旅行服务器。
Only Journey characters may enter a Journey world.
只有旅行角色可以进入旅行世界。
Only Non-Journey characters may enter a Non-Journey server.
只有非旅行角色可以进入非旅行服务器。
Only Non-Journey characters may enter a Non-Journey world.
只有非旅行角色可以进入非旅行世界。
Only available if map is enabled
Only drops when in or above Wave {0}
仅在第{0}波内或以上掉落
Only one fish a day, please go away!
Only present during a specific time of year, Santa Claus makes a big entrance and an even bigger, rather explosive exit. Ho! Ho! Ho!
圣诞老人只在一年中特定的时间出现，他会制造一个大的入口和一个更大、甚至是爆炸性的出口。嚯！嚯！嚯！
Only textures of type '.png' and '.xnb' may be loaded.
只能加载“.png”和“.xnb”类型的纹理。
只有使用回声镜才能看到

Oooooohhh, I'm going to be SO rich! Deep in the caverns, there is a fish made out of gemstones! Don't ask me how, I don't know, all I know is that this fish is totally awesome and you're going to catch it for me!
(Caught in Underground & Caverns)

哦哦，我马上就要发大财啦！在洞穴的深处，有一种宝石做的鱼！ 别问我怎么做，我不知道，我知道的是，这种鱼非常美丽，你去把它抓来给我！
（抓捕位置：地下和洞穴）
Oops! I better hold on to my tiara, it's rather blustery out today!
哎呀！我最好抓住我的头冠，今天简直狂风大作！
打开敌人生成速度滑块
Opens all Shadow Chests and Obsidian Lock Boxes
打开所有暗影箱和黑曜石锁盒
Opens one locked Gold Chest or Lock Box
打开一个加锁金箱或金锁盒
Other players can loot your chests! If you don't trust them, use a Safe or Piggy Bank; those items have storage that is exclusive to each player.
其他玩家可以掠夺你的宝箱！如果你不信任他们，可以使用保险箱或猪猪存钱罐；这些物品可以储存专属于每个玩家的物品。
异界八音盒（地下腐化之地）
异界八音盒（地下猩红之地）
异界八音盒（地下神圣之地）
阴森的声音在你耳边萦绕不绝...
Our kind is very brittle, I worry for my brothers on this breezy day.
我们这种生物很脆弱，在这种有微风的日子里，我会担心我的兄弟。
Our mother is angry, and wishes to burn away the filth by raining destructive power on our treetops.
我们的大自然母亲发怒了，她要对我们的树梢施加毁灭性力量，把污物都烧掉。

Out in the forest, I was fishing right? Well guess what! A bunny hopped up to me! Then another one hopped up, and another... suddenly I'm surrounded by bunnies! One even swam up to me from the water, but it had no legs! I fell outta my chair in surprise and all the bunnies scurried off! I want that bunny fish as a pet, so you better catch it for me! Pronto!
(Caught in Surface)

我正在森林里钓鱼，对吧？你猜发生了什么！一只兔兔朝我跳了过来！然后，又有一只跳过来，又有一只...突然我被兔兔包围了！甚至有一只从水里向我游过来，但它没有腿！我惊讶地从椅子上跌下来，把所有兔兔都吓跑了！我想要那条兔兔鱼作为宠物，因此你最好去把它抓来给我！马上！
（抓捕位置：地表）

Ow! Don't get near me! I got stung by a Bloody Man-O-War! In case you're not smart enough to know what that is, it's the most menacing jellyfish in all of {WorldName}! Go to that rotten crimson and catch it if you dare!
(Caught in Crimson)

噢！别靠近我！我被一条血水母蜇了！怕你不聪明，不知道血水母是什么，所以我告诉你，它是整个 {WorldName} 中最凶险的水母！如果你敢，接近这个恶臭的猩红之地，把它抓来！
（抓捕位置：猩红之地）
Oy, whatchu got in you jiminy fluffer?
Part man, part fly, all doctor. He's brought his most volatile and dangerous chemicals, and he's buzzing to try them out.
半人半苍蝇，职业是一位医生。他带来了最具挥发性和危险性的化学物质，他嗡嗡叫着要试一试。
Parties are great for getting people to come out of their shell, just like with bullets.
派对是让人们抛开束缚的好方法，就像子弹一样。
Party up! You're like, in charge of the cake, {PlayerName}!
嗨起来！{PlayerName}，你是负责蛋糕的！
从剪贴板粘贴颜色代码
从剪贴板粘贴玩家模板
Penguins make their home in the coldest regions of the world, waddling around looking for tasty fish.
企鹅在世界上最冷的地方安家，摇摇摆摆地四处寻找美味的鱼。
Perfect, no one is in the way for building infrastructure.
完美，没有人阻碍基础设施的建设。
Perfect, the lack of annoying neighbors adequately meet my needs.
完美，没有了烦人的邻居，我的需求就能全部实现了。
Perhaps the old man by the dungeon would like to join us now that his curse has been lifted.
地牢旁边的老人已经解除诅咒了，现在他也许愿意加入我们。
Permanently increases the number of accessory slots
Pink is the best color anyone could ask for!
粉红色是任何人都梦寐以求的最佳颜色！

Piranhas and sharks are ugly! Soooo ugly! Did you know there's a fish that looks very pretty and still can eat your face off? I would pay 2 platinum to see that happen, by the way... To the point, though, you catchy for me. Just make sure I have it before you lose your face!
(Caught Jungle Surface)

食人鱼和鲨鱼都很丑！太...丑了！你知道吗？有一种鱼长得很漂亮，但可以把你的脸咬掉。我会付2块铂金来看这场表演，顺便...不过关键是，你要抓一条给我。一定要在你的脸被咬掉之前，把它交给我！
（抓捕位置：丛林地表）
Pirates are approaching from the east!
Pirates are approaching from the west!
Pirates are so unpredictable. First they invade your world, and then they move into your houses!
海盗是难以捉摸的。他们先入侵你的世界，然后住进你的房屋！
Place an item here to reforge
Place in the Eternia Crystal Stand to summon Etheria's portals
放入埃特尼亚水晶座以召唤埃特尼亚的传送门
Place this on logic gate lamps to randomize the activation
将此物放置在逻辑门灯上，可随机激活
Place this on logic gates to add checks
将此物放置在逻辑门上，以添加检测方法
Placing into itself will be blocked
Placing silt/slush/fossil piles into the extractinator turns them into something more useful
将淤泥/雪泥/化石堆放入提炼机中可将其变成更有用的东西
Playable Instrument 'Property of Dead Man's Sweater'
可演奏的乐器 “死人毛衣乐队的东西”
可演奏的乐器 “这些小过门很劲爆”
Playable next to Drum Set 'The coffee is strong...and vulgar'
放在鼓组旁，可使用 “咖啡很浓…也很粗俗”
Please choose how your world will be built with the options above.
请选择如何使用上述选项构建你的世界。
Please launch the game from your Steam client.
请从 Steam 客户端启动游戏。
Please! Battle my captor and free me! I beg you!
请帮帮我！打败捉住我的人，救我出去！求你了！
Please, do tell when the wrath of nature has ended out there!
请告诉我，大自然之怒何时结束！
Please, no, stranger. You'll only get yourself killed.
求你了，别，陌生人。你只会让自己送命的。
Plenty o' room just for me and some good steam engines!
给我和一些不错的蒸汽机留了很多空间！
Portals cannot be created on the surface of these blocks
不能在这些物块表面创建传送门
