Unlocks a Hallowed Chest in the dungeon
Unlocks a Jungle Chest in the dungeon
Unlocks an Ice Chest in the dungeon
Unlocks an ability toggle to the left of the inventory When enabled normal torches change according to your biome
能切换至物品栏的左侧 启用后，普通火把会随着生物群落而变化
Unpopular opinion: I quite love having {NPCName} around. I get my water hazards returned to me!
不受欢迎的观点：我很喜欢和{NPCName}在一起。我要把我的水障碍区要回来！
Up there? Heard it's pretty wet. Don't want my bones getting soggy and mushy...
在上面吗？听说那里很潮湿。我可不想我的这身骨头变得湿乎乎的…
Use "suspicious looking items" at your own risk!
使用“可疑物品”，风险自负！
Use to let a bunny arrive in town
Use to let a cat arrive in town
Use to let a dog arrive in town
Used by the Clentaminator Spreads Glowing Mushrooms
由环境改造枪使用 蔓延发光蘑菇
Used by the Clentaminator Spreads the Corruption
由环境改造枪使用 蔓延腐化之地
Used by the Clentaminator Spreads the Crimson
由环境改造枪使用 蔓延猩红之地
Used by the Clentaminator Spreads the Hallow
由环境改造枪使用 蔓延神圣之地
Used by the Clentaminator Spreads the Purity
由环境改造枪使用 蔓延纯净之地
Used for crafting a Corruption Key
Used for crafting a Crimson Key
Used for crafting a Frozen Key
Used for crafting a Hallowed Key
Used for crafting a Jungle Key
Used to catch critters Can catch lava critters too!
用来捕捉小动物 也可以捕捉熔岩小动物！
Used to craft items from Lunar Fragments and Luminite
用来通过月亮碎片和夜明矿制作物品
Used to craft items from metal bars
用于制作以金属锭为原料的物品
Used to craft items from mythril, orichalcum, adamantite, and titanium bars
用于制作以秘银、山铜、精金和钛金锭为原料的物品
Used to craft various types of ammo
Used to craft weapon imbuement flasks
Used to make Sky Blue Dye
Used to remove paint Can sometimes collect moss
用于除漆 有时可以收集苔藓
Used to smelt adamantite and titanium ore
用于熔炼精金和钛金矿
Used with paint to color blocks
与漆结合使用，给块涂色
Used with paint to color walls
与漆结合使用，给墙壁涂色
Uses coins for ammo Higher valued coins do more damage
将钱币用作弹药 钱币价值更高，伤害越大
Using explosives or your trusty hammer, smash a Shadow Orb or Crimson Heart in the evil parts of your world.
使用炸药或可靠锤子，在世界的邪恶地带中粉碎暗影珠或猩红之心。
Using the Rod of Discord will take life
使用混沌传送杖将消耗生命值
Utterly devoted, Lunatic Devotees unfailingly worship their deity, even when threatened with death. Fear only makes them worship harder.
全心全意的拜月教忠教徒，即使面对死亡的威胁也始终崇拜他们的神。恐惧只会让他们更加崇拜。
正在验证世界保存数据：
WHAT... {NPCName}? Is that a new brand of nitro? Oh, HER, Yes, good lass!
什么东西...{NPCName}？这是个新的炸药品牌吗？哦，是她啊，一个挺不错的姑娘！
Walk it off, {PlayerName}, you'll be fine. Sheesh.
走走看，{PlayerName}，你会没事儿的。嘶。
Walking on Hellstone and Meteorite can burn you! Protect yourself by equipping an Obsidian Skull or similar accessory.
走在狱石和陨石上会灼伤你！装备上黑曜石骷髅头或类似配饰来保护好你自己。
Wandering the dark caverns below the desert dunes, ghouls are the dessicated husks of zombies preserved by the arid environment.
食尸鬼是干燥环境下保存下来的干枯僵尸的躯壳，它们游荡在沙丘下黑暗的洞穴里。
Wanders aimlessly to infest the living with undeath, unaware of its own maggoty infestation.
漫无目的地游荡，通过感染生者让他们变成僵尸，没有意识到它的蛆虫侵扰。
Wanna buy a lightning rod? Oh, seems I'm out of stock.
想买避雷针吗？哦，好像没货了。
Want me to pull a coin from behind your ear? No? Ok.
想让我从你耳朵后面变出一个钱币吗？不想？好吧。
Want windswept hair? Go outside, it's free.
想要爆炸式发型？去外面，有免费的。
Was tryin' out my new gun, but the wind kept me off target!
我在试我的新枪，但风影响了我的发挥！

Watch your step when wading through jungle waters! Why? No, not because I care about you being eaten by piranhas. I care because you'll step on one of my favorite kinds of fish, the Mud Fish! I also care a lot that you're going to grab me one as a pet!
(Caught in Jungle)

经过丛林的水域时，要注意脚下！为什么？不，我不担心你会被食人鱼吃掉。我担心你会踩到我最喜欢的一种鱼，泥鱼！我还希望，你会抓一条来给我当宠物！
（抓捕位置：丛林）
Water elementals become icy when dense strong magicks accumulate in the coldest places. Their frosty shards freeze all.
当密集而强大的魔法聚集在最寒冷的地方时，水灵精就会变成冰。它们冰冷的碎片能冻结一切。
Water hazards are a lot larger when it rains, making it that much harder to reach the green!
水障碍区在下雨时会变得更大，这就更难到达果岭了！
水会减轻你掉下来时受到的冲击。
We are living in a fairy tale.
We have to talk. It's... it's about parties.
我们得谈谈。这...聚会的事。
We need better text for this!!!
我们需要为此提供更好的文本！！！
We should party so loud that we LITERALLY wake the dead! Hee hee!
让我们用热闹的派对把死人吵醒吧！嘿嘿！
We should really do something about the Old One's Army. Ask me about the Eternia Crystal if you want to learn more.
我们真的应该给撒旦军队一点颜色看看。如想了解有关埃特尼亚水晶的更多信息，你可以问我。
We should set up a blinkroot party, and we should also set up an after-party.
我们应该办一个闪耀根派对，而且我们还应该办一个庆功派对。
We've been partying to this song for years! Let's change it up!
多年来我们的派对一直用的这首歌！我们该换换了！
Wear a Mining Helmet if you don't want to use Torches.
如果你不想使用火把，那就佩戴一顶挖矿头盔吧。
Wearing a full set of armor crafted from the same material gives you an extra bonus.
穿一整套由同种材料制成的盔甲会给你带来额外奖励。
Wearing costumes isn't fooling anyone; these zombies are clearly way too old to be trick or treating.
这些僵尸即使穿上服装也骗不了任何人；他们显然太老了，玩不了“不给糖就捣蛋”的游戏。
Well, I don't feel like exploding today!
Well, hi there, {Demolitionist}! What can I do for you today?
你好，{Demolitionist}！今天有什么可以为你效劳？
Well, hi there, {Dryad}! What can I do for you today?
你好，{Dryad}！今天有什么可以为你效劳？
Well, hi there, {GoblinTinkerer}! What can I do for you today?
你好，{GoblinTinkerer}！今天有什么可以为你效劳？
Well, hi there, {Guide}! What can I do for you today?
你好，{Guide}！今天有什么可以为你效劳？
Well, hi there, {Mechanic}! What can I do for you today?
你好，{Mechanic}！今天有什么可以为你效劳？
Well, hi there, {Nurse}! What can I do for you today?
你好，{Nurse}！今天有什么可以为你效劳？
Wha? Who might you be? I totally wasn't just drowning or anything!
啥？你是哪位？我绝对不只是溺水之类的！
Whaaaat?! Can't you see I'm winding up fishing line??
什....么？！难道你没看见我在收钓鱼线吗？？
What a beautiful night! With your recent victory, the world seems more at peace, and these lanterns are in celebration of that.
多美的夜晚啊！由于你近来取得的胜利，整个世界看起来都更加平静了，这些灯笼就是为了庆祝这一切。
What a blustery day! Stay awhile, and buy a thing or two.
今天的风真大！先来躲一躲吧，可以来选购一两件东西。
What a breathtaking golfer! You may be at the top, but never stop reaching for it!
令人惊叹的高尔夫球手！你可能已经达到了顶尖水平，但不要停止追求进步！
What a dreary place... it sure could use a splash of color, huh?
这地方真沉闷…必须来一抹色彩，哈？
What does a man have to do to be left alone in this place? Go bugger someone less busy!
一个人独自留在这个地方要做些什么？去打扰不太忙的人！
What does the fox say? Better yet, what does the fox HEAR?!
狐狸说了什么？更重要的是，狐狸听到了什么？！
What exactly does it eat, anyway?
What in blazes are ye talkin' about? Moby Dick is mine!
What is that supposed to mean?!
What kind of irritating place is {BiomeName}? Poppycock, I tell you!
{BiomeName}是个怎样让人讨厌的地方？胡说，让我来告诉你！
What manner of salt did you spill to receive such misfortune!?
你是干了什么缺德事才会遭此不幸！？
What was that noise? Hm, perhaps I shouldn't worry so!
那是什么声音？嗯，也许我不必这么担心！
What you're celebrating doesn't matter, just throw a party already!
庆祝什么根本不重要，办派对就好啦！
What's not to like about {BiomeName}? It has unicorns and rainbows.
{BiomeName}有什么不好的？这里有独角兽和彩虹。
What's this about me having more 'bark' than bite?
说我雷声大雨点小是啥意思？

What's white and tan and fluffy and lives in a frozen underground lake? A mutant flinxfin! I wasn't telling a joke, you know, there really is a mutated variety of Flinx that is more adapted to an aquatic lifestyle! I want it to adapt to my fishbowl, so make sure that happens!
(Caught in Underground Tundra)

棕白色的，毛茸茸的，住在冰冻地下湖中，是什么鱼？突变弗林鱼！ 我没有开玩笑，确实有一种更适应水生生活的突变弗林鱼！ 我希望它能够适应我的鱼缸，一定要抓一条！
（抓捕位置：地下苔原）
What's worse than a rabid, fast-flying, and annoying flying rodent? One that is on fire, of course!
还有什么比狂躁、恼人的疾飞蝙蝠更糟糕的呢？那一定是浑身冒火的熔岩蝙蝠！
What's {Demolitionist}'s problem? Does he even realize we sell completely different stuff?
{Demolitionist}怎么回事啊？难道他发现我们卖的东西完全不同？
What, you think I like parties because I am a kid? Well, you're right, so get to partying!
什么？你说我喜欢派对是因为我是个小孩？好吧，你说对了，那就开始派对吧！
What? I AM in a good mood.
What? You thought I wasn't real?
什么？你认为我不是真的？
What? {NPCName}? I don't have a crush! I don't! Shut up!
什么？{NPCName}？我没有迷恋！我没有！闭嘴！
What?! It's raining? I just got a perm!
什么？！下雨了？我刚烫了个头发！
Whatever possessed this suit of armor to suddenly walk about and start killing everyone? It lacks a corporeal body.
到底是谁控制了这身盔甲，让它突然四处走动，胡乱杀人？它没有肉身。
When I offer you to go clubbing, I don't mean downtown. I mean like, with a five iron?
我让你选球杆，不是让你选颜色，而是选功能和大小，比如五号铁杆。
When I was in Etheria, I felt so disconnected from {WorldName}. It's good to be back.
身处埃特尼亚时，我感觉与{WorldName}断了联系。能回来真是太好了。
When I'm not doing business, I'd much rather be alone, yes? I hate feeling crammed in!
不做生意的时候，我更喜欢一个人呆着，对吧？我讨厌挤来挤去的感觉！
When a Man Eater consumes enough human flesh, it undergoes a cocoon-like metamorphosis into a far deadlier form.
当食人怪吃够人肉后，就会经历一个像茧一样的蜕变，变成更致命的形态。
When a Sandstorm hits, deserts can be very dangerous. New enemies, reduced visibility, and it can even be hard to move!
当沙尘暴来袭时，沙漠是很危险的地方。新的敌人涌出，能见度降低，甚至还很难移动！
When antlions are nesting, they hide in the surface. To defend their eggs, they projectile vomit hard globs of sand at trespassers.
当蚁狮筑巢时，它们会躲在表面。为了保护它们的卵，它们会向入侵者喷射坚硬的沙砾。
When areas of death become littered with graves, a thick mist of concentrated eeriness blankets the land.
当死区遍布墓穴时，浓厚的阴森气息笼罩着大地。
When dealing with a Goblin Army, crowd control is key.
对付哥布林军队时，群体控制是关键。
When exploring, it helps to keep some Platforms on hand. They can be crafted from numerous materials such as Wood, Glass, or even Bones.
在探索时，准备一些平台总是有帮助的。这些平台可以由各种材料制成，例如木材、玻璃，甚至是骨头。
When it rains, it pours. Creatures which normally thrive in water may roam the land and sky. Beware the angered clouds.
不雨则已，一雨如柱。平常生活在水中的生物会游荡在陆地和天空中。小心愤怒的云。
When it rains, many kinds of fish acquire mystical properties.
下雨时，许多种鱼会获得神秘的特性。
When meteorites strike the surface, their fragments lay scattered for the taking. Some pieces are alive, and will attack.
当陨石撞击地表时，碎片散落一地，等着被捡走。有些是活的，会攻击。
When severe storms roll through, it is said that the skies are angry. This cloud in particular is especially livid!
据说当猛烈的暴风雨袭来时，天空会变得阴沉。这片云就特别灰！
When speaking to a vendor, you can sell items in your Inventory by pressing {InputTriggerUI_SellItem}.
在与商贩交谈时，可以按{InputTriggerUI_SellItem}来出售你物品栏里的物品。
When speaking to a vendor, you can sell items in your Inventory by pressing {InputTriggerUI_Trash} and {InputTrigger_UseOrAttack}.
在与商贩交谈时，可以按{InputTriggerUI_Trash}和{InputTrigger_UseOrAttack}来出售你物品栏里的物品。
When the Corruption grows through the desert, vile things long since buried in the sand awaken with pure malice.
当腐化之地蔓延到沙漠之后，长久以来深埋在沙漠里的邪恶之物被纯粹的恶意唤醒。
When the glowing fungus is ready to spread, these bulbs will sprout to spread its spores to other locations and hosts.
当发光的真菌准备传播时，这些球茎就会发芽，将其孢子传播到其他地方和宿主。
When the moon goes red, the water becomes like blood. Creatures submerged within may become grotesque and malicious.
当月亮变红时，水也会被染红。潜伏在水中的生物会变成奇形怪状，凶恶残暴。
When the moon rises drenched in blood, the dead rise with it! These macabre creatures seek to add fresh meat to their dripping ranks.
当猩红的月亮升起时，亡灵也随之出没！这些骇人的生物想出来给自己添添荤。
When the pirates face strong opposition in their pillaging raids, they bring their majestic floating galleon as backup. Cannons away!
当海盗在掠夺行动中遭遇顽固抵抗时，他们会用他们的大帆船作为后援。大炮滚一边去！
When the thunder rolls, and the lightning strikes... it really brings out the colors on the furniture.
电闪雷鸣的时候…确实能让家具的颜色显得更鲜艳。
When using Gamepad, you can lock on to enemies by pressing {InputTrigger_LockOn}. Locked on targets will be marked by a spinning reticle, and long range weapons will automatically aim at your target!
使用手柄时，可以通过按{InputTrigger_LockOn}来锁定敌人。锁定的目标将标记有旋转的十字线，远程武器会自动瞄准该目标！
When you are ready to challenge the keeper of the underworld, you will have to make a living sacrifice. Everything you need for it can be found in the underworld.
在你准备好挑战地狱的守卫时，必须进行活祭。它所需要的一切都能在地狱中找到。
Where is my house? Where am I? Who are you? Who am I?
我的家在哪里？我在哪里？你是谁？我是谁？
Where the heck did those Pillars come from?! You should clear out some of the monsters around them!
这些柱子到底从何而来？！你应该干掉它们周围的怪物！
Where ya been!? There's a total party going on! Here, take the cake!
丫去哪里了！？这里在开派对呢！来，拿着蛋糕！
Whether he is a man who turns into a bat, or a bat who turns into a man, one thing is for sure: he's out for blood!
不管他是变成蝙蝠的人，还是变成人的蝙蝠，有一点是肯定的：他要吸血！
Whew! Look at my many wares! I totally did NOT take them off the dead buried here, to sell to you.
哟！看看我的众多商品！我根本没有把埋在这里的死人身上的东西拿下来卖给你。
Whew! That was close! Brick and mortar sounds like a pretty good investment right now.
哟！好险！现在看来投资砖块和灰浆是一个不错的选择。
Which aftershave can I interest you in today, sir?
先生，您今天想试试哪种须后水？
Which doctor am I? The Witch Doctor am I.
While navigating your Inventory, press {InputTriggerUI_BuildFromInventory} while highlighting a tool or block to build directly from your Inventory.
在浏览物品栏时，可以在突出显示某工具或物块的同时按{InputTriggerUI_BuildFromInventory}，直接进行建造。
While the world's inhabitants celebrate festivities, gangster snowmen party by slaying everyone with their tommy guns.
当全世界的居民都在庆祝节日的时候，暴徒雪人党用冲锋枪杀死了所有人。
While you explore the underground, you may occasionally encounter helpful fairies. If you follow them, maybe they will lead you to treasure!
在探索地下时，你可能偶尔会遇到乐于助人的仙灵。跟着它们，说不定它们能带你找到宝藏！
Who needs muscles, skin, or even eyeballs? Skeletons get by with just the bones on their back, just as deadly as more fleshy foes.
谁说一定要有肌肉、皮肤甚至是眼球？骷髅就只有背上的骨头，不也过得挺好的，而且跟有肉体的敌人一样致命。
Why are you even here? If you aren't bleeding, you don't need to be here. Get out.
你怎么会在这儿？如果你没流血，就没必要在这儿。出去。
Why can't it be raining gold coins!? Water is everywhere! Bah, how useless!
为什么不下金币呢！？水到处都是！呸，下那么多雨有个屁用！
Why do I like {BiomeName}? Because it has RAINBOWS!
我为什么喜欢{BiomeName}？因为这里有彩虹呀！
Why do you have to be so confrontational during a time like this?
你为什么一定要在这种时候作对呢？
Why does {Merchant} keep trying to sell me angel statues? Everyone knows that they don't do anything.
为什么{Merchant}老向我推销天使雕像呢？大家都知道它们没一点用。
Why don't I like {BiomeName}? Because it's borin'. Green? Brown? That's it?
我为什么不喜欢{BiomeName}？因为这里很无趣。绿色？棕色？就这些吗？
Why don't YOU try collecting money from {Demolitionist} and not lose a hand or foot or...
你为什么不试着收{Demolitionist}的钱，并且不会断胳膊断脚...
Why is {BiomeName} my favorite place to go? It has tons of cool fish, duh!
为什么{BiomeName}是我最喜欢去的地方？咄，因为那里有很多很酷的鱼！
Why purify the world when you can just blow it up?
如果这个世界可以炸得一干二净，何须再净化它？
Why, thank you! I've been stuck in this sand pit for days. Good thing you can get water out of a cactus.
哦，谢谢！我被困在这个沙坑里好几天了。还好你能从仙人掌里弄出水来。
Why, this windy phenomena has inspired me ideas for a new jetpack engine!
哎呀，这大风天激发了我设计新喷气背包引擎的想法！
Will cause rain to start falling
Will cause rain to stop falling
Will dig through blocks and lay new track if carrying minecart tracks Only digs when underground
如果使用矿车轨道，会挖穿石块并铺设新轨道 只在地下挖掘
Will never threaten to stab you and, in fact, cannot speak
永远不会威胁刺伤你，而且事实上也无法讲话
Wind is not my friend, I like the dark, calm places.
我不喜欢风，我喜欢黑暗、安静的地方。
Wind is usually a great time to fish, but this is too much! I almost hooked my eye out!
起风时通常很适合钓鱼，但这风太大了！鱼钩差点钩住了我的眼睛！
Winged, demi-human women defend their territory against invaders by impaling them with their razor-sharp feathers.
半人半鸟的女鸟妖，通过用锋利的羽毛刺穿入侵者来保护自己的地盘不受侵犯。
Winter is here! Time to celebrate with twinkling lights, ugly sweaters, and a fat old fellow wearing a bright red suit.
冬天来了！是时候庆祝了，让我们挂起闪亮的彩灯，穿上丑毛衣，等着穿红衣服的胖老头发礼物吧。
Wipe your feet before you step in here, the floor was just waxed!
进来之前把脚擦干净，地板刚打过蜡！
With enough exposure to a Blood Moon, zombies become twisted and cursed with everflowing blood pouring out from their rotten flesh.
只要接触到足够多的血月，僵尸就会变得畸形并被诅咒，腐烂的肉体中会流出源源不断的鲜血。
With great power comes great responsibility (Unearth your creativity)
能力越大，责任越大（发掘你的创造力）
With the Block Swap mechanic enabled, you can replace one block with another directly, rather than having to mine it first.
启用物块交换机制后，你可以直接用一个物块取代另一个，而无需先开采。
With the Crimson seeping through the sands, dark things long forgotten rise again to seek out and destroy life.
随着猩红渗入沙漠，被遗忘已久的黑暗之物再次出现，试图摧毁生命。
With the ancient spirit of darkness released, the Crimson's veiny growth reaches new depths, and its macabre fiends gain strength.
随着古老的黑暗之魂的释放，猩红之地的岩脉伸向了更深处，它的骇人恶魔也汲取了力量。
With the ancient spirits of light and dark released, the Corruption's reach drastically increased and its minions greatly empowered.
随着古老的光明与黑暗之魂的释放，腐化之地的势力范围显著扩大，它的仆从也获得了极大的权力。
With the evils now unleashed into the depths of the world, the Hallow fights back with powerful minions of light.
随着恶灵现在被释放到世界的深处，神圣之地利用强大的光明仆从进行反击。
With the help of the defenses, you will have to repel several waves of invaders who are attempting to destroy both you and the Eternia Crystal!
你必须借助这些防御工事，击退几波企图摧毁你和埃特尼亚水晶的入侵者！
With the sands transmogrified by outside forces, those put to rest in the desert, whether good or evil, now rise to maim and kill.
随着外界力量让沙漠变得面目全非，那些安息在沙漠里的人，不管是好人还是坏人，现在都起来残害和杀戮。
With their cursed magic, the members of the Ragged Brotherhood leave their victims helplessly lost in utter darkness.
丐帮成员利用他们被诅咒的魔法，让受害者无助地迷失在黑暗中。
With thick armor and mighty boomsticks, it's clear these bones are prepared for a siege. Part of an elite military unit in their past lives.
这些骷髅准备了厚重的盔甲和强大的三发猎枪，很明显他们要进行围攻。他们曾是精英部队的一员。
Wither beasts emit a defense-sapping aura from the crystals on their back. While rooted in place, they heal rapidly.
枯萎兽通过它们背上的水晶散发出一种削弱防御力的光环。在扎根的同时，它们会迅速愈合。
Woah!? You actually did what I asked, and survived! Nice, hand it over and beat it!
哇！？你竟然完成了任务，还活了下来！不错，把它交上来，再滚远点！
Woah, {BiomeName} is disgusting, get me outta here!
噢，{BiomeName}太恶心了，我要离开这里！
Woo hoo! It's party time! ...Uh, why isn't anyone moving?
哦嚯！派对时间到！…呃，为什么没人动起来？
Wooden arrows turn into a column of bees
Wooden arrows turn into flaming bats
Wooow! You've bothered me, like, {AnglerCompletedQuestsCount} times! If I didn't have a cool fish for each time, I would be really mad!
喂！你打扰我好像有{AnglerCompletedQuestsCount}次了！要不是每次都能碰上处变不惊的鱼，我一定会发飙！
Worm-like monstrosities are the Corruption's most favored creatures, tunneling underneath unsuspecting victims.
长得像蠕虫的怪物最招腐化之地喜欢，它们会在毫无防备的受害者下方挖通道。
Worms infused with fallen star magic glow with a glittering light. Fish are extremely attracted to these.
注入了坠落之星魔法的蠕虫，发出耀眼的光。鱼非常容易被这种蠕虫所吸引。
磨损高尔夫球杆（挖起杆）
Would you rather have a bullet hole or a grenade hole? That's what I thought.
你是想挨子弹呢，还是挨手榴弹？反正我是这么想的。
Wow, like, I've never seen a full moon. For some reason, it's like I pass out every time one's around!
哇，我好像从来没见过满月。不知道为什么，一要出现满月我就会昏倒！
Wow, that key you have is pretty nifty! I heard keys like that can be used to get rare treasure in the Dungeon!
哇，你的钥匙真漂亮！我听说用这种钥匙能获得地牢里的稀世珍宝！
Wow, there's so many people here, I hate that it's not for a party.
哇，这里这么多人，我讨厌他们不是来参加派对的。
Wow, {PlayerName}, meeting an adventurous man like you makes me want to party!
哇，{PlayerName}，认识像你这样的冒险家，让我有股想开派对的冲动！
Wrapped in celestial energy, this worm-like creature seems invincible. Having no eyes, it seeks vibrations throughout the air.
这种像蠕虫的生物浑身充满了天界能量，似乎战无不胜。由于没有眼睛，它会在空中发出振动。
Wyvern souls are entwined in the atmosphere of the world. Powerful magicks can summon them through the veil with physical form.
飞龙的灵魂在世间盘旋。强大的魔法可以通过物质形态来召唤它们。
YAR! Funny ye should be mentionin' parrots b'cause...um...What t'were we talkin' 'bout?
呀！贼溜了，唠扯唠扯鹦鹉吧，因...噶...哈...唠啥嗑呢？
YES, gold is stronger than iron. What are they teaching these humans nowadays?
是的，黄金比铁坚硬。如今的人类都在学些什么知识？
YES, {NPCName} loves pink and bright, glittery things, SHE LOVES TO PARTY!
是的，{NPCName}喜欢粉红色和闪闪发亮的东西，她超级喜欢派对！
Ya know, {BiomeName} is secluded and great for business, if you catch my drift.
你知道吗，{BiomeName}是个与世隔绝的地方，很适合做生意，如果你明白我的意思。

Yarr matey! Shiver me timbers! Avast, scallywags! There's a pirate captain who once had a pet fish named Cap'n Tunabeard, but during a big storm the fishbowl fell overboard! It has a hook for a tail, and an eyepatch and everything! You need to fetch me that fish, so I can be as cool as a pirate! Obviously it's out in the ocean somewhere! Duh!
(Caught in Ocean)

哟，朋友！吓本大盗一跳！停船，我的乖乖！有一个海盗船长，养了一条叫“金枪鱼须船长”的宠物鱼，但在一场大风暴中，鱼缸落水了！它有一个尾钩，一个眼罩，还有别的！你需要把那条鱼抓给我，这样我就能像海盗一样酷酷的！显然，它就在大海的某个地方！咄！
（抓捕位置：海洋）
Yarr, {NPCName}'d fetch a hefty reward on the seas... jus' kidding, she's me favorite lass.
呀，{NPCName}会在海上获得丰厚的回报...开个玩笑，她是我最喜欢的姑娘。
Yarr. I be in ship shape!
Ye know me don't like that {NPCName} tries to cut me beard, I've slit scurvy throats fer less!
丫知道俺不喜欢那个打俺胡子主意的{NPCName}，为绝后患，俺已经干掉了那个卑鄙的家伙！
Ye too hate the feelin' that a mutiny be comin'? Too many scallywags gettin' close to me quarters.
丫也讨厌叛变来临前的感觉？俺的住处周围有太多无赖。
Yeah, I like {NPCName}, wicked cool person.
没错，我喜欢又邪恶又酷的{NPCName}。
Yeah, I might be in a good mood. What's it to ya?
是的，我可能心情很好。但这和你有什么关系？
Yeah, no, {BiomeName} makes me very uncomfortable.
Yeesh, {BiomeName} is literally murdering my party vibe.
是的，{BiomeName}简直是在毁掉我的派对氛围。
Yes! I get to be alone with all my fish!
太好了！我可以和我的鱼独处了！
Yes! It's raining! Now I can watch you get soaking wet while you fish for me!
没错！下雨了！现在你要变成钓鱼的落汤鸡了！
Yes, I can go out in the rain and not melt. I'm a wizard, dammit!
是的，我可以走在雨中而不融化。我可是巫师，该死的！
Yes, yes, yes! -- I'll give you your share in just a moment. I'd think you to be a bit more patient, what with me doing all the work and all.
是，是，是！-- 我一会儿就把你那份给你。我以为你会更耐心点，等我把所有工作都做完。
Yo ho ho and a bottle of....blinkroots!
Yo, I heard you like rockets and running boots, so I put some rockets in your running boots.
唷，我听说你喜欢火箭和跑鞋，所以我在你的跑鞋上加了一些火箭。
You again? Suppose you want more money!?
你又来了？你是想要更多钱吧！？
You already managed to spend every pence I paid you!? Bah, I'm not a charity, go kill a slime!
你已经花光了我付给你的每一分钱！？呸，我可不是慈善家，去杀死史莱姆！
You are a God walking among mere mortals! A spectacular golfer!
简直是神仙级水平！真是了不起的高尔夫球手！
You are banned from this server.
You are being sucked into the mouth
You are done, the grand {Angler} dismisses you!
你完蛋了，伟大的 {Angler} 会解雇你！
You are far too weak to defeat my curse. Come back when you aren't so worthless.
你太弱了，破解不了我的诅咒。等你强大点了再来吧。
You are giving off a positive energy, like something grand could occur at any moment.
你释放出一种正能量，感觉美好的事情随时可能发生。
You are not close enough to a pylon to teleport with the pylon network
离晶塔不够近，无法用晶塔网络传送
You are not in a party!
You are not using the same version as this server.
你使用的版本与此服务器不同。
You are overflowing with a blessing of stupendous prosperity!!
你的内心充满了对繁荣昌盛的祝福！！
You are unable to absorb healing effects
You better not get blood on me.
你最好不要让血沾到我身上。
You better stay outta my hair tonight, hun. I just sharpened my scissors, and I'm looking for an excuse to use them!
你今晚最好别碰我的头发，哼。我刚磨快我的剪刀，正想找个借口用用它！
You bring me a beautiful, rare flower... yes, yes? Take this bottle of special dye for your troubles, friend!
你给我带来了稀有的美丽花朵...是吧，是吧？这瓶特别的染料你就拿去吧，朋友！
You call this lightning!? Back in my day, I .. uh.. Hmm. Oh, did you need something?
你管这叫闪电！？在我那个时代，我…啊…嗯。哦，你有什么需要吗？
You can assign your favorite items to the DPad for rapid use by enabling DPad Hotbar in Gamepad Settings!
可以通过在手柄设置中启用“方向键热键栏”，将你最喜欢的物品分配到方向键，以便快速使用！
You can build a shelter by placing wood or other blocks in the world. Don't forget to create and place walls.
你可以建造房屋，方法是将木材和其他砖块放在是世界里。别忘了建造和放置墙。
You can buy Wires from the Mechanic and use them to create traps, pumping systems, or other elaborate devices.
你可以从机械师那里购买电线，用它们来制作机关、泵系统或其他复杂的设备。
You can change your spawn point by placing and using a bed.
你可以通过放置一张床并使用它来改变生成位置。
You can check if a room is valid housing from the Housing section of the Inventory Menu.
你可以从“物品栏菜单”的“房屋”部分检查某个房间是否是有效房屋。
You can continuously use some items by holding down the {InputTrigger_UseOrAttack} button.
可以通过按住{InputTrigger_UseOrAttack}按钮来连续使用某些物品。
You can create a bloody spine with vertebrae. Make sure you are in a crimson area before using it.
你可以使用脊椎骨制作血腥脊椎。你必须在猩红区中才能使用它。
You can create a furnace out of torches, wood, and stone. Make sure you are standing near a work bench.
你可以用火把、木材和石头制作熔炉。请务必站在工作台旁边。
You can create worm bait with rotten chunks and vile powder. Make sure you are in a corrupt area before using it.
你可以用腐肉和魔粉制作虫饵。你必须在腐化区域才能使用它。
You can destroy Shadow Orbs and Crimson Hearts with a hammer or explosives, but prepare yourself for the forces they unleash.
你可以用锤子或炸药来摧毁暗影珠和猩红之心，但要准备应对它们释放的力量。
You can harvest Cobwebs and turn them into Silk. You can use Silk to craft beds, sofas, and more!
可以收割蛛网并将其变成丝绸。然后用丝绸来制作床、沙发等等！
You can make a grappling hook from a hook and 3 chains. Skeletons found deep underground usually carry hooks, and chains can be made from iron bars or lead bars.
你可以用一个爪钩和3条链子制作一个抓钩。地下深处的骷髅们通常带着爪钩，而链子可以用铁锭或铅锭制作。
You can only go down from here!
You can place defenses at the cost of 10 Etherian mana. Once placed, the Eternia Crystal will release some of this mana. Otherwise, you will need to defeat enemies to get more.
你可以花费10点天国魔力设置防御工事。设置完毕后，埃特尼亚水晶将释放其中一些天国魔力。否则，您将需要打败敌人才能获得更多天国魔力。
You can plant Acorns to grow new trees.
你可以种下橡实来培植新树。
You can remove Torches with {InputTrigger_InteractWithTile} or with a pickaxe.
你可以看到附近的危险
You can see what's biting your hook
你能看到是什么在咬你的鱼钩
You can tell a Blood Moon is out when the sky turns red. There is something about it that causes monsters to swarm.
天空变红的时候，你就知道血月升起来了。血月有一种魔力，能吸引怪物蜂拥而来。
You can use Hallowed Seeds, Holy Water, or Pearlstone to make Hallow spread.
你可以使用圣种、圣水或珍珠石来蔓延神圣之地。
You can use the housing interface to assign and view housing. Open your inventory and click the house icon.
你可以使用房屋界面来分配和查看住房情况。打开物品栏并点击房屋图标。
You can use these artifacts to create traps and defensive towers. Doing so consumes Etherian mana, a special energy dropped only by members of the Old One's Army!
你可以使用这些道具制造机关和防御塔楼。这样做会消耗天国魔力，也就是只有撒旦军队成员才会掉落的特殊能量！
You can use your pickaxe to dig through dirt, and your axe to chop down trees. Just place your cursor over the tile and click!
你可以用镐子挖土，用斧子砍树。只需把光标放到图格上并点击！
You can wear Buckets on your head!
你可以将水桶套在头上！
You can't change teams inside your team's blocks!
你不能在团队块内更改团队！
You could get a Witch Doctor to come to your World if you defeat the Queen Bee.
如果你打败了蜂王，巫医就会来到你的世界。

You ever wonder why the lakes on the surface of the snowy areas of {WorldName} never ice over? I don't. The fish, however, do! A fish made out of ice would make a great offering to the mighty and amazing {Angler}! Go, my loyal subject, and bring me this Tundra Trout with haste!
(Caught in Surface Tundra)

你知道位于{WorldName}雪域表面上的湖泊为什么从不结冰吗？我不知道。但鱼知道！用冰制成的鱼会作为上佳的祭品进贡给伟大且神奇的{Angler}！去吧，我的忠诚仆人，赶快把这条苔原鳟鱼带给我！
（抓捕位置：地表苔原）
You feel an evil presence watching you...
你感到有个邪恶的东西在看着你...
You feel vibrations from deep below...
你感受到地下深处的震动...
You found some old fossils in the desert? I wonder if there is a way to extract them from the rock.
你在沙漠找到古老化石了？不知道有没有办法从岩石中获得化石。
You have a lot of work to do.
You have entertained me enough for today, go.
你今天已经让我够开心了，可以走了。
You have lost the power of creation!
You have no idea how much Dirt Blocks sell for overseas.
你是不知道土块能在国外卖多少钱。
You have no permission for this power
You have seen something nasty, there is no escape.
你已经看到一些令人讨厌的东西，而且无路可逃。
You haven't seen any pigs around here have you? My brother lost his leg to one.
你在这附近看到过猪吗？我弟弟的一条腿被猪叼走了。
You just might be strong enough to free me from my curse...
你的能力也只够将我从诅咒中解救出来...
You just received your pay, and not a farthing more! Get out!
你刚刚才拿到你的酬劳，多一分钱也没有！滚开！
You know what would be the best way to party? Buying things for others, specifically from me.
你知道参加派对的最佳方式吗？给别人买点礼物，特别是从我这儿买。
You know, I think I've seen a portal like that before, but it was gold.
你知道吗，我想我以前看过一个像这样的传送门，但它是黄金的。
You know, super scary things lurk in the water during a Blood Moon! You should totally go try it! I'll watch from here!
你知道吗，在血月期间，水中潜伏着超级可怕的东西！你应该去试试！我在这里帮你把风！
You know, that mining helmet-flipper combination was a much better idea on paper.
你知道吧，理论上，潜水帽和脚蹼应该配套使用。
You know, these Etherian Goblins are nothing like my people. Really rowdy bunch. Not that my people are much better...
要知道，这些天国哥布林与我的人完全不同。真是一伙粗暴之徒。这并不是说我的人要优秀很多...
You left your arm over there. Let me get that for you...
你把武器落在那边了。我给你拿来...
You look a bit frazzled! Perhaps a mug'll calm your singed nerves.
你看起来有点疲惫！也许一杯酒能让你焦灼的神经平静下来。
You look half digested. Have you been chasing slimes again?
你看着就像被消化了一半一样。你又在追史莱姆了？
You look like a drowned, shaggy dog! How 'bout you down some ale, eh?
看把你淋得像落汤狗一样！来点麦芽酒怎么样？
You make a great errand monkey! Now go away!
你这跑腿的活干得挺不错嘛！现在走开！
You may remove the reaper from the cemetery, but you may not remove the cemetery from the reaper...
你可以赶走墓地的死神，但你赶不走死神控制的墓地…
You might want to be careful today. Us dwarves tend to have pretty explosive parties.
今天你可得小心点。我们矮人族喜欢开火爆的派对。
You must cleanse the world of this corruption.
你必须净化这个腐化的世界。
You must cleanse the world of this crimson.
你必须净化这个猩红的世界。
You must do something about {Pirate}. Everytime he comes over here, it takes me a week to get the smell off!
你必须对{Pirate}做点什么。每次他来这儿，我都要用一整个星期才能去掉气味！
You must first set a frame
You pathetic fool. You cannot hope to face my master as you are now.
你个可怜的白痴。你现在这样就别指望能对抗我的主人了。
You really kept the full force of the Old One's Army at bay? Maybe you should visit Etheria some time.
你真的让撒旦军队的全部力量陷入绝境了吗？或许你应该找个时间去埃特尼亚看看。
You saved me! You're awful nice, I could use you... er, I mean, totally hire you to do some awesome stuff for me!
你救了我！你太好了，我可以使唤你...呃，我是说，雇你帮我做些了不起的事！
You seem to have a problem with your green screen 'Great for impersonating streamers!'
你的绿屏好像有问题 “非常适合冒充游戏主播！”
You should do some mining to find metal ore. You can craft very useful things with it.
你应该挖矿，找到金属矿石。你可以用它来制作非常有用的物品。
You should focus on gathering more life crystals to increase your maximum life.
你应当专注于收集更多的生命水晶，以提高最大生命值。
You should make an attempt to max out your available life. Try to gather twenty hearts.
你应当试试提高到最大的生命值。试着收集二十颗心。
You should prove yourself by defeating a strong monster. That will get the attention of a dryad.
你需要打败一只强大的怪物来证明自己。这样才能吸引树妖的注意。
You should sit down and have a little fun. Don't worry, I don't think any kobolds will crash this party.
你应该坐下来，找点乐子。别担心，应该不会有小妖魔闯进这个派对。
You should stay indoors at night. It is very dangerous to be wandering around in the dark.
晚上你应该呆在家里。黑夜在外面转悠非常危险。
You should try fishing when the water is all bloody! It's to die for!
你应该在水面都染红的时候去钓鱼！一定能满载而归！
You shoulda seen it when lightning struck one of my carts filled with explosives!
可惜你没看到当闪电击中我一辆装满炸药的车时的场景！
You think I can make brilliant colors so far from my shop? Don't think so!
你认为我能在离我的店这么远的地方制作出鲜艳的颜色吗？那你搞错了！
You think this a place worthy of my presence? So drab, so dull, these people are literally below me.
你觉得这地方值得我来？这么无聊，这么乏味，这些人都不会做生意。
You think you can pull a fast one on {DyeTrader}, I don't think so! I only take the rarest of flowers for these special bottles!
你以为可以骗过{DyeTrader}，我可不这么想！我只接受用最稀有的花来交换这些特别的瓶子！
You wake up from a strange dream...
你从一个奇怪的梦中醒来...
You want apples? You want carrots? You want pineapples? We got torches.
你想要苹果？你想要胡萝卜？你想要菠萝？我们只有火把。
You want boomerang bombs? Throw some out in that gust, they'll come back to you alright!
你想要回飞炸弹？往这股风里扔吧，炸弹会回到你身边的！
You want two penny farthings!? Make it one and we have a deal.
你想要两文钱！？一文钱就成交。
You were so preoccupied with whether or not you could open the chest that you didn't stop to think if you should.
你一心在琢磨能否打开宝箱，却没有想过是否应该打开宝箱。
You will dodge the next attack
You will fall slower while holding this
持有此物可减缓坠落速度
You will need an anvil to make most things out of metal bars.
你需要一个砧子才能充分锤炼金属锭。
You will want to increase your life before facing your next challenge. Fifteen hearts should be enough.
在面对下一个挑战时，建议你提高生命值。十五颗心应该足够了。

You won't believe it! I caught a fish in the forest at night that was already dead! Then it tried to eat me! I threw it away and ran! Now I want to stick it in someone's dresser to see what happens, so go fish it back up for me will ya?!
(Caught in Surface)

你相信吗？！我晚上在森林里抓到一条已经死了的鱼！然后，它想吃我！我把它扔掉，然后扭头就跑！ 现在，我要把它粘在别人的梳妆台上，看看会发生什么，所以你去把那条鱼给我抓回来，好吗？！
（抓捕位置：地表）
You won't take falling damage if you have a Lucky Horseshoe. Look for them in chests underground.
如果你有幸运马掌，你就不会受到掉落伤害。在地下宝箱中寻找幸运马掌。
You would not believe some of the things people throw at me... Wanna buy some of it?
你肯定想不到大家扔了些什么给我...想买点？
You'll want to place your Eternia Crystal stand in a pretty open, flat area. Lots of walls and stuff might make it pretty difficult to protect!
你会希望将埃特尼亚水晶座放置在相当开阔平坦的区域。众多墙壁和物品可能会使其难以保护！
You're doing a good job out there! Should I be worried?
你表现得很好！我应该担心吗？
You're getting better! I am not fearing for my life anymore.
你表现得越来越好了！我不用再担心我的生命危险了。
You're going to need a lot of practice, I strongly recommend padding.
你需要大量的练习，我强烈建议你使用训练垫。
You've got a real backbone coming way down here, how 'bout ya buy somethin?
真正的脊骨就快到货了，你要不买点什么？
Young Demon Eyes newly birthed from the Eye of Cthulhu, brought forth to protect their master by any means necessary.
克苏鲁之眼刚生下的小恶魔眼，为了保护它们的主人不惜一切代价。
你的冒险之旅即将开始…
Your Adventure Begins... (The Standard Terraria Experience)
你的冒险之旅即将开始…（标准泰拉瑞亚体验）
Your ballistas rapidly shoot in panic!
你的弩车在惊慌之下快速射击！
Your courses are well below par. That's a good thing!
你的得分远低于平均水平。但这是件好事！
Your current equipment simply won't do. You need to make better armor.
你现有的装备根本做不到。你需要制作更好的盔甲。
Your movement speed has been reduced
Your next step should be to explore the caverns of the Crimson. Find and destroy any Crimson Hearts that you come across.
你下一步需要去探索猩红之地的洞穴。找到猩红之心，然后摧毁它。
Your next step should be to explore the corrupt chasms. Destroy any shadow orb you find.
下一步应当探索腐化裂缝。寻找并摧毁你找到的任何暗影珠。
Your summons will focus struck enemies
你召唤的仆从将集中打击被击中的敌人
Your world has been blessed with Adamantite!
Your world has been blessed with Cobalt!
Your world has been blessed with Mythril!
Your world has been blessed with Orichalcum!
Your world has been blessed with Palladium!
Your world has been blessed with Titanium!
Yuck, {BiomeName} is extremely putrid and filthy, it'll make me sick!
呸，{BiomeName}极其腐臭肮脏，让我觉得恶心！
Zero close proximity life signs detected. This is fortunate.
未检测到近距离生命信号。很幸运。
Zombies found in snow biomes are often found bundled up in winter clothing. It doesn't help them any, they are still dead cold!
在雪地生物群落中发现的僵尸通常裹着冬衣。但这对它们毫无帮助，它们仍然是冰冷的！
{$ChatCommand.Emote} message: Send the message in third-person perspective
{$ChatCommand.Emote}消息：以第三人称视角传递消息
{$ChatCommand.Help}: Lists all the commands you can use
{$ChatCommand.Help}：列出你可以使用的所有命令
{$ChatCommand.Party} message: Send the message to your party members
{$ChatCommand.Party}消息：向你的队伍成员发送消息
{$ChatCommand.Playing_0}: List the names of all players on the server
{$ChatCommand.Playing_0}：列出服务器上的所有玩家名字
{$ChatCommand.RPS}: Randomly uses a Rock, Paper, or Scissors emote
{$ChatCommand.RPS}：随机使用石头、剪刀、布的表情符号
{$CommonItemTooltip.DevItem} 'A fine dress handmade by a dragon'
{$CommonItemTooltip.DevItem} “一件由龙手工制作的漂亮衣服”
{$CommonItemTooltip.DevItem} 'I didn't get this from the Grid'
{$CommonItemTooltip.DevItem} 'The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step'
{$CommonItemTooltip.DevItem} 'There might be pasta in the pockets'
{$CommonItemTooltip.DevItem} 'They don't let me wear a loincloth anymore.'
{$CommonItemTooltip.DevItem} 'To keep those luscious locks as gorgeous as ever'
{$CommonItemTooltip.DevItem} Become the wind, ride the lightning.
{$CommonItemTooltip.DevItem} Bejeweled and elegant for soaring through the thundering skies
{$CommonItemTooltip.DevItem} 用珠宝装饰且非常优雅，在雷鸣的高空翱翔
{$CommonItemTooltip.DevItem} Disorder came from order, fear came from courage, weakness came from strength
{$CommonItemTooltip.DevItem} 乱生于治，怯生于勇，弱生于强
{$CommonItemTooltip.DevItem} If you see this you should probably run away...
{$CommonItemTooltip.DevItem} 如果看到这种情况，你应该逃跑...
{$CommonItemTooltip.DevItem} Know thy self, know thy enemy. A thousand battles, a thousand victories…
{$CommonItemTooltip.DevItem} Wheels of justice grind slow but grind fine.
{$CommonItemTooltip.DevItem} 公正之轮，其速慢，其效优。
{$CommonItemTooltip.MajorStats} 'It brings the boys to the yard!'
{$CommonItemTooltip.MajorStats} 'Nothing is as Terrarian as apple pie.'
{$CommonItemTooltip.MajorStats} “没有什么比苹果馅饼更具泰拉瑞亚特色了。”
{$CommonItemTooltip.MediumStats} 'Barbecue it, boil it, broil it, bake it...'
{$CommonItemTooltip.MediumStats} “观赏七彩色泽，品尝美味潘趣！”
{$CommonItemTooltip.MediumStats} 'Po' Boy are you in for a treat!'
{$CommonItemTooltip.MediumStats} 'Stuff it all up in one bite!'
{$CommonItemTooltip.MinorStats} 'An apple a day keeps Doctor Bones away!'
{$CommonItemTooltip.MinorStats} “一天一苹果，骷髅博士远离我！”
{$CommonItemTooltip.MinorStats} 'Are you suggesting that coconuts can migrate?'
{$CommonItemTooltip.MinorStats} 'Come to the dark side, we have smoothies'
{$CommonItemTooltip.MinorStats} 'How can I have some more of nothing?'
{$CommonItemTooltip.MinorStats} “我怎么才能再吃点棉花糖呢？”
{$CommonItemTooltip.MinorStats} 'If you like piña coladas and getting caught in the rain'
{$CommonItemTooltip.MinorStats} “如果你喜欢椰林飘香和淋雨”
{$CommonItemTooltip.MinorStats} 'That'll keep you out of my birdfeeders...'
{$CommonItemTooltip.MinorStats} “这样你就不用管我的喂鸟器了…”
{$CommonItemTooltip.Sentry} Summons a lunar portal to shoot lasers at your enemies
{$CommonItemTooltip.Sentry} 召唤月亮传送门，向敌人发射激光
{$CommonItemTooltip.Sentry} Summons a powerful frost hydra to spit ice at your enemies
{$CommonItemTooltip.Sentry} 召唤强大的寒霜九头蛇，以朝敌人吐冰雪
{$CommonItemTooltip.Sentry} Summons a spider queen to spit eggs at your enemies
{$CommonItemTooltip.Sentry} 召唤蜘蛛女王，以朝敌人吐蜘蛛蛋
{$CommonItemTooltip.TipsyStats} 'Drink too much of this, and you become karate master.'
{0} can't be put back together again.
{0} is completely pure. You have done an amazing job!
{0} is no longer on a party.
{0}中{1}%为神圣之地，{2}%为腐化之地，{3}%为猩红之地。
{0} let their arms get torn off
{0} was hit {1} times before touching the ground!
{0} was turned into a pile of flesh
{0}看着自己的内脏变成了“外脏”
{0}'s legs appeared where her head should be.
{0}'s legs appeared where his head should be.
{0}'s meat was ripped off the bone
{?!Day}Check in with me, and do your job.
{?!Day}在我这里签到，然后就去干你的活儿。
{?!Day}Really quiet out there. A little too quiet...
{?!Day}那里真的很安静。有点太过安静了...
{?!Day}The stars at night remind me of glitter on a beautiful, black dress. I shall soon have one made!
{?!Day}夜晚的星星让我想到一条闪闪发光的漂亮黑裙子。我马上就让人做一条！
{?BloodMoon}I don't know what's scarier, a Blood Moon or my sister during a Blood Moon!
{?BloodMoon}血月和血月期间我的姐妹，我不知道哪一个更可怕！
{?BloodMoon}The blood stains on my club? Have you seen the zombies outside?!
{?BloodMoon}我的球杆上有血迹？你看到外面的僵尸了吗？！
{?BloodMoon}The rivers are running red, everyone seem awfully on edge, hmm... it's a trying night, indeed!
{?BloodMoon}河流泛起红波，所有人看上去都非常紧张不安，嗯...这真是个难熬的夜晚！
{?BloodMoon}You know, where I'm from, a Blood Moon is actually just an excuse to get some fresh air.
{?BloodMoon}你知道我从哪里来，血月其实不过是我想要散散心的一个借口。
{?DukeFishronDefeated}I once met with a Duke on the beach. He looked kinda fishy, and lacked good manners!
{?DukeFishronDefeated}我曾经在海滩上遇到一位公爵。他看上去有点可疑，而且没什么礼貌！
{?Eclipse}Like wow, I feel like I belong with the creepy killer things running around right now. So glad I'm not that mindless.
{?Eclipse}就像是，我感觉我应该马上加入这些杀人狂魔。幸好我没那么傻。
{?FrostLegionDefeated}Worry not, concerned citizen! I am well aware of the organized crime problem among snowfolk.
{?FrostLegionDefeated}这位热心市民，不必担心！我已经充分了解到雪人当中的有组织犯罪问题。
{?GolemDefeated}I tried to pet a lihzahrd once. Um... they didn't mind at all!
{?GolemDefeated}我曾经尝试养丛林蜥蜴当宠物。呃...它们根本不在乎！
{?HardMode}I know a Lavamancer that would really like that hellstone down in the underworld.
{?HardMode}我知道一个熔岩术士，他肯定会非常喜欢地狱中的狱石。
{?Homeless}Know any good places to set up shop? Would love to open up a bar here.
{?Homeless}知道有什么好地方可以设立商店吗？很想在这里开一家酒吧。
{?IceQueenDefeated}Diplomacy did not work so well with the Ice Queen, I'm afraid. She's rather cold-hearted! He he!
{?IceQueenDefeated}与冰雪女王的外事交往恐怕不大顺利。她相当冷漠！呵呵！
{?MartiansDefeated}I wish the martians were a little nicer. Our world doesn't normally get visitors!
{?MartiansDefeated}要是火星人能再友善一点就好了。我们的世界通常没什么访客！
{?MoonLordDefeated}Moon Lord, don't you mean Abyss Lord?
{?MoonLordDefeated}月亮领主，你指的难道不是深渊领主吗？
{?PumpkingDefeated}The Pumpking can be rather two-faced, it seems. I shall not give up on peace with his spooky people!
{?PumpkingDefeated}南瓜王似乎真是个两面派。我不会放弃与他那些令人毛骨悚然的人民达成和平的！
{?Rain}Golfing in THIS weather?! Only if you like swinging around a giant lightning rod!
{?Rain}这种天气打高尔夫球？！除非你喜欢绕着一根巨大的避雷针转！
{Angler} wants YOU as the official {WorldName} errand monkey!
{ArmsDealer} keeps talking about pressing my pressure plate. I told him it was for stepping on.
{ArmsDealer}一直在说怎么按我的压力板。我告诉他，这是用脚踩的。
{Armsdealer} has mistaken my golf balls as ammo for his musket on several occasions.
{Armsdealer}好几次把我的高尔夫球误认为他的火枪子弹。
{Bartender} offered me a Root Beer, I told him to give it to me in a square cup.
{Bartender}给了我一杯根汁饮料，我告诉他将饮料倒在方形的杯子里拿给我。
{Bartender} said I reminded him of a certain "EV2". Perhaps I should meet her.
{Bartender}说我让他想起某个“EV2”。或许我应该见见她。
{Dryad} is a looker. Too bad she's such a prude.
{Dryad} seems nice. I should bring her back with me.
{Dryad}似乎很不错。我应该带她回来。
{NPCName} actually knows what they're doing, unlike some OTHER people! I kinda like that!
{NPCName}其实知道他们在做什么，不像某些其他人！我挺喜欢的！
{NPCName} always helps me choose the best color dresses!
{NPCName}总能帮我选出颜色最棒的裙子！
{NPCName} always lets me play with her pets, its so nice!
{NPCName}总是让我和她的宠物一起玩，真好！
{NPCName} always makes me feel better when I'm hurt!
{NPCName}总能在我受到伤害时让我感觉好过些！
{NPCName} always provides what I need, free of charge!
{NPCName}总能为我提供需要的东西，而且分文不取！
{NPCName} analyzed: Most wholesome carbon lifeform ever recorded.
{NPCName}分析结果：有记录以来最有益健康的碳生命体。
{NPCName} and I like the same shade of pink! That's a friend, in my book!
{NPCName}和我喜欢同样深浅的粉红色！可以说是我的朋友！
{NPCName} and I share a very long history, I like the mutual wisdom.
{NPCName}和我相识已久，我喜欢我们共同的智慧。
{NPCName} attempts to treat me favorably like another human. It appears I appreciate that.
{NPCName}试图像对待其他人类一样善待我。看来我是吃这一套的。
{NPCName} brings order and peace to everyone who lives in this world.
{NPCName}为生活在这个世界上的每个人带来了秩序与和平。
{NPCName} can fix up just about anything, I admire her!
{NPCName}几乎能搞定一切，我很佩服她！
{NPCName} commissioned me to paint a mural on the roof of her throne room!
{NPCName}委托我在她的正殿屋顶上画壁画！
{NPCName} could buy out my whole shop! Pleasant to talk to, as well.
{NPCName}可以买空我的整个店铺！和她交谈也很愉快。
{NPCName} dabbles in things that shouldn't be disturbed, and I don't like that.
{NPCName}涉足了不该被打扰的领域，我不喜欢这样。
{NPCName} does not comprehend my existence, for it deviates from the norm. Unusual. The negative feeling is mutual.
{NPCName}不理解我的存在，因为它偏离了常态。不寻常。负面情绪是相互的。
{NPCName} doesn't try to eat me, that's good in my book.
{NPCName}没有试图吃掉我，这给我留下了好印象。
{NPCName} has good eyes for vividness and business, I like it, yes?
{NPCName}善于发现鲜艳的颜色和商机，对吧？我喜欢。
{NPCName} has the best hair advice, she's great to talk to!
{NPCName}提出的美发建议是最棒的，很高兴能与她交谈！
{NPCName} has tried to eat me so many times. I swear, one time they weren't even human! I, obviously, dislike it.
{NPCName}很多次想吃掉我。我发誓，有一次他们甚至毫无人性！很显然，我不喜欢这样。
{NPCName} has tried to throw me into a pot filled with other unusual ingredients. I hate that.
{NPCName}曾试图把我扔进一个装满其他不寻常原料的壶里。我讨厌这样。
{NPCName} hotwired one of my pumps, I'm super impressed!
{NPCName}用短路点火的方式启动了我的一台泵，这给我留下了非常深刻的印象！
{NPCName} is a good friend I like, helps me load the gunpowder!
{NPCName}是我的好朋友，还帮我装火药！
{NPCName} is a kindred spirit of nature, my soul is at peace in their presence.
{NPCName}是志同道合的大自然使者，有他们在，我的心灵就能得到安宁。
{NPCName} is a likeable sort who helps me spruce up my inventions.
{NPCName}是个讨人喜欢的家伙，会帮我完善我的发明。
{NPCName} is a little unsettling to be around, but terribly cute!
{NPCName}相处起来有点让人不安，但是非常可爱！
{NPCName} is a smart and likeable goof.
{NPCName}是一个既聪明又可爱的傻瓜。
{NPCName} is always good for an exciting pirate story!
{NPCName}总是很擅长讲述精彩的海盗故事！
{NPCName} is always the life of the party!
{NPCName} is from an entirely different world, that's so interesting!
{NPCName}来自一个完全不同的世界，真有趣！
{NPCName} is just too bland for my tastes, I dislike associating with dull types.
